26a1: na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thams cad bskyed cing sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rab tu
26a2: phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma rig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa mun nag dang / dmigs pa'i lta ba spong zhing shes rab 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// thabs mkhas pa ni chos
26a3: snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod las ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni chos sdang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad sdud cing
26a4: byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro/ / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag gi bde ba la me chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos yongs
26a5: su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ / sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
26a6: ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ stobs bcu yo ngas su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//
26a7: lhag mthang ga chags ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyu'o// so sa yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// tan pa la
26a8: 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi smra yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gzungs thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stobs pa

26b1: na na/ rna na smya ga Ag sa smra /
26b2: pa wA pa/ sa pa bzod pa nga ban/ yang ban patho par 'gyur // byar mi rdzog pa ni sa y-i / sa cad pas brdzogapa
26b3: sanas sar 'bar ba'i ye shes ni chos sna ba'i sgo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis dbang srung bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgoste/ mngal du 'jug pa dang / bcas pa dang /
26b4: mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bstang pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud gdul ba dang / byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyab dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
26b5: chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag 'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za bar gang bstan par bya ba'o//
26b6: dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i 'khor de las lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to//
26b7: lha'i bu sngon yongs su spyad babyas pa srab khri nyis stod ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//
26b8: dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du yog par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor de dag rgya cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su

27a1: bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gang gi can dga' ldan gnas mchag nas/ badren pa skyes bus ga 'a cha 'tha' tsha// lha rnams dgal chag tu sra ba na// bgazad tha' dag rnam par spangs pa//
27a2: sgra/ lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa// yid kyis bsams pas 'byung ba dpal ldan pa/ thams cad las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste// de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin/ de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis/
27a3: sngon gyi dge bsags 'di ni zad gyur te// gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba/ ngan song dag tu song bar gyur ta re// ngal gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni/ chos gang thos par gyung ba de dag la// nan tan gyis
27a4: ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang / / bde ba mtha' yas nges par thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag brtan pa min// ther zag ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste// smig sgra dang ni sgyu ma rnams dang 'dra// glog
27a5: dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur ba yin/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gi dga' bas ni// lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur// gang dag rdul med 'jig rten 'das pa yi// shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms pa
27a6: 'gyur/ / lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang gla dbyangs ni// gar gyi ltad mo pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra// dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su// phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor bar byed dang mtshungs// dge ba'i las byas
27a7: rjes su 'brang byed cing / phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma gtogs par// 'dus byas dag la grogs yod ma yin te// mdza' ba shes nye du med cing 'khor kyang med// de lta bas na lhan cig 'thun byos la// pan
27a8: tshun bya mas sems phan pa'i sems byos te/ / chos kyi spyad pa dag ni spyad par gyis// spyad pa legs par spyad la gdung ba med// thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing // bzod dang des pa

27b1: phun sum tshogs gyis te/ / sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun dang / de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis// rtag pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la// rgyu dang rkyen rnams dang ri lngar gyur cing // bdag
27b2: po med la bems por gyur pa yi/ / chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin brtag par gyis// nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang // spobs pa ye shes dbang rnams gang mthong ba// kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste//
27b3: thos dang tshul khrims bag yod rnams las byung // sems can don dang phan dang byams don du// nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang // bag yod pa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang / yang dag sdom pa'i rjes su bslab
27b4: par gyis/ / ngag dang skad dang sgra rnams tsam gyis ni// dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi nus kyis/ nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub byos la/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin bya bar byos// gzhan gyis gleng ba'i skabs ni ma dbye bar// bdag ni rtag tu bsgrim pra
27b5: 'bad par gyis/ / la las byas shing sbyin pa yong ma yin// ma byas par yang 'grub par 'gyur ba med// sngon chad 'khor bar 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dag/ myong bar gang gyur de ni dran par gyis// khyed cag
27b6: log pa nyid du nges pas na/ / mya ngan 'das dang 'dod chags bral mthob/ de lta bas na ngal dang bshes gnyen dang // tshul dang 'thun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang // chos mnyan dam pa thob par byas nas ni// 'dod
27b7: chags la sogs nyon mongs zhi bar gyis/ / nga rgyal dang ni rmugs dang dregs thong la// rtag tu mnyen zhing drang la g.yo med cing // mya ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byos te/ lam togs bya ba'i phyir ni sbyar
27b8: bar gyis/ / gti mug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang // shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis// bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi dra ba rnams// ye shes rdo rje yis ni rnam par khrol// shin tu mang por sku

28a1: btsa dgas te/ / dan dang yang dag ldan pa 'chas de'o// byad cag gnas par byas par ma gyur na// da la mas kyis lan pa ma yin no// gang mangs ni byang chubatha' gyur te// 'tsham da 'grab
28a2: chomachar 'bebs pa'i tshe/ / rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa khyod// chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shog shig// / chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// // dge slong dag de
28a3: ljang byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas/ bzod par byas nas/
28a4: lha'i song gra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o// kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang /
28a5: snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun par bya ba bzhi la 'gron du bos la/ grogs po dag de kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni
28a6: bos byas pa sa shes shing rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag du zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'jus te/ 'di skad ces 'dor to// skyes bu dam pa khyod pa
28a7: bzhugs na dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di khyed la chos ston par 'gyu ro zhes
28a8: de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi mgo// las thong dang cod pan phog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang

28b1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang byabar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam par dbang bskur nas//
28b2: yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bos dza lta bu'i gzugs kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya/ de la kha cig na bram ze'i khye'u yi gzugs bu gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro//
28b3: la la ne brgya byin gyi gzugs su/ la la na re tshangs pa'i gzugs bu// la la na re rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na de rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su/ la la ner sgra gcan gyi gzugs su/ la la na
28b4: re dri za'i gzugs su/ la la na ro ma'am ci'i gzugs su/ la la na re lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/ la la nar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re zla
28b5: pa'i gzugs su/ la la na nyi ma'i gzugs su/ la la nar nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro// de nas rangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa zhes bya ba sngon
28b6: grong las shi 'phos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig/ 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi rig byed kyi bstan
28b7: bcos las ji skad 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa'i rigs so/ / de'ang ci 'dra zhe na/ glang po dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa// ma mjug can
28b8: rtabs g.yogs/ / mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin du mdzes// 'gram nas zag cing gzugs ldan dpal ldan pa'o// rig byed bstan bcom yang dag mkhas pa yi/ bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes

29a1: nga na / na ga na / shA sa gag /
29a2: gsangam pa na gnas bzhin du rgyal po bas ga ma gyis sa pa de snga bas / 6 gshas/ 8/ !/ 9 na dang / grong ma dang / ma dang / pa
29a3: mo med cing/ dri ma med la chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas shing chung rdul can dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / sngang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / spang bu dang / bye ma leb dang / sdug
29a4: sbrul med cing me tog gis kun du gang ba lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par 'gyur te/ / 'di ni snga ltas byung ba dang po'o// ri'i rgyal po gangs ril bya mdab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khra thag
29a5: dang / dang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la ping ka dang // da shar te'u la sogs pa sgro gshog sna tshogs mdzes pa yid du 'ong zhing sbran pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa
29a6: de dgader 'ongs nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang / ba ga ma dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs kyi
29a7: steng dag tu gnas shing dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin te// 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga' rab nyams
29a8: dga' ba dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag na me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ldan pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me tog

29b1: byas par gyur te/ 'di na snga smras byung ba gsum pal// rgyal ba zas gtsang ma 'gyul langs spyad tu rgyan rdzang lasags pa gang dag yod par dag thams cad kyang pad ma 'dabam bya ba khrag khrig brgyas dang ba nga//
29b2: ldan pa tshang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam paden mar dang / 'brumar dang / spang ci dang / dra gyi dbu ba dang / sha khar losos
29b3: ba bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang yongs su spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba lnga pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa dang / btsun mo
29b4: 'khor chen po dag na rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / babang dang / gling bu dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba'i sel khrol dang / beg la sogs pa rol mo'i cha smad gang dag yod pa de dag pas/
29b5: cad kyang ma blangs ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog par gyur te/ 'di na sngags byung ba drug pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa na/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / me tig dang / bai dUr+ya da/
29b6: drang dang / ma dgel dang / bye dra la sags par na bcag chags kyi sto gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang pa bye zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag ci rab tu gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bdun pal//
29b7: nye za'i 'od zil du dag par byed cing / lus dang sems dga' ba bskyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba brgyad pa'o//
29b8: 'phags pa cha cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gsum pa// / lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas/ lus byug pas thugs/ rgyan sa tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/

30a1: gos shin du 'jam pa mchog bgos shing btsun spu dang bcas la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa thob nas/ bung med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig
30a2: tu rgyal po zas gtsangs rol mo bya ba'i khang bzangs na bde bar gnas pa'i drung du byin te/ g.yas rol na khri bzang por rini po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i sa la 'dug nas/ 'dum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing rab tu
30a3: pa'i mdog gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / rgyal pos bdag legs par bdag las gsan du gsol// rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnong shig/ bdag gi
30a4: bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba/ / de dag bdag lagasan cing thugs dgyes rangs par mdzod// lha bdag nyer gnas tshul khrims btul zhugs len par gsol// bdag ni 'gro la byams pas
30a5: yan lag brgyad len te/ / srog chags gnod pa spangs shing bsam pa rtag dag pas// ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi// rku sems rnam par spangs te 'dod dang dregs pa spang // rgyal po
30a6: 'dod pa rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid/ / bden la gnas shing phra ma ma mchis zhe gcod spa/ mi dge kyal ba'i tshig kyang yongs su mi spyod do// gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba gti mug rgyags pa dang /
30a7: brnab sems kun spang rang gi nor gyis 'tshal bar bgyi// yang dag sbyor bas khabasag tshul 'chos phrag dog spong// dge bcu'i las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi// bdag
30a8: ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dgal rab bsdams kyis/ / mi yi dbang po bdag la bzhed pas sred ma mdzad// rgyal po khyod la yun ring mi dger gyur du mchi// bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer

30b1: gnas dgyes par mdzod/ rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags de myur stsoso// khang bzangs bsil khang ldan pa dang mya ldan pa'i nang// me tog bkral pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri gda' ba ba/ grogs mas
30b2: rtag tu bskor cing bde dgar gnas snyam bgyid/ / skyes banyung dum rnams dang de bzhin khye'u dag dang // bud med pal ba rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal// snyan cing yid 'chi sgra sa nanyan pas gtogs
30b3: pa pa/ gzugs dang sgra bsung yid du mi mchi bdag mi 'tshal// bcings dang btson rar stsal ba thams cad dgye par gsol// nor gyis brel ba'i mi rnams nor dang ldan par mdzod// zas skom rang ba shing
30b4: khyogs dang bzhon pa rta/ / 'gro la bde ba'i slad du dgung bdun stsal pa mdzod// pho brang 'di na skyes pa khye'u dang bud med dag/ ji snyed mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral zhing // phan tshun byams pa'i yid
30b5: ldan par dang nges sems kyis/ / dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar 'thun zhing bde spyod mdzod// rgyal po'i chad pa che phra gnyer gyis bda' ba dang // gnod pa bgyid dang rdeg btsog sdig ru mi mdzad par// kun
30b6: la'ang dad pa'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs te/ / lha yis skye bo rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs// rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar 'gyur nas// smras pa khyod ni ci 'dod de kun
30b7: de bzhin bya/ / khyod kyi bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsams shing // khyod kyis mchog grangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no// rgyal po'i dam pas rang gi 'khor la bsgrub ni// khang bzangs dam pa'i
30b8: steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms/ / me tog mdzes pa khrom la bdug spos mchog gis bdugs// gdugs dang bdon ta la'i phreng ba'i rgyan kyang gyis// 'thab pod stong phrag nyi shu sna tshogs go

31a1: can/ / mda' ma dung chags sa mdung thang ral gra thags pa da// yad 'od sa ldan dang rgya ldan pa pas nas// l+h+was 'dags pa sa pab+ta b+hI bung sha gnas// zlas byas gos ldan na/
31a2: mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan// bud med rnams kyis de bskor lta yi bu mo 'dra// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan sil snyan stong blangs te// lha mo der zhugs lha yis bu mo bzhin du gnas// lha yis rin chen
31a3: rin thang chen pos rtse spras pa/ / khri la gos mchog mang pos yid 'od mal bshams te// mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin chen klong byas nas// 'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/
31a4: dge slong dag de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon
31a5: dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / mdun na 'don tshangs mchog dang / mdun na 'don tshangs bzang dang / 'od bkod pa dang / 'od gsal dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mthar thug
31a6: dang / 'og min pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/ gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med
31a7: par gshegs su gsol na/ bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/ bdag cag la mitshas/ grogs po dag khyed kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /
31a8: lums na bzhugs pa dang / bsnyam pa dang / zor bu dang / byas pa'i nang na rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / rol mo gzigs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba skyed pa dang / byang chub

31b1: snang ba / shegs pa dang / bdu 'as pa dang / byang bas rdzogs par yang rgya ba dang / sa kyil ma nga/ n+ya las 'das pa na btsun bang drug sa /
31b2: dang / phongs pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems kyis rtag par rgyun du byang chub sems dpa'i rnas kyi nas khod par su dag spro// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'adi dag kyang smras so// khyed
31b3: las su ga rtag tu dga' yid kyis/ gzugs mchog mngang ba'i zham 'bring byed par spro// su dag rang gi bsod nams gzi brjid dang / stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod/ gang shig lha yaM bzung /
31b4: 'di dag na/ lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi// lha yi de bas dga' bar 'dod padag/ dri med zla ba'i zhal gyi zham thing kyis// de bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog/ lha yi 'byung gnas b+ha yi po/
31b5: brang na// gser mdog me tog rgyas par dga' 'dod na// dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i zham bri kyis// gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du// dga' tshal me tog man dAr mdab rgyas su// lha mo lhan cig tsa
31b6: 'dod pa dag/ skyes bu chen po 'di yi nam bring gyis// 'thab bral bdag po 'am dga' ldan bdag po'am// yang na dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang // 'gro ba kun gyi mchod ngos 'dod pa dag/ grags pa
31b7: mtha' yas bde yi zham bring gyis/ / gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa mdzes pa dang // dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod cing // yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa// yon tan mchog mnga' 'di yi zham
31b8: bri gyis/ / bdud gyi dbang po zhe sdang yid med pa// rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar phyin pa'o// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar byin 'dod na// phan pa mdzad pa 'di dang lhan cig dang // de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams

32a1: las 'da' byas te/ / tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par ma 'dod pa// de ni tshad med pa ni yi gzimanga' ba// skyes pa chen po'i nas thaMng deng nas kyis// 'od tang gAng zhig mi yi nang dag sa/
32a2: los sgyur yul yangs par skye 'dod na// rin chen 'byung gnas mi 'jigs bden sbyin pa// bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'i nam thing kyis// gang zhigs bdag de bzhin tshong dpon pa// blag cing snyid la
32a3: nor mang tshogs chen dang / / dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa// de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig deng // gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang // snyan pa grags dang / spobs dang /
32a4: yon tan dang / gzung 'os tshig dang mnyan pa'i tshig 'dod pa// de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du song // lha dang mi yi 'dod pa gang yin dang // srid pa gsum gyi bde ba thams cad dang // bsam gtan
32a5: bde dang dben pa'i bde 'dod pa/ / de ni chos kyi dbang phyug zham bring gyis// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang spang ba dang // nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod cing // zhi ba rab zhi nyer zhi yid ldan pa// de ni thugs
32a6: dul zham 'brid myur du song / / gang zhig slob dang mi slob rang rgyal dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod cing // stobs bcus seng ge'i sgra sgrogs su 'dod pa// de ni yon tan rgya mtsho mkhas drung
32a7: song / / gang zhig ngan song rnams kyi lam gcod cing // bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang // yan lag brgyad lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod na// 'grol ma mthar 'byin 'di yi zham brid gyis// gang zhig bde gshes
32a8: yongs su mchod pa dang / / thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang // dge 'dun yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni// yon tan rgya mtsho 'di yi zham zing kyis// skyen na 'chi'i sdug bsngal zad pa dang // 'khor ba'i

32b1: bcings pa rnam par dgrol ba dang / / nam mkha'i mnga' mnyam rnam dag spyod 'dod pa// de ni sems can dag pa'i zham bring gyis// 'gro ba kun na yid 'ong sdug mdzes shing // gzugs mchog mtshan dang /
32b2: yon tan rgyas pa dang // bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang 'brel 'dod pa// de ni blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan du song // tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang // zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka
32b3: ba yi/ / nam grol thob 'dod mkhas pa gang yin de// sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du myur du song// yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang rnam mang dang // srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das// yon tan thams cad
32b4: rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa/ / de ni brtul zhugs grub mkhas gan du song // tshig de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang / 'thab bral gyi lha
32b5: 'bum dang / dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang / 'phrul dga'i lha 'bum dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis byung ba drug khri dang / tshangs ris kyi lha drug khri brgya stong dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha
32b6: stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang / gzhan yang shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu
32b7: ba'i lha'i budag gis lnga'i 'khor chen po de dgal tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgasus so/ / bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa yang dag ci 'dra yi// tshig 'di sa yi bang podag gis gsan du gsol// 'ad/
32b8: 'i dga' 'byong bas pa gtan bdeb mchog spangs te// sems can dge ba dam pa 'di yi nam tha ba gyi// lhums su gshegs dang skams na bzhugs dang bsnam pa'i// bdag nyid chen po mchod pa

33a1: pa dag ga ma mas mas/ / [ ]/ mam ldanams mag
33a2: sgra legs bsgrags pa/ / yon tan tu mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de// gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par// lha dang mi rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang me
33a3: tog sil mas rgyas par dgang / / a ga ru mchog nag pos bdugs te dri zhim bgyi// de yi dri tshor lha mi rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing // nad med rims nad bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar gyi// me tog man dA ra dang kun
33a4: nas 'du ba dang / / sim byed rab tu sim byed sbrul rnam snang dang // me tog bzang pos phrin las dge las byung ba de// mchod pa'i slad du ser skya'i grong kun dgong bar bgyi// ji srid yum gyi lhums na
33a5: dri gsum ma gos bzhugs/ / ji srid rga shi mthar 'byin bltam par gyur gyi bar// de srid dus su dang ba'i yid kyis zham bring bgyi// blo gros che mnga' mchod par bgyi bar bdag cag sems//
33a6: bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis// lag tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba// sems can rnam par dag pa de ni mthong ba yi// lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen
33a7: legs par thob/ / ji srid par du 'jig rten rjes su 'thun mdzad cing // 'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms mdzad btsun mo'i nad bzhugs la// ji srid gcig na rgyal srid kun spangs 'ab nas 'byung // de srid
33a8: dus su dang pa'i sems kyis zham phrang brtsi/ / ji srid gcig na rin bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs// ji srid gcig na bdud bcom byang chub reg gyur cing // tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar

33b1: gsol btab pa/ / de srid bde bar gshegs la mchod pa rgya chen bgyi// sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med brtul gyur ta// stong gsum 'dir ni sangs rgyas phrin las nam lags nas// ni zhing bsim
33b2: ba'i mya ngan 'das par gshegs gyur pa/ / de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen btang mi bgyi// dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs
33b3: phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ / sems can dag pa mchog dam pa 'di lta bu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ me tog
33b4: dang / spom dang phreng ba dang / byug pa mchog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis rlabs pa de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i
33b5: po brang de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po dam pa bskyed mos tshal brgya stong gis brgyan pa// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog khang bzang ba chen po dang s+ye ldan zhes bya ba d+ha'i dbang
33b6: bo'i bo zar lta bu der byin nas/ lha'i bu mo gos lkug lcag po gyon pa/ dge ba dri ma med pa'i bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa// lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa shin tu brgyan pa de dag gis lharma
33b7: sgra baphrul ma la mchog gi stengad na 'dug pa mthong nas/ phan tshun 'dzub mos ston cing // nam ma'i dkyil na 'dzad de// gcig la gcig tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rtswa gnas 'tshad pa'i oM
33b8: marnams/ / yid 'od byang chub sems dpa'i mu mthong nas// de tshe de dag 'di snyam sems gyur te// byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyur ci 'dra snyam// lag na me tog phred can de dag rnams// bcom skyes

34a1: nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ / me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su// sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lhags// lcug lcug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul
34a2: mal steng gnas mthong nas/ / lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mos phyag byas te// mi yi bud med gzugs la legs ltos 'dzer// bdag cag nga rgyal sems kyis mngon sems pa// lha yi bu mo gzugs
34a3: mchog yid 'ong snyam/ / rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mthong na// lha yi lus kyang zil gyis non par mthong // 'di ni gang zag mchog gi yum 'gyur du// yon tan ldan pas shin tu gsha' zhing 'os//
34a4: nor bu rin chen snod bzang gnas pa ltar// lha mo 'di ni lha yi lha snod yin// rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man cad du// yan lag yid 'ong lha las lhag pa ste// mig gis blta na ngoms par 'gyur ma yin//
34a5: yid dang sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi kha bzhin lus mdzes sdug pa ni// nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra// nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'di yi lus las 'od gsal
34a6: bzang po 'byung / / gser skam bcom bzang po'i gser bzhin du// mA mo 'di yi kha dog rnam par mdzes// 'di yi sgra ni 'jam gtsang dri zhim ste// bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra lcang lor 'khril// 'di yi
34a7: mig ni pad ma'i mdab ma 'dra/ / rnam dag so ni nam mkha'i skar ma bzhin// rked pa gzhu ltar phra zhing sta zur yangs// phrag pa zlum zhing tshigs rnams mngon pa med// brla legs glang po mchog gi rtswa 'dra
34a8: ste/ / byin pa shin du legs pa byin gyis phra// rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba ste// 'di ni gzhan min lha yi bu mor des// de ltar rnam mang du mar blta byas nas// me tog gtor te bskor ba byas

34b1: nas ni/ / zags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstod byas te// skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lta gnas dang // de nas phyogs bzhi sbyang ba bzhi pa dang // 'thab bral rab dang brgya byin 'phrul pa dang // ma tshogs bya/
34b2: mini grul bram srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang sgo byi ches smras pa// skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed deng la// skyes bu dam pa del bsrung bgyis// 'gro ba dag la yid kyis sngang sa byed// mi rnams la yang
34b3: gtse ba ma byed cig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa// der ni 'thun par 'khor dang lhan cig kun// mda' gzhural gri mdung thung mtshon thogs la// nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te bas par
34b4: gyis/ / de ltar shrI 'pho'i dus shes lha'i bu rnams// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni// sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dung byos la// dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dang // smra ba'i seng ge dus
34b5: ni dadeng lags kyis/ / 'jig rten kun la thugs rje ba rtse bskyed de// mi dbang sems can dag pa 'tsho 'azo ste no// mchod cing don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems
34b6: dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/
34b7: / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag
34b8: byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi sil/

35a1: snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der lhags// de bzhin du sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang /
35a2: dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod
35a3: pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad kyis yang dag par byung ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams
35a4: kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor bcing mdun du bdar nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsam mo//
35a5: dge slong dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la tha gru che ba 'dir sngon cad ma byung ba
35a6: 'od snang ba lta'i 'ad las shin tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi bar gang sdig pa sdig pas khebs nas mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa snang ba med pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis
35a7: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang 'od dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid kyis lam mer ma gyur/ thal ler ma gyur/ lhang der ma gyur pa der sems can gang dag skyes
35a8: ba de dag rang rang gi lag pa brgyad pa'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu'ang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas pa khyab par gyur cing / der skyes pa'i sems can de dag snang ba des khyab par gyur nas gcig gis gcig mthong ni

35b1: gcagags gag gas te/ 'di ska na grags pa dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'di skyes sa// chags pa dag sams can gzhan dag cang 'du smras sa zhes pa ba thar pa dag kya 'ad mas pa/
35b2: skye'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bcwa brgyad du g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/
35b3: ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur ro// chem chem rab tu che mchem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo//
35b4: mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bor gyur to// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to// lho phyogs dma'
35b5: na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to/ / byang phyogs dmar na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to// de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba/ tshim par 'gyur ba/ mgu bar 'gyur ba/ dang bar 'gyur ba/ sim par 'gyur ba/ mnyan par
35b6: 'os pa/ bsngags par 'os pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mnyan na gtad mi za ba/ mi mthun pa med pa/ sdang bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grag par gyur to// skad cig de la sems can gang la yang gnod pa 'am/
35b7: 'jigs pa'am/ sdang ba 'am/ bag non pa med par gyur to// skad cig de la nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
35b8: skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod

36a1: par mi 'gyur/ zhe sdang gis gnod par mi 'gyur/ gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / phrag dog gam/ ser sna'am/ dargyal lam/ 'chab pa 'am/ rgyags pa'am/ khro ba 'am/ gnod sems
36a2: sam/ yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la/ phan tshun pa ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i
36a3: sems dang ldan par gyur to/ / lha dang mi'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang phrag
36a4: ba dang spyi bos gzhal med khang chen po de 'deg cing khyer bar 'gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te/ mdun dang / rgya ba dang / g.yas g.yon dag nas byang chub sems dpal
36a5: la gru dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ / khyod kyis sngon chad dge las bsags pa dang / yun ring dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang // khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyi tshul sbyangs pas// de ring mchod pa rgya chen
36a6: byung bar gyur/ / bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pas na// lha yi me tog char du bab pa 'di// sbyin pa spyad pa de yi 'bras bu lags// gtso bo khyod kyis rang gi sha bcad
36a7: daM/ / srang la gcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang // sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// yi dgas 'jig rten rnams kyang zas bsgom thob// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// tshul khrims ma zhig ma nyams/
36a8: bsrungs pas na// tshul khrims de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// mi khom ngan song yongs su dag par gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhing ni bzod pa bsgoms// bzod pa de spyad

36b1: pa yi 'bras bu des/ / lha dang mi kun byams pa'i sems su gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// brtson 'grus mgong dam pa bsgoms pas na// brtson 'grus de spyad pa yi 'bras bungs/ kun rdza/
36b2: rab bzhin du mdzes par grub// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// nyon mongs smrang spang bsam gtan bsgom mdzad pas// bsam gtan de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// 'gro ba dag la nyon mongs
36b3: gnod mi 'gyur/ / bskul pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgom mdzad pas// shes rab de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ 'od gsal dam pa rnam par snang zhing mdzes//
36b4: byams pa'i gom napas nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing / sems can kun lathugs rje ches byung ba// dgyes pa mchog brnyes btang snyoms mchog ldan pa// bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
36b5: shes rab sgron ma'i 'od dang gzis 'phags shing // gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba// 'dren pa stong gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i// thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnga 'phrul rkang pa
36b6: mngon shes mchog la mkhas/ / bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa// rgal nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa// bde gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs dang
36b7: mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas/ / 'chi po 'chi 'pho med pa'i 'pho ba ston// 'jig rten chos kyi rjes su 'thun mdzad kyang // 'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mnga'// gang dag khyod ni nyan
36b8: ma ltar lhags pa/ de dag thob pa dam pa pas ma mi byag/ khyod la chos nyid thos te gdad cing // dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smras ci 'tshal/ dgang nagan mas kun ni mog mo gagyug/ 'dzam bu'i gling

37a1: dunyi ma mngon drug pa/ thog chags bye ba khrag khrig bas ma mi khyab can mongs gnyid kyis log las sa dpang mdzad// dani bzong 'byang ba byas gyur la// bye ba khrag theg sta rnams la ba na
37a2: skye thumam sa na ma gyu pas/ rgyal tshal yan sa ma stan zag par 'gyu ga gi las dge ba// brad med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa// da yi sras byung de ni de ltar 'byed// dpal gyis
37a3: 'jig rten gsum ni zil gyis gnan/ / me mchog 'byung ba de yi gze brjid kyis/ dpyir byin chad po thang dam pa 'dir// lus can rnams la 'dod sdang 'thab tsud med// kun kyang byams pa'i sems kyis sring
37a4: zhur bcas/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal byung bas na// rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur// ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs// rin chen mdzad kyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin
37a5: srin po hrul bum gsang ba pa/ / lha dang lha ma ni tshogs rnams dbang por bcas// mi mchog srung ba gang dag gnas pa rnams// de dag rang por mi thogs thar pa 'thob// gus dang sre'u la ni gnas nas su/ 'dunas
37a6: khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa/ kun kyang byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo// mi yi dam pa khyod ltar myur du shog/ bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar dgun 'das
37a7: dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha chungs kyi tshe/ / skar ma sa ga la bab pa dus kyi dam pa la shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas grang dro dang / mun pa dang / rdul med cing sa'i gzhi sngo gzhon nu skyes pas
37a8: khebs par gnas pa'i tshe/ skar 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyis mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshod la rnam par gzigs nas/ tshes bcwa lnga'i zla ba nya la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su// yum gso sbyong blangs

37b1: ba'i dum du/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du/ glang po'i thug gu thal kar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/ mgo'i kha dog srin bu lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog lta bu/
37b2: mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ dbang po nyams pa med par byas te/ ma'i glo g.yas pa nas zhugs so// zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas pa logs su brten te gnas kyi/
37b3: glo g.yon pa logs sunam yang ma brten to// lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma la bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ngo // glang po khab dngul mdog mche ba drug/ gang lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug pa/
37b4: 'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa// glang po mchog gcig khong du song snyam byed// des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgyal mna'ang // ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te// lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder
37b5: gyur nas/ / bsam gtan mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos lcug lhug por gyon cing // thogs pa las lus dang sems bde bar gyur te// dga' ba dang / rangs pa
37b6: dang / nyams bde ba thob nas// mal dam pa de las langs te bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas khang bzangs de'i steng nas babs te/ shing mya ngan 'chang gi nags tshal ga la ba der
37b7: song nas/ / de mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung ngu pho nya btang nas// rgyal po gshegs su gsol// lha mo khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do zhes byas pa dang /
37b8: rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas/ rab tu dga' bar gyur te// lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / 'khor dang / gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis yongs su bskor cing

38a1: mdun ba da de pa mya ngan 'chang gi nags tshal gal ba dang song ngo / / sang nas kyang bdag gi lus shin du khri bsnyam byed nas// mya ngan 'chang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/ demya /
38a2: gi gnags tshal gyi sgor 'dug nas/ chung zad cig bsams te/ de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di smras so// bdag ni g.yul du dpa' ba'i phul phyin pa// deng ltar lus kyi bdag gis myong mi dran// bdag gi/
38a3: khyim du bar 'gro bar deng ma nus// kye ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag nam mkha'i dkyil na 'bod nas lus byed mngon par sprul te// rgyal ba zas gtsang ma la tshigs su ya
38a4: desmras pa/ / dka' thub brtul zhugs yon tan ldan pa 'jig rten gsum na mchod// byams dang snying rje thob pas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas na/
38a5: 'phos gyur te// rgyal po khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du zhugs// de tshe rang gi mgo gcogs sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te// rgyal po rim gro bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs/
38a6: nga rgyal dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul dor bltas te// ngas ni khyod la ci bya ci sbyar khyod kyis nga la spro// lha mos smras pa// Sha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste/ rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes
38a7: mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid/ / glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba// bdag gi rum du zhugs kyis de'i lo rgyus gsan par gsol// stong gsum khams 'di mdzes par rab rib
38a8: ma mchis bdag gis mthog/ bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod// 'on kyang bdag la khro zhing 'chig dang zho sdang rmongs ma mchis// zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan

38b1: bde dang ldan snyam bgyid/ / bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dge 'amadod 'am ci// bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa// rig byed rmi lam gzhung la mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan
38b2: rgyal po myur du bram ze 'dir ni legs par dgug tu gsol/ / de skad tshig thos de yi dus kyi skad cig la// bram ze rig byed bstan bcos gzhung la shin tu mkhas pa gnyer// sgyu 'phrul bram ze rnams kyi
38b3: mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras/ / kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyus gson// bram ze rnams kyis smras pa// lha mo bka' stsal du bsol/ khyod kyis rmi lam ci 'dra ba zhig gzigs thos
38b4: nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o/ / lha mos smras pa// kha ba dbul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste// rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang po dam pa rdo rje bzhin
38b5: du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/ / bdag gi rum du zhugs na de yi lo rgyus mnyan par gyis// de skad tshig thos nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras// rigs la dor ba ma mchis dgyes pa rgya chen
38b6: brnyes par gyur/ / khyod la sras mda' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i rigs su rigs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba che ba nyid// gal te 'dod pa dag dang rgyal srid pho brang spangs gyur te//
38b7: 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung gyur na// de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// bdud rtsi mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tsha mi mdzad 'gyur// de skad
38b8: tshig snyan lung bstan te/ / rgyal po'i pho brang zan zos nas// bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su// bram ze de dag phyir dong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang ltas shes shing

39a1: rnam par 'byed pa dang / malam gyi gzung shes pa dag las de skad kyi chag thos nas/ chom zhing mthas/ yid rangs pa/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yad ba bsdus nas/ zam /
39a2: dag bza' ba dang btung ba dang / myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim zhing ngoms par byas nas/ bya dga' byin te bkye'o// de nyid kyi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhin/
39a3: grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad sbyin pa byin te// ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa nas
39a4: la ni gos/ / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/ gnas
39a5: 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshe ba byin no// dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te// lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug na bde zhing nyon mongs
39a6: pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so// lha thugs las su ma mdzad par btang snyoms su bde
39a7: bar bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ba sham mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so// skyong ba'i gzhal med khang
39a8: rnams ngan/ / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa yi bzang // byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni// rnam par rgyal tsam bdag gis dbul// de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces/

39b1: smras so// tha ba'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas/ brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur// 'thab thal rab kyi dpal ldan khang // rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du
39b2: 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ / grags pa che mnga' sngon chad ni// dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa/ pho brang dam pa dgyes pade/ rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po zas
39b3: gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang // de ni rin chen rang bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog don du// rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyi// de nas
39b4: lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa// gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa// bdag gi gzhal med khang
39b5: drung na/ 'od dang mdog kyang sbyor bar snang / de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen rang bzhin po brang bzang // de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis// lha yi me tog
39b6: rab bkang ste/ lha yi spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i// pho brang yangs pa bdag gis dbul/ der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis// dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sarba
39b7: dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang mi'i las ni 'das kyi lha yid ni ma gyur pa bshams par gyur
39b8: te/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngon par bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/

40a1: glo g.yas phyogs logs su dkyil mo krung bcas te gnas par gyur to// lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyang so so nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sebs dpa'i ma 'dug gi gzhan
40a2: ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ting 'dzin bkod pa che la gnas gyur te// sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul byas nas// lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par/
40a3: byas// rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam pa grub// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bukha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal chen ba'i'i ris kyi lci gang yin pa de dag kyang mi'i lus kyi dri bro skye zhing 'byol na/
40a4: de ma yin pa'i lha gzhan sum bcu rtsags ma'am/ 'thab bral lam// dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta spos kyang ci dgos na// ji lta byang chub sems dpa' gtsang zhing dri ba dang bral ba/ 'jig rten thams ca
40a5: las mngon par 'phags pa/ / sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums mi'i lus dri mi zhim par bzhugs par gyur snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang /
40a6: ldan pa kun dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bud med kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang / 'dod chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas/
40a7: gsungs pa ngo mtshar chen/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/ 'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi
40a8: lhums mi'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su brten te bzhug so zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rab tu'ang ngo mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smra bar ni bdag la spro ba ma

40b1: mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i yongs su spyad
40b2: par gyur pa mthong bar 'dod dam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i rus ne de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni da lags te// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de
40b3: bstan te mthong na glo ba dga'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad de// des mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i 'jig
40b4: rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/
40b5: bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa// tshangs pa khyod kyis sngon nga byang chub sems dpar
40b6: gyur cing ma'i rum na zla ba bcur 'dug 'dug pa'i byang chum sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa blangs sam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bka'
40b7: stsal pa/ tshangs pa bdeg la yod ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa
40b8: de 'dir khyod kyis ston cig dang / ji tsam du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kha bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su

41a1: spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de blang gis de'i bar du khyed 'khod cig/ de nas ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
41a2: snga nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to/ / de nas mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod song la tshangs pang
41a3: 'jig rten 'di man chad sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chad du sgra sgrogs te/ / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bkur na khyed kyi nang nas
41a4: mthong bar su dga' ba myur du shog shig/ ces smras go bar gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs
41a5: su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te/ / tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i steng du bzhag nas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du phab po// de'i tshe
41a6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur te/ / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de yang lha'i gos dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog/
41a7: dang / lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / lha'i longs spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgya mtsho
41a8: chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas rgyang ring po nas gdod thal mos bskyabs te mgo byo nas bltas kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i nang nas tshangs pa dag ni mthu che ba ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /

41b1: thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag kyang de dag gi drung na dma' ba yin na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
41b2: lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag zhi bar mdzad do/ / de ci'i byor zhe na/ de thos pa tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams myo myo por 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi
41b3: drung du lhags nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/ des de dag la smras pa// grogs po
41b4: dag kho bos kyang ji ltar bya/ / la ba nyid kyis kyang mthong bar mnus so// thogs po dag 'on kyang de ni nam bcom ldan 'das kyi sngang yul ba de'i tshe mthong grang ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ lha dbang po bsan
41b5: ci nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ / smras pa// grogs po dag lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ dga' bar bya ba'i tshig
41b6: rjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig/ de nas de dag phyogs cig tu 'khod de mgo byo nas bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
41b7: phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der phul lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad
41b8: pa rin po che bkod pa de ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ steng khang pa brtsegs pas legs par brgyan pa ste/ de'i tshad ni 'phang du 'di lta ste dper na byas pa bcas

42a1: nas zla ba drug len pa tsam ma/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du khri ba shams pa ni 'di lta ste dper na byis pa bcas nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
42a2: spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// lha rnams kyis de mthong na yang mig 'khrugs shing ngo
42a3: mtshar du 'gyur ro/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngang bzhag na lam me/ lhan ne/ lgang de ste/ dper na/ ma gar ba mkhas pas shin tu gzhu ste/ legs par sbyangs nas/ dri ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i gser bzhin du
42a4: khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khri ba shams pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dud mgrin ma gtogs pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyings
42a5: dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// tshangs pa chen pos gos bgos pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i khri de'i drung na mdzes par mi snang ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dang char gyis btab pa'i la ba nag po bzhin
42a6: no/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa ste/ de'i phye ma zho gcig la'ang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rini du mi chog go/ khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pa de lta bus
42a7: kun nas bskor ba ste/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de nga sa pagacig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de'i nang nam chags ma reg par 'dug go// khang pa brtsegs pa de khon dang 'dra ba gsum pa cig kyang khang pa brtsa
42a8: pa gnyis pa de'i nang nam reg ma chags par 'dug ga/ spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa de'i nang du khri de bzhag ste gdan gting ngo // tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de'i kha dog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ dper na

42b1: sngon tha rags dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin na/ / sras kyi khang pa bcags pa da' 'khar nam tog lta las 'das pa gang ji skyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma bskyed par byang chub sems dpa' /
42b2: kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas 'ang ba'i rtsegs pa der bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni de rje'i rang bzhin te/ sa shing brtan la mi shigs pa ste/ gtsa yin da'i gos
42b3: ltar reg na bde ba'o/ / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin pa che bkod pa der kun du snang ngo // gang gi nub mo byad
42b4: rlab sems dpa' ma'i rnam du 'jug pa de yi nub ma 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ sa chen po'i rngams dpag mang 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brkyad pa tol te pad ma byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar
42b5: du mngon par 'phags so/ / pad ma de ni kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu'i dam pa dang / tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stong la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi gzhan sus kyang mthong ba med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
42b6: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na snying khu dang / snying po dang / bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pad ma chen po de la zil dngar gyi thigs par chags te/ 'dug nas de tshangs pa chen pos bai dUr+ya'i snod bzang pos
42b7: blangs shing byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpa'as kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to/ / snying khu'i thigs pa de 'thungs na byang chub sems dpa'
42b8: srid pa tha ma pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar zhu bar nus pa sems can gyi khams na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do/ / las gang

43a1: gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thig pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas sngon yun ring por byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// sems can nad pa
43a2: dag la sman byin pa dang / sems can bsam pa la rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskad pa dang / skyabs su 'ongs pa rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang / rtag par me tog gi phung dang / 'bras bu'i phud dang
43a3: ra'i phung de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / pha dang ma la phul zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyodas/
43a4: las de'i rnam par smin pas tshangs pa chen po zil dang byi thigs pa de byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul lo// khang pa brtsegs pa der gnas kyi khyad par dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / phreng ba brgyus pa dang ldan pa
43a5: 'phags pa 'phags pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas der byung bar snang ngo / / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa
43a6: der gos stong phrag brgya'i rgyan ces bya ba phrugs gcig byung ste/ de'i de byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do// gzugs dang /
43a7: sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de na med pa gang yang med do// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg/
43a8: pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bzhi pa/ yongs su spyad par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin du grub pa/ 'di ltar shin du yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ yul ka ling sa/

43b1: nas byung ba'i dang ltar reg na bde ba'o// de yang 'al byar bstan par zad / de la dpe med do// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di ni bsams pas 'grub ste/ gdon mi za bar byang chub sems
43b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang / mngon par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te// chos kyi 'khor lo skar ba dang / ma gang gi
43b3: nga skye bar 'gyur ba de'i dum g.yas par khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa sngar mngon par 'grub cing / phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan nas 'phos te khang pa brtsegs pa der skyil dkrung
43b4: bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma'i lus nur nur bo dang / mer mer pa dang / lngar lngar po dang / deng reng bar 'gyur ba med cing / yan lag dang / nyid lag dang / mtshan thams
43b5: cad phun sum tshogs par 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/ / / mo sgyu 'phrul gyi ma lam du glang po chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'di ni chos nyid do// de de ltar 'dug pa la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po
43b6: chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gang las lag na rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs gsang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dum du zhugs par shes nas
43b7: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya bzhin 'brang bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed po'i lha mo bzhi yod do// A khu laM zhes bya ba dang / mu khra laM zhes bya ba dang / rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /
43b8: 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig

44a1: byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i ram du zhugs pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bar
44a2: gyur te/ dper na mtshan mo mun pa shin du gnag pa'i nad na ri'i sbol me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa ni dpag tshad gcig nas kyang snang ngo // dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sem
44a3: dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa yang de lta bur gyur te/ 'od gsal zhing gzugs bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug par gyur pa de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du skyel mo dkrung ngu/
44a4: 'dug na gser gyi sa le sbram rigs dang ldan pa rin po che bai dUr+ya sa brgyan pa ltar shin du mdzes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// 'di
44a5: lta ste dper na sprin gyi tshogs chen po'i nang nas glog byung ba ni snang ba chen po bskyed do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa yang dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis rin po che'i khang
44a6: pa brtsegs pa dang po de snang bar byed do/ / snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byed do// spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas/ spos kyi khang pa brtsegs
44a7: pa gsum pa snang bar byed do/ / spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas ma'i lus thams cad snang bar byed do// de snang bar byas nas de stan gang la 'dug pa de snang bar byed do// de snang bar
44a8: byas nas khyim thams cad snang bar byed do/ / khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste/ shar phyogs snang bar byed do// de bzhin du lto phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / 'og

44b1: dang / s+yAng dang phyogs bcu kun tu rlung grags tsam daphyogs rang yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rus na 'dug pa'i dpal dang gzabarje dang kha dag gis snang bar byas par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang/
44b2: chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin lnga brgya tsam dag dang
44b3: lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 'ongs te/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste 'dzub mo bsgreng nas stan ston to// 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa de dag
44b4: kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin du/ skyes zin pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bar lag paskyod cing 'deg la/ rnam par spyod cing bzhog pa
44b5: mthong nas/ de dag dga' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob ste// byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'as kyang de dag de ltar 'khod pa mthong nas// chos kyi gtam gyis yang
44b6: dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzed bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gang gi tshe de dag 'dod par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa' sa de dag gi sems
44b7: sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston to// de ltar lag pa brkyang ste/ 'dod pa'i brda bstan nas// phyir bskum par byed de// ma la gnod pa med do// de'i
44b8: rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dod par gnad do snyam sems shing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum

45a1: bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nub mo mi nyal nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing brkyang nas kyang bskum pa dang / bskums nas kyang dran zhing shes bzhin du
45a2: lag pa de 'jog pa'i rgyun de yin no/ / chen ni de yin no// gzhan yang gang gi tshe skyes pa'am/ zad med dag/ khye'u'am/ bram sra yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' banya ba'i phyir 'ongs pa de'i gzugs
45a3: ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba smra'o/ / de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma smra'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sngar dga' bar bya ba smra ba la mkhas
45a4: par gyur te/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa su yang rung / byang chub sems dpa' la sngon du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar
45a5: dga' bar bya ba smra zhing de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o/ / de nas snga dro'i dus zad de/ nyi ma gung la bab nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par
45a6: baphags pa mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ gser gyi
45a7: mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing 'dzub mo bskyang ste/ stan ston to// dge slong dag de'i tshe'ang lha'i dang
45a8: po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la byar bzlog ma nus nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub

45b1: sems dpa' sa de ltar 'khod par rig nas chas kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzang bstod// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// byang chub sems dpas lag
45b2: pa gang du bskyang ba de lags su byang chub sems dpa'i ma yang lta bar gyur to/ / des na lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo// de dag re shing yang 'di
45b3: bya / pa ga lda gas pa da ba na dang / n+dug / de dag ga thams
45b4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa da lta bu ni gzhan dag na med do/ / dge slong dag gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / ra ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan
45b5: dag 'dod par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston to// brda bstan nas phyir
45b6: bskum pa byas te/ / dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa gzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub
45b7: sems dpas kyang dang bar gnang ngo / / snyam du sems shing / de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to// dge slong dag nyis byed
45b8: kyi dus 'das nas phyi dro'i dus la bab pa dang / mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dang te/ lha yul pa'i snying khu'i thigs pa de khyer nas byang chub sems dpa'

46a1: gal ba deng / byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'as mi mjed kyi ba sa
46a2: po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas te 'ongs par shes nas/ byang chub sems dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la
46a3: dga' bar bya ba smras te/ 'dzub mo brkyang nas stan ston to// dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' las bzlog par ma nus nas// ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mi
46a4: mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/
46a5: yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang lta bar gyur to// de ltar na lha de dag kyang bdag cag ni byang chub sam/
46a6: dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed do snyam ste/ lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' shig la smra ste/ bdag 'ba' shig la dga' ba'i gtam byed do snyam mo//
46a7: dge slong dag gang gi tshe// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 'dod par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su
46a8: shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston to// de ltar 'dod pa'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe

46b1: mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar snang ngo // snyam du sems shing de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i
46b2: mal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dod par 'gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' yang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog go/ dge slong dag shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
46b3: dang 'og dang / steng dang phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / chos yang dag
46b4: par rjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur te/ de dag da ltar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/ 'od kyi bkod pa de dag seng ge'i khrir sprul nas/ de ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems
46b5: dpa' de dag 'khod tu bcug ste/ de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du ris te brtags kyang skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams ma gtogs par gzhan sum
46b6: kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// dge slong dag lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang byang chub sems dang /
46b7: ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe// lus lci bar ma tshor te/ gzhan du na yang pa dang / 'jam pa dang / bde bar tshor zhing lto mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang yang myong bar ma gyur to// 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba
46b8: 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yongs su gdud par ma gyur// 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gtse ba'i

47a1: rnam par rtog pa dag la yang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/ grang ba 'am/ tsha ba 'am/ bkres pa 'am/ skom pa 'am/ mun pa 'am/ rdul lam/ ral ba tshor ba 'am/ mthong bar ma gyur te/ de la
47a2: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yid du mi 'ong bsnang bar mgyur to// rmilam ngan pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de la bud med kyi sgra 'am/ g.yo 'am/ phrag dog gam/ bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang
47a3: nyams su gnod par byed par ma gyur to/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur to// byang chub
47a4: sems dpa'i ma yang skyes pa gang la yang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar ma gyur la/ skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i ma la 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye'o// ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de dag/ yul
47a5: gzhan dag na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo su gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung pos non pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ma mthong ma thag
47a6: tu sos shing dran pa thob par gyur to/ / mi ma yin pa de dag kyang myur du gnas gzhan du 'dod par gyur to// sems can gang la la zhig nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / khad kan dang //
47a7: 'dus pa las byung ba'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang / mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ so'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ shu ba 'am/ 'bras sam/
47a8: mdze'am/ sha bkra 'am/ skam pa'am/ brjed byed dam/ rims sam/ lba ba 'am/ pol mig gam/ me dpal lam/ rkang shu la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mas/ lag pa

47b1: g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag btsam gyis nad dang bral bar gyur cing / / rang rang gi gnas su 'dong bar gyur to// zan lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis na nyags 'ga' zhig sa las blangs te/ sems can nad pa dag la byin yang du
47b2: ngag de blangs ma thag tu nad med cing nyams pa med par gyur to/ / gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag gi lto g.yas par bltas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de 'di lta ste dper na me long
47b3: gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin te/ de ltar de mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// dge slong dag byang
47b4: chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lta'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur to// char ni dus bzhin du 'bab//
47b5: rlung ni dus bzhin du lngag/ dus dang skar ma dag kyang rus bzhin du 'byung zhing 'pho bar gyur to// rgyal srid kyang bde zhing lo legs la 'khrug pa med cing dag med par gyur to// ser skya'i grong khyer chen po den
47b6: shAkya'i rigs dang / sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa thams cad kyang za zhing 'thung / dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod do// sbyin pa dag kyang gtong bsod nams dag kyang byed do// zla ba bzhi 'das pa'i dus
47b7: ston bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis rtse zhing bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par blangs te// rgyal po'i las btang nas
47b8: dka' thub kyi nags tshal yongs su dag pa na gnas pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang

48a1: ldan pas gnas par gyur to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa sngan/
48a2: byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dum na gnas pa'i tshe gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso// de bzhin gshegs pas tshe dang
48a3: ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / mi gzhan dag kyang bstan te mthong nas/ de dag tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dgang
48a4: ba dang / yid bde ba skyes so// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de phyir yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par bya ba'i phyir bteg ste khyer nas bzhag par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong /
48a5: ga'aphrul pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i druban 'dug pas lha dang mi khrag khrig zag sas bcurtsa drug theg pa gsum pa yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de la 'di ga sa
48a6: gang tsa d+hal sras sems can dam pa ma yin dupa gnas pa/ / de chos 'di ma la dang bcas par rnam padrug tug yos// gsar mdog 'od bkyer na mong thams cad rnam par sbyangs par gyur// chos kyi rgyal /
48a7: gyur shes m+b+ha ma gas rnamasar tu dag pa gnas med 'a na byibs legs pan na rgyas rnam par smras// da da ba rna pa tshad pa zums par byung smra // da nirnapam /
48a8: gas ga shi rnam par bangs// gang gsum rin can yangs bgad misang byed pan mag// stong ci 'jig rten lams kyang 'oganas partos pabyas nas ni// ya da 'byung ba gnas kyi

48b1: ma'i nying khu'i thigs pa byung / / de bzhin zhag bdun bsod nams gzi brjid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'phags// de las nyid khru'i thigs blangs tshangs pa rgyal ba'i sras la 'bul// byang chub sems dpa' dpa
48b2: bo tshangs pa 'dra ba ma gtogs par/ / sems can gang gis de zos 'jur 'gyur sems can ris na med// bskal pa ru ma'i bsod nams gzi brjid snying khu'i thigs gnas pa// de zos lus dang sems dang
48b3: shes pa rnam par dag par gyur/ / dren pa mchod phyi brgya byin mangs pa 'jig rten stong ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rtag par dus gsum rgyan du 'ong// phyag byas mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos
48b4: gyur nas/ / bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang nas 'ongs pa'i gnas su 'dod// 'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' 'ong // 'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan
48b5: chun snang / / mchog tu bya ba'i thag pa dam pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas// kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur bstod pa'i phreng ba brjod cing 'dod// bud med byis pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang /
48b6: 'byung pos non dang sems 'khrugs gos med rdul gyis yog pa rnams// de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul mthong nas sems ni rnyed gyur te// blo gros rtogs dang dran pa ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyim 'dod// rlung
48b7: dang pad kan mkhris pa'i nang dang 'dus pa'i nad thebs dang / / mig nang rna nang dag gis lus sems mi bder gyur pa dag/ rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag gnod gyur pa// de dag sku
48b8: 'phrul lag pa mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur/ / yang na rtswa'i nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs byas te// sgyu 'phrul nad pa byin na thams cad rims nang med par gyur// bde ba thob cing nga ring

49a1: mnyams so so'i khyi ma du dong / / de na sman gyur sman pa'i rgyal po rum na 'dug phyir ro// gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag gi lus la brtag byas pa// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'
49a2: rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni/ / ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan pa snang // de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
49a3: gnod par 'gyur ba med/ / 'dod la 'dod pa de med de la phrag dog 'tshe ba med// dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dang yid bder gnas// de la bkres dang skom dang tsha dang grang ba'i
49a4: gnod pa med/ / lha'i rol mo sil snyan dbyangs sgra ma byas rtag tu 'byung // lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes char yang 'bab// lha dang mi rnams de la lta zhing lha mi thams cad kyang / de dag phan/
49a5: tshun gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba gang yang med// sems can dga' bder rtse zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed// dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs de dag dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid dang ldan// rgyal po'i srid bde
49a6: 'khrug pa med cing char pa dus bzhin 'bab/ / rtswa dang sman dang me tog rnams kyang de yi dus su skye// rgyal po'i khab tu zhag bdun rin chen char pa bab gyur pas// sems can dbul po de las len
49a7: cing sbyin byed bde bar spyod/ / sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal gyur pa de tshe gang yang med// ri rab zom gyi dga' tshal sems can bzhin du dga' dang ldan// shAkya'i rgyal po de yang gso sbyong rab la
49a8: nyer gnas shing / / de ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi byed chos la rtag par spyod// de ni dka' thub nags tshal song nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul la// sems can mchog srel khyod kyi lus la bde ba ci 'dra rmed//

49b1: lhums su 'jug pa la nas drug pa'o// dag slong dag na ltar zla ba bcu sa te/ byang chubs mas dpa ca' ba 'dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bzas gtsang mang bshA mas cal dras
49b2: ma u0f7fgnyis byung ngo / / sum brtsa gnyis gang zhen/ mi tog thams cad la 'bras nas rgyas par ma gyur pa dang / rdzing dag na mi tog ud pa la dang / bad ma dang / kra mAd dang / pad ma dka
49b3: yod pa dag kyang kha 'ibras nas rgyas par ma gyur pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gsang ba dag kyangs las 'thon te la 'bras nas rgyas par mgyur ba dang / rin po che shing ljon pa brgyad
49b4: byung ba dang / gter chen po nyi khri 'bras te byung nas gnas par snang ba dang / khyim gyi nang du yang rin po che'i myu gu 'thon pa dang / spos chu'i dpal gyis 'bru mar dri zhim pos sbags pa rnams kyang zag
49b5: bar gyur pa dang / gangs kyi ri'i ngos las seng ge'i phru gu dag 'ongs te// dga' bar rtse zhing ser skya'i grong khyer dam pa la bskor ba byas nas sgon gnas par gyur kyang sems can kun la yang 'tsho ba
49b6: med par gyur pa dang / glang po'i bru gu ba la kar lnga brgya lhags te// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkang pa la sna'i rtse mos tug cing gnas par gyur pa dang / lha'i byis pa rogs pa ska rags bcings pa dag /
49b7: rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi pang ba nas bde ba dag tu 'gre ldog par snang bar gyur pa dang / klu'i bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus byed phyung zhing nam mkha'
49b8: la rgyu bar snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri yang rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs shing nam mkha' la 'gro bar snang ba dang / bum pa gang pa khri yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la skor ba byed par

50a1: snang ba dang / lha'i bra ma khwa yang spos chu'i ral pazeng gar glang la thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang / lha bu mo khri yang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan thogs shing 'khod pa
50a2: snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong mang po dag kyang rung dang / rnga dang rdza rnga dang / khar rnga mgul nas sbyangs te sdod cing 'khod par snang ba dang / rlung thams cad kyang mi ldad par gnas par gyur pa dang / chu
