50a3: klung dang chu bran thams cad kyang mi 'gul zhing mi 'bab par gyur pa dang / / nyi zla dang / gzhal med khang dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyang mi rgyu bar gyur pa dang / skar ma rgyal rang yang ldan par
50a4: gyur pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim yang rin po che'i dra bas yog par gyur pa dang / me yang mi 'bar bar gyur pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dang / yang thog dang / rta babs dag
50a5: la'ang nor bu dang rin po che dag 'phyang bar snang bar gyur pa dang / ras bcos bu'i mdzod dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnams kyang sgo bye bar snang ba dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / spyad
50a6: ki dang / wa'i sgra dag kyang med par gyur pa dang / sgra skad snyan pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byung bar gyur pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi las kyi mtha' 'ang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang / sa'i phyogs mthon dman du
50a7: 'dug pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par byung pa dag lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / srad dang / tshod 'dus kyi 'khor kyang lag mthil ltar gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la me tog sil mas gang ste mdzes par
50a8: snang ba dang / sbrum pa thams cad kyang bde ba dang / legs par btsa' bar gyur pa dang / shing sa la'i nags tshal gyi lha thams cad kyang shing gi lo ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste/ phyag 'tshal zhing gnas/

50b1: par snang ste/ snga ltas sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi gzi brjid dang / mthus byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dris la babang shes te/
50b2: nam gyi srong la rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongadas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag gi bsam pa gang lags gsol gyis lha ni gsan du gsol// yun ring ring po 'das nas bskyed mos tshal
50b3: gyi blo skyes te/ / gal te khyod mi bkyon cing zhe sdang phrag dog mi mda' na// bdag ni rtse nas bskyed mos tshal du myur du mchi bar bgyi/ chos dgongs brtson pa dka' thub spyod pas khyod kyang skyo mkhyen grang
50b4: bdag kyang sems can dag la bsrel nas yun ni ring lags la/ / sa la'i shing ljon sdong po mchog kyang me tog kha 'bus te/ bskyed mos tshal gyi dog sar de ni mchi ba'i rigs so lta/ sos ka'i
50b5: dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du gyur lags te/ / nags rgyu khu byug dang ni rma bya sgra rab snyan pa 'byin// gtsang zhing mdzes la sna tshogs me tog rdul gyi dad kyang ldang// da ni mchin ma thogs
50b6: legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol/ / rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos nas// dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khor la spras pa ni// bzhon pa bzhon che mgyogs pa'i
50b7: shugs ldan dag kyang bstod par gyis/ / yon tan phun sum mchog ldan lum bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis// ri sngo'i mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog 'thun par gyur pa yi// glang po stong phrag nyi shu
50b8: snyed cig myur du bstod par gyis/ / glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes glo la rgyus// gser dang nor bus rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud// rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs

51a1: pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ / dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rdog lcang lo bzang 'khril ba'i// rta mchog stong phrag nyi shu 'grangs pa myur du stor gyis te// gser dril g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas
51a2: spyad pa gyis/ / skyes bu rtul pod g.yul la mos shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag/ mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rno thogs pa// stong phrag nyi shu 'grangs pa myur du chos te bsham gyis
51a3: l-i/ / sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis// lum bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan par gyis// gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis/
51a4: lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs tshal bar khrom// de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbran par gyis// 'khor rnams kyis ni de skad tshig thos skad cig tu// bzhon pa kun bsham
51a5: de bzhin lum bi ni yang brgyan byas te/ / rgyal gyur rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol// ji skad bka' stsal de bzhin kun bgyis dus bab lha gzigs shig/ mi yi bdag po dam pa
51a6: de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur nas/ / khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras// gang zhig ngal snying nyid la dga' bar 'dod pa dag/ da yi bka' bzhin gyis te bdag gi lus kun
51a7: brgyan par gyis/ / spos mchog dang kyi dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos// 'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo bar gyis// brang na 'byung ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par
51a8: gyis/ / rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad de ring kun gyis bstan par gyis// khar rnga rgyud gcig gling bu bi bang rdza rnga dum dum pag/ sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang bshams par gyis// sgra snyan thos

51b1: nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing / / lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur ba khyed kyis kyis// shing rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo sgyu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis// bud med skyes pa gzhan dag
51b2: su yang shing rta der ma 'khod/ / na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te// gang du'ang yid du mi 'od mi mthun sgra rnams mi grag gas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung byin pa'otshe// rta dang glang po
51b3: shing rta rkang thad dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung / / rgyal po'i sgo drung lhags che sgra chen mang po grag par gyur// rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug pa'i sgra lnga rang dag yongs su grag/ de tshe bkra shis don du dril bu brgya stong dkrol bar
51b4: byas/ shing rta de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la/ lha rnams stong gis lha yi khri yang legs par bsham pa byas// rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan bzhin ldan par byas// ma bya khrung khrung dang pa yid
51b5: ru 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/ / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan che phra kun nas bsgreng // lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis bka'// lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las ni shing rta de la lha// lha yi sgra dbyangs
51b6: snyan pa sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de/ / gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul seng ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa// de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing me tog sna tshogs
51b7: 'thodar/ / de ring lum bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltam gyur te// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhin shing rta'i mchog 'dren par byed// sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag po dbang po'ang lam gyi bya dor byed// tshangs pa skye bo ma
51b8: sun sel cing sngon du 'gro bar gyur/ / lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud// rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod pa de la lta// de ni 'di snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin

52a1: sa byud/ / gangal steng ba ban dang mangs pa dbang bar bas palas// macad pa rgya na byed pa 'dini dang pangs sa rgyas 'gyur// srid pa gsapa na gru nga sa pa ga tu su//
52a2: ga mthod pa 'di 'du bzod pa'i sems cad med de/ na go gas pang dag mo pa da tha la ba gyur/ 'das sa das pa pa cod pa da da/ spyod / da //
52a3: 'phrul ta'i shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rgya tha~M ga sang gsan nanas pazlog/ zung ba nga can thams cad kyis bcan pa nga stong / nang thang dang 'azhing rnal zong pa yan lag
52a4: dang ldan pa go cha legs par bgos pa sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis na yongs su bsrung / shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i bu ru'i rigs su skyes pa'i
52a5: shAkya rgan pa dang / / gzhon pa dang / bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bsrung / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i slas glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byed khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdob sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len
52a6: pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi
52a7: stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis sngags pa brjod pa rjes su 'brad pas 'gro'o/ / lum pi ni'i nags tshal de thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag
52a8: gis btab cing lha'i me tog gis gtor bar gyur to/ / nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na shing ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu skyed par gyur to// nags

52b1: tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dres pa'i rtsal lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa bzhin no// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum pa ni'i nags cal dbyar nas shing tadang /
52b2: pa de las babs te/ mi dang lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor cing / shing drung nas ni shing drung dag tu 'gro// nags tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag/ ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la
52b3: zhing der ma gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/ / yal gshin du rnam par 'byes pa/ lo ma dang dog pa bzang po dang ldan pa/ mi dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dang
52b4: phral du bya ba'i dri'i nged dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs sbyangs pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar pa/ rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams rin po che thams
52b5: cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yal ga ring zhing shin du rnam par 'byes pa/ blag sha zhes bya ba sa'i phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzang la yangs pa/ rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu skyes
52b6: bas/ ka tsa lin de'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/ lha'i glu dbyangs blangs pa gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems
52b7: dang ldan pa rnams kyis thor tshugs dang cod pan mngon par btud pa'i spyi bos mngon par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing brag sha des
52b8: mngon par btud de phyag byas so/ / de nas lha me sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snad pa'i glog gi phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyad nas/ blag sha'i yal ga las bzung ste/ tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil

53a1: du bltas nas bya ba snyengs byed cing 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang bkur sti byed par gyur to// byang chub sem
53a2: dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so// de zla ba bcu tshang nas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran zhing shes bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/
53a3: gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa lta bu med par gyur to// dge slong dag de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/ de gnyis kyis
53a4: rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi ba'i sleb mos lus dang yan lag thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na
53a5: 'dug cing ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa de yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du byen du bteg ste/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// de ltar
53a6: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' des
53a7: la babs par gyur ma thag tu pad ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di yang brtol te byung ngo / / klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang // nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus byed phyung ste/ 'khod nas bsil ba dang / drob
53a8: chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus bkrus so/ / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i zubargya stong mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' btsa

53b1: ga na na / dag spya phyug
53b2: nas phyogs pa gang rnam paras / seng ge'i byung sa dang / skyes pache po / sangs kyis dpa par nyag/ dar byang chub thams dpa' bldan gyi dag yo ci ba'i dam par byed pa las byung ba
53b3: zags pa med pas snang gsum kyi gang can pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad zong ky-i sa dpa' dang rdzangs su ba/ thal du u0f7fsa/ me dang ltar bas pa rnams pang ba stsu ha~M// sems
53b4: thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ ting nge 'dzin tam/ shes rab ba sa/ dge ba'i spyod pas bdag dang 'dra ba de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dpa zhes
53b5: rnam par lta'o/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems dgang yang ma mthong nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ltar 'jig
53b6: pa med cing bag tshab med de/ / zhum pa dang bag 'dzums pa med pas legs par bsam pa dran par byas te/ bsams brtags nas sems can thams cad kyi sbyor ba shes par bya ste/ sus kyang brtan
53b7: med par byang chub sems dpa' dag pa'i rtsa 'tshas thams cad kyi dran du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shar phyogs lags sugs pa bdun pong / / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang drags pa par ba de dang de dag
53b8: pad ma dag kyang skyes par gyur te/ lha dang mernams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya nas kyi phyogs su gam pa bdun par ra// dub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun par nas gom pa bdud pa la gas/

54a1: 'jig rtenan thal du phyin papa// dan sgrub tham// skyeb dang / rgab dang / rlub dang / la kha pa byung nas padags la par gyur pa'i lta bzhugs pas
54a2: nang na bla na med par bya'o zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun por ro/ / bdud dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o// sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me gsang ba'i phyir chos kyi char
54a3: sprin chen po'i char pab ste/ de dag bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gi phyogs log sugam su gom pa bdun por ro// sems can thams can gyi gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs logs su
54a4: gom pa bdun por nas stang du blta'o/ / byang chub sems dpas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras mngon par go bar gyur te/ de ni byang chub sem/
54a5: dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
54a6: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // dge slong dag de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig
54a7: rten du sa g.yo ba chen po shin du 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba yang byung bar gyur to/ / mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgrar bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra 'byin par gyur to// de'i tshe
54a8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang dus mtshams so so'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang rnam par dag par gyur to/ / na mkha'i dkyil

54b1: nas kyang smin gyi sgra zags te/ sman med pa'i rnamakha' las kyang ngal bras ngal bus phrab phra ba'i char lha phul ba'i kha dadog dang ldan pa'am tog dang gos dang / rgyan dang / sa kyi bye ma dang / das pa 'bababar kyang /
54b2: to// rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba 'jam pa dri zhim po dag kyang sdang bar gyur to// phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang / rdul dang / dra ba dang // khrag rna med cing rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to// steng gi bar sngang
54b3: las kyang tshangs pa'i sna chen po mi snang zhing zab pa drag par gyur to/ / nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/ reg na
54b4: mchog tu bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems
54b5: dpas btsas ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin du tshim par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dregs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / chags pa dang / phrag
54b6: dogog dang / ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams cad spangs par gyur to// sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to// bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa
54b7: med par gyur to/ / chang gis nga ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to// spros pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to// rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra
54b8: thos par gyur to/ / yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med por gyur to// dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob par gyur to// brtson ra na 'khod pa rnams kyang gcon ra nas thor bar gyur to//

55a1: la// mnar med pa lasags pa'i sems can myal para'i sems can thams cad kyi nang dra bya ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad de'i ma rgyun mad ba gyur // drad 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyis gcig la gcag zang
55a2: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/ / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa bye ba
55a3: khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par spyad pa shin du spyad pa/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
55a4: gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamamasa'i phyogs de de'i tshe zhig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/ / dge slong dag de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang
55a5: ldan par byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag pa gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe klu'i sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur te/ gar
55a6: gyi sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe me tog dang phye ma dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang gyar char du mngon par bab par gyur to// sems can tham
55a7: cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ / mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/ bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang
55a8: ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de// bcom ldan 'das

55b1: 'di ga tham gsas/ / / ma ldan 'das de bzhan gshags pa na sems can thams cad la sangs ra du gyur ba ste/ byang chubasasas dpa' nyi kyang dang byung ba'i sa dang ldan pa zung ma/ dan
55b2: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la smras kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni lan bzhi 'am/ ldang sasagrus yang su bar du yang
55b3: brgya'i bar du yang / khan stod du ma'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga'
55b4: bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa mi mkhas pa rtag pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa// khengs pa/
55b5: ma bsdams pa/ sems g.yengs pa/ nem nur gyis 'khor ba/ the tshom mang ba/ dad pa med pa/ dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur pa// dge sbyong gi tshul dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
55b6: rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas yid mi ches shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas gcig pa cig 'din dang kye khyed cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltos/ / byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal
55b7: na 'dug pa brtsog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la yang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces bya ba dang / de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar
55b8: 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can legs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gcang pa'i khu ba'i nang du mi 'byung ngo // zhes bya bar mi shes so// dge slong dag

56a1: sems can dam pa sa cag gi sa sa du tha ba dang yan gnas pan shin tu yang ba ba nan/ / byang chub sems da nam sanasams canarnams pa stong la las na/ na
56a2: chos kyi 'pha ma pa gang / / ci phyir nan/ kun dga' thasems can rnapas 'am par 'gyur shing / btsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ba ba kyis bya pa
56a3: bdag cag ni mi tsam du zad pas na/ bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so// zhes zhum par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes tha min pa chos kyi rkun por gyur ba de dag 'di snyam du sems
56a4: can de ni bas bgyis mi khyab pa ste/ de ni bdag cag gis tshad gzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems so// kun dga' bo de dag ni de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi tshe 'phrul la'ang yid po ches par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs
56a5: ba ra # dga' sa da pa dang / gas sad nadag
56a6: byis garim gro'i zil gyis nod pa/ ma rabs kyi dang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos bung shing bso rnams ma yin pa'i mngan par 'du bya ba mang po de skad cig sa ngan par 'du byed pa la ltos/
56a7: 'gas brgyan das panas bya batheg pa chen po'i bdapas po ldag// ban 'a bas gas // ma ldan 'das ma myong ba'i ma/ 'dig pa'i mad lta yang bul yang blang dang sa spyan pa
56a8: sa na tha ga pang byung pags pa te/ sa maldan na sa / yul ba/ ma ga / na pa dis sa ban na da ma pamed/ sa pa pa #

56b1: das gas sa / r+b+ha pa/ sa ldan sa rgya sa / /
56b2: sa ni de thagag / ma ldan nas / phrul pa/ de gnas sacas kyang ba bdapa bya/ 'das pa dang / btsun pa dang / k+ta byu ngasas rgyas ma ma ldan das rnapas la s+yAm+b+ha/
56b3: ra ba gtab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gra ba de 'thab cu // de nas nga ldan pacan dga' ba thugasas nas sangs rgyas la phyag bzhes pad de// sa na 'das la 'dis da lags
56b4: maldan 'das kyis pa lags pa dag gi kyang pa 'a pa nas ma dang / ma 'jas gtsun ga pa dag gi nga sa par
56b5: zhing / sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i snod bcan du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyad pa das mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
56b6: dga' bo dge slong ngas/ / dge slong pa'ang/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la'ig sa sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos dam thams shing med mi ches pa dang / srong ba de dag ni shi 'bas mthag tus dang bad
56b7: sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad dri ma byed cig/ da ci'i phyir na na/ kun dga' bar bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zabal rgya che zhing gti
56b8: dpag dka' ba'o/ / kun dga' bo la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skye ba'i sems can de dag gis ni thob pa legs par thob pa yin te/ de dag gi/

57a1: 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o// de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o// de dag gi spyod pa legs par spyad pa'o// de dag gis ni snying po blangs so// de dag ni dan pong gsum las grol ba'o// dag
57a2: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro/ / de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo// de dag gis dad pa thob pa ni don yod do// de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs par thob bo// de dag gis ni sema?
57a3: can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no/ / de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa gtubs pa yin no// de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgal to// de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu byung ngo // de dag gis ni
57a4: mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po rjes su thob bo/ / de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs so// de dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te mchod par 'os pa'o// de dag ni 'jig rten na 'byung bar dkon pa'o// de dag
57a5: ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gzung ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dang ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo sems can de dag
57a6: ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dan don dang ldan pa ma yin te/ / kun dga' bo sems can de dag ning dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'
57a7: la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi mthong na ma yin no/ / kun dga' bo la la ni mthong bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi thos pa ma yin no// kun dga' bo la la ni mthong na yang dga'
57a8: zhing yid du 'ong la thos na yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do/ / kun dga' bo gang yang rung ste/ la la zhig mthong ngam/ thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang tshe

57b1: rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ste/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgrol bar bya ba'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
57b2: pa dang yon tan gyi matab pa'o/ / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bzung ba'o// kun dga' bor sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyong pa nyid kyi tshe yang
57b3: sems can du yang rung ste/ 'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas mi 'jigs pa slong na sems can de dag la ngas mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
57b4: rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ / kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bcol ba'o// kun dga' bo khyed kyis bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
57b5: byas so/ / nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsal lo// kun dga' bo grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du yang 'gro ste/ thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin nam/ sdang
57b6: ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong bar 'gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/ gang nga la rten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
57b7: rnams kyis mkhyen cing sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo ste/ de dag ni bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo mdza' bo gang
57b8: yin pa de ni mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ / mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de yang de la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par byas/

58a1: dad pa tsam yang skyed par gyis shig/ ras mabyon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyab rnams la yang gtad de/ de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag gi yang 'ja' ba medan/
58a2: zhes bya bar mkhyen cing / bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig la bu dag nyan cing / 'thun par 'dzin pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur la/ skyes bu de yang
58a3: mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/ / pa de shing zin kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang bu yang rung ste nga la dad na de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/ de dag ni
58a4: nga'i mdza' bo'o/ / de dag ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang po mda' ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du mi gsung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
58a5: mdza' bo yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyis/ / kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig/ 'di
58a6: na ngas khyod la bcol pa'o/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag na mkha'i dkyil nas gnas shing lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang / spos dang /
58a7: phreng dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dri med rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan nyi zla'i 'od ldan pa// lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag
58a8: drug bcu de yi tshe/ / skad cig de la lum pi nir lhags lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la smra// mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed lags// bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchis ci bgyi

58b1: ci 'tshal bka' thol cig/ bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed dus ldan nye ba'i rims dang ldan pa lags khyod kyis dbyes shing bde ba'i nyams skye ba mid kyis thams cad mang bar gso// na shesil ba'i ldan pa das pa de ring dadu
58b2: myur skyed 'gyur/ / ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing // stong phrag 'grangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang // ji ltar dog sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug tu g.yos
58b3: las ni/ / khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra grags 'jog rten 'das pa'i sras bltam 'gyur// ji ltar nam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang // rnam la'i dkyil las yid 'od sil snyan brgyas
58b4: ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang / / ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams brgya stong yang // dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun phan bltam par 'gyur// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten
58b5: skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang / / dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid// skyes bu seng ge yul zhugs grub pa de yang rtsi ba logs g.yas nas byung // gser gyi ri dang
58b6: 'dra zhing dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltam/ brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dar te thub pa de yang blangs// zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzangs bkye bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur// ngan song
58b7: gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te/ / lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi g.yab mo byung // de tshes 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pa dam mdzes//
58b8: sna tshogs mngon 'thon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris zhabs bzhag ste// gom pa bdun du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni// rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu

59a1: bdag 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa'am chog dang 'a rgyan byam chaganas mapa byal na 'bad gyur// gtsang zhing dang la mdzes par sras chu dbugs 'dren pa'i// yang bas sa// klu ya~M t+pal gnyis pa nga
59a2: gnas nas grang dri'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtong/ / lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed// 'jig rten skyod pa rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos len// stong gsum 'di'ang
59a3: rgyu dang mir+g+ha bcas par rab tu g.yos par gyur/ / mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bltam pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dag gi// me'i
59a4: 'dren pa rgyal ba la/ / lha rnams me tog sil ma 'thor// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi// brtan pa gom pa bdun du bzhud// sa phyogs gang du zhabs bzhag pa// der ni pad ma bzang po'i mchog/ rin chen
59a5: kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ sa las mngon du 'thon par gyur// de ltar gom pa bdun bzhud nas// rga dang mchi ba sel ba yi// sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung brjod do// 'jigs
59a6: med phyogs su rnam gzigs te/ / de nas don ldan gsung byung ba// nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso// 'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren// nga yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes// mi yi 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad//
59a7: lha dbang bcas dang 'jig rten skyong dag rab tu dang sems skyes// spos chu mchog gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang bsil// klu yi dbang po rnams kyang lhan cig mthun par byas nas ni// dri zhim
59a8: spos chu dag gi rgyan gyis sku yang bsil ba byas/ / lha gzhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang la ni gnas nas su// dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil// gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga

59b1: yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni/ / bar snang la dad lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed// skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas zas gtsang de la dgar sla ba// lha cig 'byor ba rgyas gyur khyod
59b2: sras ni ma na kyis brgyan pa bltam/ / de ni nges par 'khor los sgyur ba dbang phyug gdu rabs rin chen 'tshog// 'dzam bu'i gling di drugs mang cig 'gyur bas kyi dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur// de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas
59b3: gtsang rgyal po'i mdun du de song ste/ lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur na// shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum phrag lnga ni btsas pa skyes par gyur// kun kyang gzhan gyis mi thub stobs
59b4: dang ldan zhing chen po che dang 'dra/ / skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa dag las dgyes pa'i sgra gson lha// 'dun pa can la sogs pa 'bangs kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur/ bsngags ldan gyis ni zla bo chibs te stong phrag
59b5: bcu dag 'brangs gyur te/ chibs mchog dam pa gser gyi 'od ldan rnga rdog lcang lor 'khril pa lags// mtha' 'khob khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyis legra
59b6: par rgyal gyur lha/ / da ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs rdo bo lha cig rgyal por spyon// gser gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam/
59b7: pa stong phrag nyi shu dag/ na mkha' las ni sgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis// sbrum ma la sogs nag gu zal lu dag dang / bre'u ni drug stong 'brangs// lha cig lha mchog bltam zhing de dag btsas
59b8: pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs/ / rje gcig rgyal por gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa bltam pa yi// yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong 'grangs pa// rab tu dga' bar gyur dang /

60a1: ga/ kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs sa gsapa// slar du rgyal gyur cag ces byang chub dam pa mya na mang par zhugs// dge slong dag de ltang byang chub sams dpa' btsas pa dang skad cig de la sbyin pa/
60a2: snang pa yang da gyur/ ya sa par bya // thugs pan la sogs pa zas zingang/ zu pa bcad pa dang / ldan pa la mags pa
60a3: khri dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rten po khri dang // ba la dag phrug gu mo lnga brgya dang / ba lang gi phrug gu po lnga brgya po dag kyang btsas shing 'brangs par gyur nas de dag thams cad rgyal po zas gtsad masas
60a4: grangs yi ger bris te sras bu gzhon nu rtsen pa'i phyir phyin par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas
60a5: a shwad tha'i sdong po skyes par gyur to/ / gling phra mo rnams su yang tsan dan gyi nags tshal skyes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi khor yug tu yang bskyed mos tshal lnga ba
60a6: dag byung bar gyur to/ / gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen du 'bus te sgo ston par gyur to// de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas
60a7: rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du bdag gi bu gzhon nu de'i seng ji sa cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang dag par grub par gyur
60a8: gyis/ / 'di'i ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas bu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so//

60b1: dge slong dag de sngar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas ma'i blo g.yas pa yang ma ral mnyams shing sngon bzhin du gyur to// darang khron pa lan gsum sdud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur/ spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung
60b2: bar gyur to/ / de das lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i 'brus dri zhem po khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i ba'i drung du lhags nas// bkas pa legs par blta pa 'am// skul ni mo bdebs mchims pa/ rnaMs
60b3: 'dri bar gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang / rnam par thug pa thogs te// byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam 'am/ sku la mi bdeb ma mchis sam/
60b4: zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang pa'i bum pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par blta ma 'am/ skul mi bde ba ma mchis samany+dza
60b5: 'dri bar gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par blta ma 'am// sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i
60b6: bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par blta ma 'am// skul mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag
60b7: kyang gla dbyangs len cing byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te bltam pa legs par blta ma 'am/ sbrul mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// 'dzam bu yi gling 'din phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par
60b8: shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji skad cig 'bod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas/ rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par gyur to// dge slong dag

61a1: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum pi ni'i nags tshal du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// steng stang du byas so// mchod
61a2: bar byas so/ / bza' ba dang / btsa' ba dang / myad pa dag kyang drangs par gyur te// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to// sbyin pa dag kyang byin no// bsod nams ngag kyang byed do//
61a3: bram ze sum khri nyes stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim par byas so// su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la yang de byin par gyur to// rgya byin dang tshangs pa yang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u yi gzugs su sprul te gral gyi
61a4: thog ma la 'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur to/ / ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing // ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na// 'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi// bde ba mdzad cig bltam par mngon//
61a5: ji ltar rab rab med 'od kyis// lha dang ni zla'i 'od rnams kyang // mi snang zal du rlag pa las// bsod nams 'od cig blang bar mngon// mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing // na ba 'on pas sgra thos la// smyon pa rnams
61a6: kyang dran ldan las/ / 'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon// ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing // 'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur pas// tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su// gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngan// sa la ma
61a7: tog rgyas gyur cing / / sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi// thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon// ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing // pad ma chen po 'thon pa las// nges par
61a8: gzi brjid chen po 'di/ / 'jig rten ma gan du byon par 'gyur// lha yi spos kyis sngags byung ba// 'jam pa'i rlung gi dang ldang zhing // sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las// 'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byed// gzum

61b1: khams gnas pa'i lnga bcwa'o/ / 'dod chags thal pa 'di dag kyang // thal mo kyang zhing 'dud pa las// 'dan snyan pa gnas su byed// sa rnams kyis ni lta mthong shig/ rnams kyis rnam mthong yang // par don
61b2: 'tshe ba med pa las/ / 'di ni da dpon chen por byen// me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing // chu klung thams cad mi g.yol// sa yang dal bras g.yo ba las// 'di na yang dag gzigs par 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar
61b3: byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/ de shi ba'i dus byas nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so// dge slong dag khyed 'di snyamar byang
61b4: chub sems dpa'i lan pon gyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
61b5: kyang btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na// byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung nam snyid 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro// dge
61b6: s long dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas thog ma ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta bus bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong gyur pas kyang lhag
61b7: pa'i bkod pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen ba ser skya'i gnas su zhugs so/ / de zhugs pa dang / bam pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to// de bzhin bu mo lnga stong ni maH
61b8: mdongs lag na thogs te mdun du 'dod par 'gyur to/ / bu mo lnga stong ni shing ta la'i yal ga thogs shing mdun du 'dod par gyur to// bu mo lnga stod ni spos chu'i ril pa bring gar thogs te lam chag chag gis 'deb/

62a1: gang mdud du 'dong bar gyur to/ bu ma ma stong na nags tshal gyi me tog ga phreng bar 'byung ba khye' chad sa tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dang bar gyur to// thab lnga snang na bang ba snang ba 'an par zags te/
62a2: dong byed cing mdun du 'ong bar gyur to// bram lnga snang ni stan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dod par gyur to// bram ze sa stong na dril gra thogs te krashes kyi sgra 'byin mdun du 'a bar gyu // glang po sa stong
62a3: thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du dong par gyur to/ / rta nyi khri ni gser gyi rgyan gyis bkab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dod par gyur to// shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing
62a4: dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dod par gyur to// rkang thang dpa' zhing rdul phod pa// yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa// go cha sra pa bgos pa bzhi khri ni byang
62a5: chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhini 'dod par gyur to/ / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha grags pa grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni na mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa
62a6: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dod par gyur to/ / shing rta gang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du
62a7: mas lags par brgyan par gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis chas pa rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyi khris shing rta de drangs te lha'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni mi bu mo gcig 'dug/ me'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i
62a8: drime gcig 'dug kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu'i mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi chod/ mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag med par ma gyur te/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gnas

62b1: zong khyer chen por shAH lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong bye dang 'jug pa'i cha/ rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas/
62b2: lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du// kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/
62b3: lo sgyur ba dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye kun nas
62b4: spyan mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ / kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid mnga' ba// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs
62b5: su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun du yang zhugs par byas te/ zla ba bzhi lon nas byang chub sem
62b6: dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te 'gros pa// phan
62b7: pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems kyi yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / nyams su blang bar sus nus shes byas pa dang / de na shAkya'i bu mo
62b8: lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o/ / bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro// de na shAkya ches 'gras ches 'gras pa de dag na re bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni

63a1: byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon nu la gzugs dang daral bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya ba mi nus so/ / skye dgu'i bdag mo
63a2: chen mo gau ta ma'i gzhon nu'i sru mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang legs par skyed par nus so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang mnyes par nus so// zhes thams cad gros gcig tu 'dus te/ skyed bu'i bdag mo chen
63a3: mogo ta mI dang bar byas nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rami gror ma ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis bkod par gyur te// de la brgyad ni
63a4: yangan 'tsha ba'i ma ma'o/ / brgyad ni ru ma ldan pa'i ma ma'o// brgyad ni rtsen 'grogs kyi ma ma'o// brgyad ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyang
63a5: pa/ ji lta gzhon nu 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang / de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la// drang
63a6: srong chen po nag po zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las des byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa'i tshe/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
63a7: 'phrul mang du mthong ste/ nam kha'i dkyil nakyang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang / dga' zhing phan tshun 'dod pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ ma la bdag gis rnam par
63a8: blta ba zhig tu bya 'am snyam nas/ des lha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan

63b1: par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi las legs par brgyan pa zhig bcas par mthong nas// bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa// bram ze'i khye'u shes
63b2: par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rin po che chen po byung ste/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod namam gyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa 'jig rten thams
63b3: cad kyis mchod pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa bcas so/ / de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ chos
63b4: dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin
63b5: po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu stong yod par 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol
63b6: gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de ni sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' bskor dang bcas pa chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med pa dang / chos dang 'thun par rang gi mthus zil gyis
63b7: mnan cing mngon par phab ste/ dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro// de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
63b8: su 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi drid mi 'jog pa// 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na tshur shog de ltar 'dod do// de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang

64a1: 'grogs te/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar namakha'i dkyil nas ldings te ser skya gnas kyi gong khyer chen po ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul brtul nas rkang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong
64a2: byed chen por dong ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gal bde ba phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do// dge slong dag de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i byim gyi sgo drung
64a3: du srog chags brgya stong mang po 'dus pa mthong ngo / / de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces sbas so// kye mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang ma la chab sgo na drang srong zhig mchis so zhes gsol
64a4: cig/ de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po zas gtsang mgal ba der song nas phyin pa dang thal mo sbyar te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen
64a5: par mdzad du gsol/ / chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas bzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag na rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes mchi'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong dag/
64a6: po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/ mi de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig/ de nas mi de rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/ drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/ nang du bzhud cig/
64a7: de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang mgal ba der song ste phyin pa dang / mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po rgyal bar spyon cig/ rgyal bar spyon cig/ sku tshe ring bar srungs
64a8: shig/ chos bzhin du rgyal po mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas// drang srong nag po la yon chu dang rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te shin tu legs par yongs su bskur nas stan la

64b1: bdar te/ de stan la bde bar 'dug par shes nas zhes dang bcas gus pa dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong sngon mthon par mi dran na 'dir ci la byon ci zhig bzhed// de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong
64b2: nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras shig bltam par gyur pa de lta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyis
64b3: langs kyi bar du chung zad cig gzhes shig/ drang srong gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no// dge slong dag
64b4: de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda' byas so/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu legs par blangs
64b5: te/ drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro// de nas drang srong nag pos byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus legs par rnam par spras/
64b6: pa'i lus dang ldan pa// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba las 'phags pa'i lus can nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas
64b7: kye ma 'jig rten du mtshar gyi gang zag 'di byung ngo / / kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas// stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems
64b8: dpa' rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' phang du blangs te/ sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcurtsa

65a1: gnyis yod pa mthong ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam zhi pa gnyis su 'gyur cig gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
65a2: 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed de zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang / gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
65a3: sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog par 'gyur ba mthong nas/ / des de lta bu mthong ba dang mchi ma blags te/ ngus nas shugs ring du phyung ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma
65a4: blags te ngus nas shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/ sngangs te mi dga' zhing rings par rings par drang srong chen po de la smras pa/ drang srong de ltar bshums mo blags te bshums pa dang / shugs ring du 'byin
65a5: pa ci zhig nongs/ / gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba 'am cig mi gda' 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad
65a6: du du ba yang ma lags/ / 'di la mi dge ba yang gang yang ma mchis te// bdag nyid ngu bar bas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te nas gzer la gzhon nu don thams cad grub
65a7: pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/
65a8: gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par bskor bar mi nus paskor bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar

65b1: dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongasu byang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// sems
65b2: can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di la chos de thos nas/ / skye ba las yongs su ma grol ba rnams grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
65b3: bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su
65b4: grol bar 'gyur/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug ge sems gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs thibs bos
65b5: khebs pa la ma gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni lam drang bas mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang btson darang 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni
65b6: bcings pa las yongs su bral bar mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / rab ba dang / ling tog gis mig ljongs pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'byur/ sems can tan
65b7: xxx/ xxx
65b8: ba bye ba khrag khrig mang por brgyal brgyal ma na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ da ltar gzhon nu 'din nges par blan dpa pa dag pa rdzogs pa cung pon pa rdzogs pa pa sa bya/

66a1: bgo jogs pangasas su na kyang sems sa bye / dri brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya tsho'i pha rol tu sgrol bar 'gyur zhing 'che ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog
66a2: da mi mthong ba dang / bdag gis nad ma mchis pa 'di la yang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni de'i slad du ngu zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so// rgyal po
66a3: chen po bdag cag gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams
66a4: cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis su gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgya
66a5: chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no/ / rgyal chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing
66a6: du grub cing lcang lor 'khril la g.yas su 'khyil pa dang / 'phral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes pa ni kha ba dang
66a7: dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sran gyi rdzim pa'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang /
66a8: tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / re bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin du

66b1: reng she yad/ / gram pa se ga ba dang / dpung mag ga du rnam padas bdun mtha pa dang / thal gang rgyas pa dang / lhags pa srab mdag gas 'dra ba dang / brnas gnan dum ga na
66b2: pus mo slebs pa dang / ro stong seng ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni shing n+ya gro ta ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / s+phu re re nas skyes pa dang / yan lag gi sku
66b3: g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil pa dang / mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / bad+ma legs par zlub pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang / sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rkang pa yangs pa
66b4: dang / zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi
66b5: mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan la/ mu khAd dang bcas/ lte ba dang bcas pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu
66b6: gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no// rgyal po chen po mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni 'khor
66b7: los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/ mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo // rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i skul dpe byang bzang po brgyad bcu mchis te/ de dag
66b8: dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu po

67a1: de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / sen mo mdog sdum pa dang / sor mo rnams zlum pa dang /
67a2: sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / tshigs mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa
67a3: dang ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni phyag gi ri mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mngangs yod pa dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ya yod ma krung
67a4: pa dang / phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang / sgros bim pa ltar dmar pa dang / sgra mi drag pa'i tshig dang / ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi
67a5: sgra dang ldan pa dang / snyan cing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag ring ba dang / sku'i na bza' gtsang ma
67a6: thun sum tshogs pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang / shin du dpa' bar mdzes pa'i sku dang/ rnam par legs pa
67a7: grub pa'i sku dang / pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya chel shin du gang ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sgra zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du 'jam pa dang /
67a8: ya yo ma mchis pa dang / sku rim gyis legs par grub pa dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba ma yo ba dang / lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang / drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa/

67b1: dang ldang ba sa bag dranas par dag nags ga pa com pa 'dakun nas 'byung ba dang ldan palags pa// rgyal ba can pagazhan du na thams ca thub pa ni thang bltar das pa'i 'bras dang / bangan
67b2: stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i bgros dang / dgu zlum pa dang / dgu skabs byin pa dang /
67b3: dkum rnyongs pa dang / rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba dang / mdag gnyis bsngo ba'am/ gnag pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni
67b4: bzlum pa dang / mche po dang sa la byin gyis phra ba dang / shangs legs par mtho ba dang / spyan gsal ba dang / spyan dri ma med pa dang / 'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / ud pa la sngon po
67b5: lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma gnag pa dang / smin ma rgyun chags pa dang / smin ma rim gyis
67b6: gzhol ba dang / mkhur ba rgyas pa dang / mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mkhur bskyon dang bral ba dang / sdang ba dang / khro ba'i mdog med pa dang / shin tu rig pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen
67b7: po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang / dbu yongs su rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbus
67b8: dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mi bshor ba dang / dbus mi 'dzid pa dang / dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang / dbu skra lcang long 'khril pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni dgras

68a1: dpal gyi bcu dang / bkra gas dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / sdang ras kyang dbyabs la bu dbu sgra dang ldan pa'o// rgyal ba can po 'od dag na gzhan nu dan thams cad grub pa dpe byang bzang /
68a2: brgyad bcu ste/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi// gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po zas
68a3: gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems
68a4: dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ / khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing // drang srong rnams kyis mchod gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten pas// bdag kyang khyed
68a5: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po dang / snag gi tsha bo mes byin dang bcas te/ kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas/ gos bskon te bskor
68a6: pa byas so/ / de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' las rang gi gnas gal ba der seng ngo // de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras
68a7: mos byid khyed kyis rnam sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung / / zhes thos pa de tshe/ khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung shig dang / de ni khyod kyi yun ring ba'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di
68a8: skad ces bya ste/ / lha yi tshigs rnams rnamakha'i nges la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgeg pa// lha yi rang srong nag po yul gnas pas mthed nas dga' mchog thog// 'din thog chags rnams kyi dga'

68b1: skyed sangs rgyas shes bya'i tshig 'di ci/ bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur// de lta 'am 'on te lha man yang na nam mkha' lding dam ma 'am na/ sangs rgyas shes
68b2: bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad ma thos ci/ / lha yi mig gis phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas// phyis yangs ri mtshol mad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong // 'od gsal
68b3: mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing / / ji ltar ri'i rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i myu gu 'thon gyur la// shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzad rgyas sna tshogs 'bras bus rgyan gyur las/ srid
68b4: pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gsal/ / sa 'di thams cad mnyam zhing dri med lag mthil bzhin du snang ba dang // lha rnams dga' ning na mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo
68b5: 'byin gyur la/ / klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen mad 'byung 'byo ba las 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal po'i dkon mchog ces kyi 'byung gnas nges par 'byung // ngan song shi zhing sdug bsngal bral te
68b6: sems can rnams ni bder ldan la/ / lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dad ldan par rgyu ba dang // ji ltar lha yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba grag pa las// srid pa gsum 'dir
68b7: dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi ltas su gdon mi za/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mig gis rnam bltas na// ser skya'i gred na rgyal po zas gtsang grong khyer dam pa yod pa deg mthu chenamatha/
68b8: ldan mtshan dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong // mthong nas dga' mgu rangs shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang skyes par gyur// de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de rang gi slob ma lhan cig rings su

69a1: da/ / rgyun nas sar sbyar brjod pa'i rgyal ba 'grong kyang ma chog gi skor 'jug s+ho// sa grang sa gcags bya ba khrag khrig mang pa drang srang des mthang das/ spro ba la smras par bzhi nga srung /
69a2: phyin ces myur du gsol// de mnyan myur du pho brang nang phyin rgyal po la ni de bsnyed pa// lha cag drang srong rgan 'khogs dka' thub chen po can zhig chab sgor mchis// drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang
69a3: du mchi bar dga' zhes mchis rgyal po chen po nang du gtang ngam mi gtang bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ / de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos khyod sod nang du pos zhes bsgo/ drang srong nag pos bsgo ba'i tshig thos
69a4: dga' mgu ba de dang ldan par gyur/ / skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos pa ltar// drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du mngon par dga'// rgyal po rgyal gyur sku tshe
69a5: raring bsrung gsol zhes dga' bas de skad smras/ / snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing nges pa stan la 'dug/ rgyal pos gus par smra byas drang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir
69a6: byod rgyu ci thub pas bdag la myur du gsungs/ / khyod kyi sras bltam gzugs mchog pha rol phyin cing gzi brjid che dang ldan// mthu chen mtshan rab sum bcu gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan mnga' ba// rgyal po
69a7: khyod sras thams cad don grub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste/ / de slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yod ma mchis// leg so legs par byon te mnyel tam ma mnyel khyod mthong bdag
69a8: dga'o/ / mchog sbyin gzhon nu de nyal da ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyis// re shig yud tsam ga zhes dang 'dir ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa// skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs par

69b1: 'gyur/ gang che kha lo sbyar mchog zla brgyas pa'i 'od mang 'des dpa// de tshe rgyal pas 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang gnyis las 'phags 'od bde blangs te/ 'di ltar drang srong lhams mchod pa gsor mchog
69b2: gzugs ldan da gzigs shig/ drang srong nag pos de yi rkang pa mdzes pa 'khor lo'i mtshan can mthong // de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bdag nyid chen po bstan
69b3: bcos mkhas pas bang du blangs nas bsams shing bltas/ / des ni mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan gyi mchog gis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas// mgo gtsogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa des ni
69b4: la rnam gnyis mthong / / stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ba 'am sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor gyur// shin tu mi dga' lus dang sems kyis mchi ma blags te shugs ring phyung // rgyal po
69b5: mchog kyang spangs par gyur nas bram ze ci smad ba shums shes sgra/ / drang srong nag pos bdag gi don grub bgegs shig ma gzigs sam// drang srong ci smad bshums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs
69b6: bdag la med par gsungs/ / khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu gyur pa ma mchis te/ bdag la bdag nyid rgas shing 'di ltar 'khogs par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid// 'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig
69b7: rten mchog 'gyur ros kyang yang dag son par 'gyur/ / bdag gis dga' ba thob pa'i yid kyis mi mthong ngo // zhes nga slad du/ 'di yi sku la mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis dri med mnga' ba las/ rnam pa ga
69b8: su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzad/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor byon// 'di ni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par

70a1: sas kyis 'gyur/ rang kyang dang bstan rgyal bdag 'an ba ngathab par byung// danas pa sa mam sna nas dang paganyis sa rgyag ca byas/ na
70a2: ni lhas mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste/ srid gsum kun gyi 'gro ba'i did dpon mchod byur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong dga' bas tsha po de la spras pa yi gdam ga nyon// gang
70a3: ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro la 'khor lo sgor thos pa/ / de tshe myur du thub pa'i bstan la rab byung mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// drang srong dam pa de yis rkang la phyag 'tshal bskor babyas nas ni// 'di 'dra'i sras
70a4: mnga' khyod kyis thob pa rgya chen legs par thob ces smras/ / 'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur// drang srong mchog de ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas bdag gnas dgon
70a5: par phyin/ / / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po drug pa// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos/ gnas gtsang
70a6: ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/
70a7: sbyin pa dang / rdul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan dang / shes ya dang / thabs dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub can spyad pa legs pa'i spyad pa/ bya
70a8: pochen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa// tang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can// sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ brtson 'brus brtan pa'i go cha legs par

70b1: bgos pa/ / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba// bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ tshul ba nges par byas pa dang ldan pa// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dpa/
70b2: tu 'joms pa/ dag pa'i bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ ye shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/ bdud kyi stobs mthar 'byin pa/ stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po// lha dang mis mchod pa/
70b3: mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa// 'byung ba'i bsam pa can/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/ legs par skye bas skyes pa/
70b4: 'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa/ bu ram shing pa'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/ de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas
70b5: chur shog/ bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir dong ngo // lha'i bu nga rgyal zil gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems
70b6: dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de dag kyang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa gtong bar gyur te byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang bkur sti byed par bya ba'i phyir dong ngo // de ni lha'i bu
70b7: de dag la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rgyal pos zas gtsang ma rgyal ba 'phel ba yang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
70b8: yang de kho nar lung bstan pas lung bstan te/ / bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o// de skad ces bsgo/ nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po// lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas

71a1: ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyis rgyas par bkang ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ba zang gal bdang song nas byin pa dang / skabs rgyal po la gsal te/ rgyal po
71a2: gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas byang chub
71a3: sems dpa' bang du blangs te rgyal ba bas gtsang ma la dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po dgyes pa'i dam pas dgyes par mdzod cig/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ rgyal po chen
71a4: po byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang / gzhon nus b+ha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang grags pa dang /
71a5: dpal gyis zil gyis non pa las na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
71a6: dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro chen po byas te/ de kho na'i lung bstan pas byang
71a7: chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltam pa// lha yi dbang pos shes nas dga' ste lha la sprag
71a8: 'gyung ba'ang bkal pa bya rang shin tu dka'/ / nga shin mi yi dbang po de la mchod du dang // rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan// tsug zung mdzes pa 'byung ba rnam par dag pa'aH/

71b1: stong phrag bcu gnyis cang ba ser bya'i gnas mchog tu// myur du lhags nas rgyal po'i yi drung na sdong/ de dag rnams kyis sgo ba la ni yod 'ang sbas// rgyal po'i bzang seng ste thugs su chud par
71b2: gsol/ / cha stobs kyang tshig demanyan nas nang du song // thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la 'di skad sgras// lha cig rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe ring du srungs// bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag 'od can
71b3: sgor mchis/ / rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan// zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'od// rgyal po de dag gang du mchi yang grib mi gda'// sug pa 'dor yang gom pa'i sgra
71b4: dag thos ma 'gyur/ / dog sar rgyu ba bgyid kyang rdul ni yod mi ldang // skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms mi 'gyur de dag lus kyi 'od ni shin tu rgya chen gsal// tshig kyang yid du mchi ste mi la dpe
71b5: mamachis/ / zab cing 'jam mnyen snyan pa 'byung ba'i gnas// de dag mi ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid// me tog mchog phreng byug pa dar gyi lda ldi dag/ kun gyi lag na thogs nas gus
71b6: dang bcas par sdod/ / rgyal po lha rnams de dag gzhon nu lha yi lha// blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i slad du mchis su nges/ rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas// song ste kun kyang pho brang nang
71b7: du gshegs shes gyis/ / de dag yon tan spyod lam khyod kyis smras ltar na// rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba ni mi la gang yang med// sgo bas thal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad smras// rgyal pos gnang gis
71b8: khyed cag nang du bzhud du gsol/ / lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yid rangs te/ lha'i gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs// lha mchog de dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas ni// rgyal po stan

72a1: las langs te thal mo sbyar byas nas/ / rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khri gdan bshams pa 'dir// thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol// nga rgyal dregs med de dag
72a2: stan la 'khod par gyur/ / bdag cag ci skad 'dir mchis kyargyal po gsan du gsol// khyod sras rnam dag klu mnga' bsod nams chen po bltam// shin tu lags pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag
72a3: bar 'tshal/ / gang gi 'gro ba gang dang sbyar ba gang cir 'gyur// mtshan bzang mtshan gyi cho ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal// de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang bar mdzod// sna tshogs mtshan gyis
72a4: yan lag brgyan pa blta bar 'tshal/ / rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba de rab dga'// gzhon nu me'i 'od ltar 'bar ba pang du blangs// lha mchog gtsug pud 'phyad pa dag ni nye bar bsnyen//
72a5: thog ma sgor byung stong gsum 'di dag kun du g.yos// lha mchog de dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni// zangs mdog dri med rnam dag gzi brjid ldan mthong nas// gtsug bud 'byung
72a6: de dag myur du langs par gyur/ / dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal// 'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'dar lta ba dpal can dang // 'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong
72a7: dang / mdzod spu nas ni rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las// bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal// mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su// yang dag
72a8: yon tan ji ltar don mthong de la bstod/ / skye dang rga dang 'chi dang nyon mongs dgra bsal ba'i// sems can rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung // yongs tog 'dod chags yul gyi gtsugams

72b1: brgyad pa la/ / rnam gsum pas na sra gsas kun 'bang yangs gdungs par/ dnga' byad mas kyi kun byas kyang gsus pa nas // 'jam car gyis nyan pas gang sa nas dad gyug/ tu
72b2: pa'i gsungs 'thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung / / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong gsung du zlog mdzad pa// stong gsum kun du go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba// bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas
72b3: gsung chen myur du sgrogs/ / srid pa'i 'dod chags bcings bying srid pa'i rtser gnas pa// bu stegs can gyi tshogs ngan log par lta ba bcom// khyod kyi rgyal brten dang stong pa'i chos thos nas/ seng
72b4: ges lnga cho gas bzhin du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur/ / nyon mongs chen po'i dra ba ma rig bsgribs bstsal te// kun du byung ba skye bo nges par snang byed pa'i// ye shes 'od 'phro shes rab 'od rig gzigs pa yis/
72b5: 'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po bsal bar gsol// gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung // lha dang mi rnams kyis ni rnyed pa rgya chen thob// rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen 'dis
72b6: ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni btong bar 'gyur/ / ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char bab nas// bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas ni// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas legs shes
72b7: de dag tshig rjod cing / / lha mtshogs de dag tshul du shishes par mkha' las dong // bltam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo
72b8: btsas pa de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub

73a1: sems dpa' la ris gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bral lo//
73a2: mdza' pa shes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkung bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri dral lo// blon po'i 'khor rnams kyis
73a3: kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smra so//
73a4: lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyis de bas na grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig/ srang dang / lamaM gyi/
73a5: bzhi do da / mdo sum dang / tshong 'dus dag ni mdzes par gyis shig/ bkra mi shis pa sgur po dang / zhar ba dang / 'on pa dang / lkug pa dang / dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig/
73a6: bkra shis rnams kyang sogs shig/ bsod nams kyi rnga ni rdungs shig/ bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig/ grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par spyad cig/ rol mo sil snyan dang pheg brdab//
73a7: ba shin du yid 'ong ba dag ni leng zhing rdobs shig/ khams kyi rgyal po thams cad ni sogs shig/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / spro ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dag ni gcig tu smras
73a8: shig/ bu mo'i shing ta ni shoms shig/ bum pa gang ba rnams ni snyen cig/ bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig/ lha khang rnams ni shin tu brgyan par gyis shig/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal pos ji skad

73b1: bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang / de nas rgyal po bas gtsang sa rang gi khyim du song gas skye dgra'i bdag mo chen mo go ta ma'i la bos te 'di skad ces smra so// gzhon nu m+b+ha khang du bkur gyis rgyun gyis/
73b2: legs par brgyan par gyis shig legs so zhes skye dgu'i bdag me chen mo go ta mis de ltar mnyan te/ gzhon nu brgyan gyis brgyan to// de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro
73b3: gnyer med pas shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis sru so la smras pa/ ma bdag gang du bkur/ smras pa/ khu lha khang du bkur ro// de nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum ste bgad nas sru mo la tshigs su bcad de smras
73b4: pa/ / bdag btsas de tshe stong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur// brgya byin tshangs pa lha min lto 'phye chen po dang // nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dang gzhon nu yang // spyi bo rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal
73b5: de ring ma yis gang du bdag bkur bgyi ba yi/ / lha gzhan bdag gi gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchi/ lha rnams kun las bdag 'phags
73b6: lha li lha lags te/ / bdag 'dra'i lha yangs sa kyis gang mgul nachis// 'on kyang 'jig nyi nag cas du bdags 'o// bdag gi nas 'phrul ste bos mthong na dgang 'gyur zhing // ri gro bca
