73b7: sti shin tu che bar bgyid 'gyur la/ / lha mis 'di ni lha yi lha zhes rig par 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ bkra shas thams cad bshams
73b8: te rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu pang du blangs nas/ bram ze dang / grong rdal ba dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / mdza' ba shes

74a1: dang / nye dus bsor te/ srang dang / las ni bzhi ma do dang / mad sus dang / yang sa can chad med pas btsun pa dganas 'dug sus rgyarnamams na 'dugs ma gsal ma dga'
74a2: ta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang gi phun lod ni cher gyur/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgred/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra ni phyung ste/ song bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag
74a3: gis byang chub sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char phab ste/ sil snyan sgra 'byin par gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang
74a4: mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhan nu de khyer te lha khang du byin to// de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der nang pa g.yas
74a5: pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang / de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lta ste/ gu lang dang / skem byed dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / nam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
74a6: sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang / / rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong ni kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang /
74a7: tsatsa dang / gzha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to// ser sna'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// lha'i me tog gi char yang bab po// lha'i sil snyan brgya stong
74a8: ma dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / lha gang dag gi gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sla bar gyur to// ri rgyal ri mchog ra

74b1: rab nam yang yungs kar 'bru la phyag mi 'tshal/ / rgya mtsho klu rje gnas ni nam yang brjes tshul phyag mi 'tshal// nyi zla 'od byed srin bu me khyer 'od byed de la phyag mi 'tshal// bsod nams shes rab rigs
74b2: byung legs ldan lha rnams gang la'ang phyag mi bzhes/ / yungs 'brub rjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dra bar gyur pa ni/ stong gsum 'di na lha mi gang yang rung ste nga rgyal gnas pa lags// ri rab rgya mtsho nyi tha
74b3: 'dre ba 'jig rten rang byung dam pa ste/ de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal ba ni mtho ris mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du zhugs pa de bstan bI tse// lha'i bubacu stong phrag sum bcurtsa
74b4: gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed par gyur to/ / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du khyer pa'i tshe btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i rkyen ni de yin/ rgyu ni de yin no//
74b5: lha khang du khyer pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don 'char po zhes bya ba 'char 'gro'i pha/ bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te/ skar ma me bzhi
74b6: 'das nas nag pa la bab pa'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// da ni gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa
74b7: legs kyis byed du chug shig/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis// rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/ 'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang / rkang pa'i rgyu dag dang / margal/
74b8: rgyan dag dang / mgul bya can dag dang / so ga dag dang / na rgyan dag dang / das rgyan dag dang / gcer gyis rigs dag dang / gser srung dag dang / dril zug sa ka'i rnga bdag dang / rinam pa'i na ba da/

75a1: dang lhamar na ba cas byas pa dag dang / rag sa nas pa snga chags kyis brgyan pa dag dang / gang ba can dgu dang / mthal gang bdag dang / nga par dag kyang byed du brtags / nga
75a2: rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ / shAkya de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon du rgyun du gsol// rgyal pos smras pa// khyed kyis gnon nu la brgyan pa dang / mdzad pa byas
75a3: pas chog gis/ ngas gzhon nu'i spyan thams cad byed du bcug go/ smras pa/ bdag cag gi rgyan 'di dag gnon nu'i sbrul gdugs mtshan bdun zhig gdags gsol// de ltar gnang na bdag cag
75a4: gis sug las bgyis pa yang don mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe nam langs te nyi ma shar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshal bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba der zhugs so// de'i tshe
75a5: dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis byang chub sems dpa' bang du blangs so/ / bud med brgyad khris kyang byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// bu mo stong phrag bcus byang chub
75a6: sems dpa' bsdu ste gdod du lta zhing lakhod par gyur to/ / shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bskya ste/ gdong dril zhing 'khod par gyur to// bram ze lnga stong ma lhags nas byang chub sems
75a7: dpa'i gdong du la zhing 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji snyed cig byas pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags te// de dag lus la btags ma thag tu byung
75a8: chu sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis mag mog por gyur nas lam mer ma gyur/ / lhan ner ma gyur/ wang der ma gyur te// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsa'i yug bzhag na lam mar

75b1: ma da 'jug na sug pa s+ho/ /
75b2: chub sems dpa'i sras la shags pa dang de gatshigs ga par gyu / de la sted per na/ 'dam tha chuba'i gas kyi gan du thugs khrag bzhag pa sad pal la ma

75b4: gser kyis gang khyab dri med mdzes gyur kyang / / 'dzam bu'i chu ba'i gser gzigs gcig gis zil chug ste/ gsar gzhan dag ni dpal dang bral zhing gsal mi 'gyur// sa 'di mtha' dga'angam bu'i
75b5: gling gi gser khebs kyang / / 'dren pa dpal rgyas spu lud 'od phyung zil gyis non// mi snad ma gas mi mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing / bde gshegs skyob pa'i drung na sdug tsa bzhin du 'gyur// yon tan brgyas
75b6: gang 'di ni rang gi gzi yis brgyan/ / de ni rgyan gyis mdzes min shin du dri med sku// nyi bla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu me dag dang / brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od kyang dpal sdug mdun mi gsal// gang sku sngon
75b7: gyi dge ba'i 'bras bus mtshan spras pa/ / de la gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyan phal ci zhig dgos// rgyan rnams grol 'or mi mkhas mkhas mdzad ma gtse shig/ blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan mi
75b8: bzhed/ / 'dun pa 'di ni rgyal kha ba sras dang lhan cig btsas// dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams 'bangs de stsol// shAkya'i rigs ni rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas/ shAkya dag ni yid dga' mgu zhing

76a1: ga na ga ma sa dus ga na / gnon nung ma zad shes pa dang /
76a2: / krigs brgya stong sa nas drug brta ga brgyas yangs su bag cing mdun du bdang yiga'i glang 'jug pa byas sa batha' ba dang / ba' ba dang / mang bas ga/
76a3: ga stong phrag bcu dang / gseng dngul dang / dbyig gis gang pa'i shing na stong phrag bzurdzangs te/ sang kyu'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen pa'i srad dang / grong bar dang / tshad dus kyi phyogs gang yin bdag
76a4: gtong to/ / mngon par byin no// sil snyan 'bram phrag brgyad kyi sgra yang phyung zhing me tog gi char chen po yang babag// stegs pa dang / sgo/ gang dang / rkababs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
76a5: khang bzang sa dag gi steng nas// bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bdag/ byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing me tog 'thong bar 'gyur to// lha'i bu mo snying phrag brgyad ni rgyan rnams kyis lkug sug por brgyan
76a6: rin po na bzang byed thogs nas lam 'phyag cing byang chub sems dpa'i man nas dong bar gyur to/ / sgra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / zham yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang / mi mcho ga/ /
76a7: rnams kyang lus byed blang zhing nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog dang / dang gyi lnga ldi 'bre bar gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams pa dkyang rgyal po zas gcang ma mdun du bdang nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas dang
76a8: bar gyur te/ bkod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i slar zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i glang zhugs ma thag tu de nas// byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes

76b1: gnyen zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gza brda ma padza nga/ 'grub tu gyul to// dkar skyel ba dang dga' ldan gyi ngas kyi sa'i bu yan lag bzang ba zhes bya bas mthang nas// lag
76b2: g.yas pas bteg ste bsrung ngo / / bslang nas kyang de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang mo dang skye bo phal po ched dag la tshigs su bca de smras pa// me yi 'jig rten 'din bstan
76b3: bcos gang yod pa/ / grangs dang yi ge rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang / 'jig rten bzo yi sbyor bcang med mang ba dag/ bskal pa bye mang sngon cad 'dis ni de dag bslabs// 'on kyang skye bo'i rdzas su
76b4: 'thun pa tsam mdzad de/ / byis pa mang po zag pa mchog la smin mdzad dang / sems can khrag khrig gnan yang tshi med dgod pa'i phyir/ shin tu lobs pa'ang bslab phyir yi ge'i grwar zhugs so// 'jig rten
76b5: 'das pa'i bden pa ni lam gyi tshul mkhyen cing / / rgyal brten nas ji ltar 'byung ba de la 'ang mkhas// ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags zad bisil 'gyur de tshul yang // mkhyen na yi ge'i bstan bcos tsam lta cis
76b6: mi mkhyen/ / 'jig rten gsum na 'di yi slob dpon gong na med// lha dang ming bcas nang na 'di nyid gtso bo ste// bskal pa bye mang sngon chad gang la 'dis bslabs pa'i// yi ge de dag ming yang khyed kyis shes mi
76b7: 'gyur/ / 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna tshogs gang 'byung ba// skad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa 'dis mkhyen te// gzugs med bltar mi snang ba'i tshul yang rab mkhas na/ yi ge gzugs yod
76b8: paltar snang dag lta smos cing gos/ de skad ces smras nas// lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog mang pos gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas ma ma dang bran mo'i 'khor bkod de/ rgyal

77a1: babs gtsang ma lamags pa shAkya gzhanan phyung dang / / danas byang chubasams dang cad m+b+ha gyi snang ba las rgya ca dag shing na na kyis rgyags pa// gsar gyisang nan

77a4: gal ba'i yi ke'am/ ba drag mi ge / the lda pa'i yig 'as/ kar ta Sha la 'a/ lte phyogs pa'i mi ga'am/ drug shus can gyi yi 'a/ gas kyi mi 'as/ sbyin drugs pa'i leg
77a5: su 'thun pa'i yi ge 'am/ bru sha yi ge'as/ ka sha'i yi ge 'am/ r+g+ha'i yi ge 'am/ phun 'i yi ge'am/ rkun 'i yi ge/ 'am/ yi ge 'bring dang / rgyas par bri ba'i yi ge 'am/ rgyal gyi yi ge 'am/ lha'i yi ge'am/

77b1: 'am/ bstan bcos bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/ rtsis bskor ba'i yi ge 'am/ gdeg pa bskor ba'i yi ga 'am/ gzhag pa bskor bar yi ge 'am/ rkang pas bskor ba yag 'am/ tshig lan lan gnyis sug
77b2: pa'i tshig gi mtshams kyi yi ge'am/ tshig gi mtshams bcur brgyad pa'i bar gyi yi ge'am// thathams su bstan pa'i yi ge 'as/ tha thams cad kun du skud pa'i yi ge'am/ rig pa dang 'thun par ma
77b3: gelas/ rnam par dzes par/ drang phreng gis da// thub spyad pa'i migal/ nges pa'i miga'am/ sa ba pa'i miga'as/ rnams par blta ba'i migs/ skarnapas
77b4: thab gan mangs rna ga ma la mas sa nga sa ga na mig drug cwa rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas bdag la gang bsla/ / de nas byis pa'i sgrub dpon can gyi ba shes gnyen
77b5: mtshar du gyur nas bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung ste/ nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa med par byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che// bstan bcos kun las
77b6: bslabs gyur kyang / / 'jig rten 'jig rten rjes bsnyag byar// yi ge'i glar ni byon par gyur// yi ge gang gi ming dag kyang // bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa// de la 'di ni byang gyur kyang // yi ge slob
77b7: pa'i grwa byon to/ / 'di yi zhal ni mthong med kyi// skye gtsug 'phags pa bltar mi snang // yi ge'i shes rab mthar byin na/ bdag gis 'di go ji ltar bslab// lha yi lha chen lha 'di ni// lha rnams kun
77b8: gya mchog mkhas pa/ / khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med// jig rten gang zag do zla med// bdag kyang 'di nyid mthu yis na// shes rab thabs kyi khyad par gyis// 'jig rten kun gyi dpung gnyen po/

78a1: sa / ga narnas zug u0f7f sgyu
78a2: byis pa de dag laga' byem lda nga gang gi sa/ a shes brjod pa dang tshe/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i sna byung po// zhes brjod pa dang bdag med pa m+b+ha po// senas brjod pa dang dbang bzhi
78a3: du yangs pa'i sna byung ngo / / I zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni yams kyi nadamang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byud // sa zhes brjod pa dang 'gro bani 'cha ba mang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu byung ngo // sku zhes brjod pa dang 'grog
78a4: dma' ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / / e zhes brjod pa dang / nyes pa ni btsal ba las byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // oM zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i lam ni dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // oM zhes brjod pa
78a5: dang chu bo las rgal ba'i sgra byung ngo / / oM zhes brjod pa dang rtsub pa'i sgra byung ngo // aM zhes brjod pa dang bdag gi ba mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // aHzhes brjod pa dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //
78a6: ka zhes brjod pa dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug shes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // kha zhes brjod pa dang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // gzhes brjod pa dang chos zab
78a7: ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / / g+ha zhes brjod pa dang ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang ling thog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // nga zhes brjod pa dang yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra
78a8: byung ngo / / tsa zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgra byung ngo // cha zhes brjod pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i sgra byung ngo // dza zhes brjod pa dang rga shi las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgra

78b1: byung / / zhes brjod pa dang 'chi byed kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi dpung tshar gcad pa'i sgra byung ngo // nya nas brjod pa dang shes par byed pa'i sgra byung // Ta zhes brjod pa dang lam shinang chad pa'i sa byung /
78b2: zhes brjod pa dang dri ba gzhag pa'i sgra byung ngo // Da zhes brjod pa dang dkrugs ma dang bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgra byung ngo ro// D+ha zhes brjod pa dang yul mi gtsang ba'i sgra byung ngo // Na zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa
78b3: ni phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / / ta zhes brjod pa dang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // tha zhes brjod pa dang mthu stobs dang shugs dang mi 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo // da zhes brjod pa dang
78b4: sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i sgra byung ngo // d+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa rnams kyi nor ni rnam pa bdun no zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo ro// na zhes brjod pa dang mI dang gzugs yongs
78b5: su zhem par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / / pa zhes brjod pa dang don dam pa'i ska byung ngo // bzhes brjod pa dang 'bras pa rnyed pa mngon du bya ba'i sgra byang ngo // bzhes brjod pa dang bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i
78b6: zla byung ngo / / b+ha zhes brjod pa dang srid pa 'jig pa'i sna byung ngo // ma zhes brjod pa dang rgyal dang rgyags pa zhi bar bya ba'i sgra byang ngo // ya zhes brjod pa dang chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i sgra byug
78b7: ra zhes brjod pa dang dga' ba la dga' ba med pa ni don dam par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / / la zhes brjod pa dang 'khri shing chad pa'i sgra byung ngo // la zhes brjod pa dang theg pa mchog gi sgra byung ngo //

79a1: mthun pa ye shes mngon pa rdzogs pa byang nab par tha ba ma byung / / tanas brjod pa nga nya mangs pa pa la na 'ad chags dang thal bar ma byung // nam brjod pa dang mdan

79a3: med pa byung bar gyur te/ / byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i 'gra ni 'dug pa'i tshe byis pa sum khri nyis stong rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so// byang chub
79a4: sems dpa' logs par gyur kyang yi ge'i grwar 'jug pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/ / rkyen ni de yin no// yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / dge slong dag gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas

79a7: bcas te 'dug go/ / 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa rnyed de rnyed nas kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dag pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las sna

79b3: spangs te snga ma nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan ban

80b8: bcas te bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / des de'i tshe shing thams cad kyi grib ma yol na/ 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib pa ni byang chub sems dpa' lus mi gtong bar 'dug par mthong nas ngo mtshad

81a1: du gyur te/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rings shing myur ba sbyar ba'i gzugs kyis// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te tshigs
81a2: su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / rgyal po gzhon nu de la gzigs// 'dzam bu'i shing grib bsam gtan mdzad// brgya byin tshangs pa ji bzhin du// gzi brjid dpal gyis rab tu mdzes// zhugs shing gang gi
81a3: grib ma la/ / mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i// grib ma des ni de ma btang // skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad la sgrib// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
81a4: byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// ri yi sprol ma 'bar 'dra ba ste// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs nang 'dug 'dra zhing // gzi brjid sgron 'dra
81a5: bsam gtan byed mthong na/ / nga yi lus 'di shin tu 'dar bar gyur/ de skad ces smras nas// des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// thub pa gang tshe bltam pa dang /
81a6: gang tshe 'od ldan bsam gtan mdzad// 'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su// mgon po khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo// de'i tshe byis pa khri'u thogs pa dag ca co'i sgra 'byin par gyur nas// de dag la blon po dag gis
81a7: sgra mche sbra mche zhes byas pa dang / de dag ci zhig nongs shes zer ro// blon po dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan bzang po mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang
81a8: mnga' ba 'di de ltar mi g.yo zhing bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshe/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yol te song yang / shing gi gribs de sa yol zhing sgrib par gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpyid 'das dbyar gyi

81b1: dus pa ba byar zlar ba la/ / ba tog rgyas shing me tog pa la gas 'bas gyur te// khrung ldangs rgyan ce gags skad khyen pa// gakyi tha dag la tha ma 'dod par gyur// 'dun pa can gyis smras gzhan /
81b2: nags tshal dag ni gzigs pa mdzad skad du// byis pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor te gshegs pa'i rigs// bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci zhig bgyi// bdag cag rnams ni bu mo'i tshogs
81b3: rnams sgron du mchi/ / nyi ma'i gung la sems can rnam par dag pa de// byis pa lnga brgya dag gis bskor nas lhan cig tu// yab las gsol yum la ma gsol mtsher bar// de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams
81b4: kyi grong du song / / rgyal po dam pa'i zhing pa dag gi grong de na// 'dzam bu'i sdong chen yal ga mang po rgyas yod pa// gzhon nus mthong nas nyam thag sdug bsngal phog gyur te// 'dus byas ci rung sdug bsngal
81b5: mang zhes snying rje byed/ / dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'dzam bu'i grib mar song / rtsa dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas ni// skyil mo krung 'dug drang por lus srang bsam gtan bzhi// dge ba dge
81b6: la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan byed/ / drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nas dang dong na// 'dzam bu'i shing gi steng du byin nas 'dod ma nus// de dag thogs nas nga rgyal rdzogs pa spang bya zhing /
81b7: de dag thams cad 'thun par lhan cig lta bar byed// bdag cag ri mchog ring ba de bzhin khor yug dag/ thal byung zags thogs med par shugs kyis dong dong na// bdag cag de ring 'jam bum
81b8: ljon 'di las ni/ / 'da' bar ma nus 'di la rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod// babs te sa stengs 'dug nas 'dzam bu'i shing drung na// shAkya'i bu pho byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid can// 'dzam klung gser gyi 'od 'gro/

82a1: 'dra ba 'od zer ldan// sbrul mo dkrung bcas bsam gtan byed pa de tshe mthong // de dag rmad gyur ci bar sor bcu thal sbyar te// thal mo sbyar ba rkang par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal to// gro/
82a2: ba shin tu bde mdzad legs par bltam pa legs// myur du rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsir sems can thul// sdong po mchog ni pad ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud/ gdugs yol gyur kyang grib mas bde bar
82a3: gshegs mi gtong / / lha rnams stong phrag mang po gnas pa thal sbyar nas// nges par byas pa de yi rkang par phyag kyang 'tshal// zas gtsang rgyal po bdag gi khyim na yongs tshol zhing // nga'i bu gzhon/
82a4: nu de ni gang du song zhes rmed// sru mos smras pa bdag gis btsal kyang ma rnyed na// gzhon nu de ni gar bzhud rgyal pos spras par gsol// zas gtsang rgyal pos nyung ngum dag la rings par spras/
82a5: nga'i gzhon nu 'di nas byung bar la las mthong ngam zhes// sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang mi kun la'ang smras// lha gcig khyod gson mchog de zhing ba'i grong du bzhud// de ni rings par shAkya rnams dang
82a6: lhan cig tu/ / byung nas dpal zhugs gyur pa'i zhing ba'i grong du bltas// ji ltar nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig shar ba ltar// de ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing phan byed 'dug pa mthong // cod pan ral gri lham dag pa
82a7: zad phog phud de/ / mgo bor sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas phyag kyang 'tshal// drang srong bdag nyid chen po legs par yang dag smra// gzhon nu byang chub don du mngon par 'byung du nges// rab tu dang lha
82a8: brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshad pa dang / / de bzhin shAkya lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs pa dang // bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul mthong // bsam partan pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyang skyed// des ni

82b1: stong gsum ma lusas rnams rab skyed nas/ / dun dang shes banan tang na las langs gyur te// mdag bzang ldan pas yab la tshangs par chag brjod pa// yab cig zhang zlas por la gzhan las ma sa
82b2: mdzad/ / gal te gser zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis gser char dpag// de sten bza' 'tshal na'ang bdag gis na bza' dbul// 'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis 'bru char dbab// mi dbang khyod kyis
82b3: 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor/ / yab dang de bzhin skye bo 'khor la bstan byas nas// skad cig de la de slar grong khyer mchog tu zhugs// 'gro dang 'thun pa tsam du grong khyer der gnas kyi// sems can namadag
82b4: mngon par 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan/ / zhing ba'i grong gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bdun pa//
82b5: dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes pa dang / dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe/ shAkya kan rabs rkan rabs kha cig gis/
82b6: rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang / thongs pa dang ldan pa'i lha mang pos 'di skad du bstan/
82b7: te/ gzhon nu 'di gal te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// ji ste mngon par ma byung na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma
82b8: bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po

83a1: tshe dang / nong bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin pa cha dang / blon par na po che dang bdun no// de la bu dba' ba/ rdul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan
83a2: sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba 'byung ngo / / de gnod par bya ba dang / mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun pas su'i dkyil 'khor 'di las mngon par rgyal bar byas te/ gcig pu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes ma
83a3: de'i slad du gzhon nu de'i btsun mo blang bar bgyi'o/ / de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ dgyes pa la longs spyod cing mngon par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur dang bdag cag
83a4: gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdung yang mi 'chad/ / khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang mi snyan par mi brjod cing rib gror bgyi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ gal te da ltar byan
83a5: de'i phyir gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i bu mo gang zhig yod khyed kyis ltos shig/ de'i tshe shAkya lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun no// bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu
83a6: tshul dang 'thun no zhes zer ro/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de ni shin du phul che ba yin gyis/ gzhon nu nyid la khyod bu mo gang 'dod ces dri bar bya'o zhes// de dag kun kyang 'dus te/ gzhon nu la dngos po
83a7: de brjod do/ / gzhon nus spras pa// nga ste dgung bdun na 'di'i lan gsan par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te// 'dod pa'i skyon ni bdag gis mtha' yas rig/ thab mo khon
83a8: bcas mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa/ / 'jigs byed drug gi lo mo 'dra ba ste/ me dang 'dra zhing ral gri'i so dang 'dra 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag 'dod ma yin te// bdag ni bud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin// bsam

83b1: gtan ting 'dzin bde bas zhi sems su/ / bdag ni mi smra nags tshal gnas par bya// yang ngas brtags nas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas/
83b2: snying rje chen po bskyed de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dam dang lhag lcig khrod nas pad ma rnam par 'phel// mi rnams gang ba'i nang ngan rgyal po mchod pa 'thogro// gang tshe byang chub sems
83b3: dpa' 'khor mchog thob gyur pa/ / de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba// de dag kun gyis btsun mo sas dang sras kyang bstan// 'on kyang 'drod
83b4: pas chags med bsam gtan bde ma nyams/ / bdag kyang de dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya// gang la spyod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa// bud mod phal ba gang yang bdag gi tshul 'thun min//
83b5: gang zhig bdag gi sems ni mngon par dga' byed cing // bag yod gzugs dang na chod rus rigs dag pa 'os// des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad de yi ger bris// 'di 'dra'i bu mo mchis na bdag la
83b6: bka' stsol cig/ skye bo phal ba ma bsdams bdag la mkho ma lags// yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan pa ches na bdag stsol cig/ dang cing gzugs bzang ldan yang gzugs kyi dregs dang bral/
83b7: phu ru ma la byams ltar byams pa'i sems ldan zhing // gtong la dga' ste dge sbyong bram ze sbyin tshul can// de 'dra'i bu mo mchis na yab kyi bdag stsol cig/ gang la nga rgyal khengs dang zhe sdang ma mchis
83b8: shing / / g.yo dang phrag dog sgra spangs drang pa'i ngang tshul can// rmi lam na yang skyes pa gzhan la chags dang bral// bdag gi khyos ni cho ga 'tshal rtag sngob bag mchis la// rgyags pa ma mchis mi g.yeng

84a1: drang thub tshul 'chang zhing / / nga rgyal ma mchis 'gyed dang bral bas bran ma bzhin// sgra draral ma chags cad lam chags te/ 'ad bral brnab sapas ma mchis rang gnang gyis 6/
84a2: bden la gnas shing mi 'phyar g.yeng ba ma lags pa// ngo tsha'i gos 'tshal rgod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas// lha dang bkra shis ma chags rtag tu chos la brtson// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos
84a3: po rab dag pa/ / gnyid dang rmugs pa mi mang nga rgyal glen bral zhing // rtog dang ldan la legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod de// gyos sgyug gnyis la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi rim gror ldan// bran dang bran mo kun
84a4: la'ang bdag bzhin byams srel pa/ / smad 'tshod bzhin du bstan bcos cho ga 'tshal cing mkhas// slad kyis nyal zhing sngon du mal nas ldang bgyid pa// byams pas rjes snyegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma
84a5: mchis pa/ de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas// mdun na 'don la smras pa/ bram ze chen po khyod
84a6: ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song la/ / khyim thams cad du'ang song ste/ bu mo dag ltos la gang la yang rung ste yon tan de lta bu dag yod na// rgyal rigs kyi bu me yang rung / bram ze'i bu mo yang
84a7: rba/ rdo'i rigs kyi tha mo yang drang / dmangs rigs kyi bu mo yang drang gis/ bram de dag 'dir yon cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhanan 'di ni rigs don du gnye ba ma phan gyi// gzhon du 'di ni yon tan dang
84a8: gnyer ba yin no/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// rgyal rigs bram ze'i bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dmangs rigs de bzhin te// su la yon tan 'di yod pa'i// bum de ni 'dir 'an cig

84b1: ma tha' dgis dag dang / / al 'anam pan// tan dan pacas nams// dala'adal yang dkag// dag kyang dgad nas tham ce / dmachags sa ma dang pag
84b2: khyer te/ / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song nas// khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing tshol du song song ba las/ yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo ma mthong ste/ de nas rimi gyis
84b3: lag na bcon can gyi khyim du phyin nas/ des bltas na/ bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta na sdug la yid du 'ong ba// mdog bzang pos rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/
84b4: ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi gnag pa/ gzod ma ngar la bab pa/ bud med rin po che ltar snang ba zhig mthong ba dang / bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don
84b5: de'i rkang pa gnyis nas bzung ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze chen po khyod la dgos pa ci zhig mchis// bram ze 'dun na 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zas gtsang sras po gzugs ni mchog tu
84b6: mdzes gyur cing / / sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan yon tan gzi brjid can// de yis bud med rnams kyi yon tan yi ger bris// su la yon tan 'di yod de'i chung mar 'os// zhes smras te/ des de la yi ge de
84b7: byin no/ / de nas bu mo nges tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de klags nas/ bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ bram ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bram ze yon tan 'di dag bdag la kun tshad gis/
84b8: nges pa'i gzugs can de ni bdag gi khyim thab po// gal te gzhon nu bzhed na phyi shol ma mdzad gsungs// brgya la skye bo phal dang bzhugs par 'gyur yang gda'// de nas bram ze mdun na 'don de/ rgyal po

85a1: zas gtsang ma'i drung du song ste don de brjod pa/ rgyal ba chen po bdag gis gzhan nu'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i tham mthong ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ sngal de la bu zhig yod/ smras pa/ lha shAkya lag
85a2: nabacon can la phra mo de lta bzhig mchis so/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de ni shin du bral che zhing / bzang pal mos pa yin la// bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa
85a3: dag kyang / bdag la yon tan yod par khas len gyis/ bdag gis yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag cig byas te/ gzhon nu la 'di bu mo thams cad la sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/ bu mo de dag gi nang nas gang la gzhon
85a4: nu mig mngon par chags par gyur pa de/ gnon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs las byed du bcug nas ser skya'i
85a5: gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na kun gyis kyang gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag kyang bu mo dag la sbyin pa byed kyis// bu mo thams cad kyang
85a6: 'dun khang du shog shig ces bsgo'o/ / dge slong dag de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dun khang du song ste/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas bya rab dag bkod nas/
85a7: gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang la mig chags pa de dal gyis shig ces bsgo'o// dge slong dag de nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de na bu mo gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang ga la
85a8: de dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blang ba'i phyir der dong ngo // dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas bu mo ji ltar 'ongs pa de dag la yid du

85b1: bong ba'i yo byad rnams byin no/ / de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shing myur ba myur bar byir dong ngo // de nas shAkya lag na btson
85b2: can gyi bu mo sa 'tshom zhes bya ba/ bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'dun khang ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / mig mi 'dzums par byang chub sems dpa'
85b3: la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug par gyur to/ / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag bya ni zin par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas 'dzum dmyal te byang chub sems
85b4: dpa' la 'di skad ces smra so/ / gzhon nu bdag gis khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na/ bdag la de ltar/ dang na sngar mdzad// smras pa/ ngas ni khyod la dang na sdang byas pa 'ang med na/ khyod ni shin tu 'phyis te 'ongs
85b5: so zhes smras nas des sor gdub srang brgya stong du ma ri ba phung de de la byin no/ / bu mo des smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod la bdag gis 'di lta zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/ smras pa/ 'o na rgyan gzhan dang gzhan dag
85b6: yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod byer cig/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu bdag ni rgyan ma mchis par bgyid pa ma lags kyi/ rgyan dang ldan par bgyid pa lags so// zhes smras nas bu mo de song ngo // de nas byar ba
85b7: bkod pa'i mi de dag rgyal ba zas gcad ma'i drung du sang nas/ lo zlas de dag spros te/ smras pa/ lpa shAshwa la gan btson can gyi bu mos 'tsham zhes bgyi ba de la gzhon nu thun chags pa mur la chung byung
85b8: cig tu bka' mched kyang cas so/ / de nas rgyal ba zas gtsang mas chog dkris nas shAkyal gan brtson can gyigan du bram ze ma nan 'don pa nyar btang ste/ khyod kyi tham nag yod pa der gzhan nu

86a1: gas sbya / / lag // lags pag da par 'grus pa gas/ ga gan nga
86a2: s+yAHla shes pa la thus gtong ga/ b+h+ya rgyal mi shes pa la mi gtong ba lags na/ gzhan nu de ni b+h+ya cal shes pa yang ma lags la// ra la gi'i thakhas dang / 'thod dang / stobs dang kya
86a3: stangs kyi tshul shes pa yang ma lags na/ / bdag gis sgyu rtsal shes pa ma lags pa la bu mo ji ltar gtang / tshig de rgyal po la bzlas pa dang / de nas rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ nga la des 'di
86a4: dang lan gnyis su bsngos te/ gang gi tshe ngas shAkya gzhon nu dag gzhon nu'i rim gro byed nga ci'i phyir mi 'ong zhes byas pa de'i tshe yang // ci ded lug gi rim gro byed du 'ong ngam zhes zer la/ de'ang 'di
86a5: skad zer ro snyam du sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpas kyang gtam de thos nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung
86a6: gnag par bzhugs/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de dri pas ci zhig bya/ gzhon nus smras pa/ lha de ni bka' mi stsal du mi rung ngo zhes lan gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas rgyal po zas
86a7: gtsang ma la dris pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po de dgra brjod do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha grong khyer 'di na bdag dang sgyu rtsal gyis 'gran par nus
86a8: pa 'ga' mchis sam/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bgod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// bu khyod kyis sgyu rtsal bstan par nus sam/ smras pa/ lha de ni bdag gis legs

86b1: par rngo thog go/ de bas na sgyu rtsal 'tshal ba rnams kun kyang bstsal tu gsol// de dag gi mdun ba dag gis sgyu rtsal bstan par bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por/
86b2: dril gyi sgra bsgrogs te// de nas zhag bdun na gzhon nu rang gi sgyu rtsal ston gyis/ der sgyu rtsal shes pa thams cad shog shig ces bsgo'o// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsa mchod
86b3: bar gyur to/ / de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du bzhag ste/ 'dir ral gri'i thabs dang 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyis su rgyal ba de ni 'di khyer cig ces
86b4: dam bcas nas/ de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lha'i sbyin grong khyer nas byung ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon nu par glang po dkar po bong shin du che ba zhig grong khyer du khrid pa gzhon nu lha sbyin
86b5: gyis mthong nas phrag dog dang / shAkya'i nga rgyal dang / stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas/ des glang po de lag pa g.yon pas sna nas bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pas thal mo lan cig bsnun pas bsad
86b6: par gyur to/ / de'i 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' bo byung ba dang / des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi sgor bsad pa mthong nas/ sus bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsad do//
86b7: smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes// des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/ grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'
86b8: shing rta la zhon te byung ba dang / byang chubo sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sus bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa lha sbyin gyis bsad do// smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legra pa

87a1: zhig byas so/ / grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sus bor zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos bor ro// smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos de ltar byas pa yang legs na/ sems can 'di ni lus/
87a2: chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rul na grong khyer thams cad dri mi zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rtal 'dug bzhin du rkang pa ya cig sa la brkyang ste/ rkang pa'i mthe bos glang po de grangs
87a3: rab bdun rim dang 'obs bdun rim 'das nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags gcig tsam du 'phangs so/ / glang yo phyogs gang lhung ba'i phyogase shing checan po zhig tu gyur nas/ de ltar gang po'i shong zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe lhad me brgya stong
87a4: mang po e mas la la zhes zer shing tsaco dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin la/ gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin par 'gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// glang po'i
87a5: dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa/ / zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs// ra ba bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs bzlas nas// grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs// mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'dis
87a6: ni gdon mi zar/ / rgyal stobs kyis mtha ba'i lus can rnams// 'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol rgyang rang ba/ shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'ben par 'gyur/ dge slong dag de nas shAHgzhon nu
87a7: sa mthong khyer nas 'thon nas/ sa'i phyogs gang du shAkyagazhan nu dag rtsal ston pa der dadeng // la po zas gtsang ma dang / shAk+Sha rabs rgan rabs dag dung / skye bo bal po che dag kyang
87a8: sasas dpa' dang / gzhon nu gzhan dag gi hrIHla gyi byed par mthang bar 'dod desa'i phyogs dang dang // de nas thig mar shAkyagazhan nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i chag shes

87b1: de dag dang byang chub se sa dngas ge zan / dag gas ba dpan can tha thags gshin dbang nga bgag / gzhan dag gang nas// yin zhas/ gi rdzu zas
87b2: byin pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyed kyis bye brag phye shig/ de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' yige la mkhas par mngon du mthong bas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/
87b3: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mi yi 'jig rten lha yi 'jig rten nam// lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam// 'jig rten kun gyi yi ge ji snyed gang // de la sems can dag pa 'dis mthar
87b4: phyin/ / mi yi zla ba 'di yis gang mkhyen pa'i// yi ge dag dang yi ge'i sna grangs kyi// ming yang khyed dang ngas ni yod mi shes// 'di la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur// shAkya rnams kyis smras
87b5: pa gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags par chug ste/ gzhon nu 'di grangs kyis shes pa la khyad par ci yod 'gran par bya'o// de nas shAkya srid sgrub ces bya brtsis pa chen po byed pa bgrang ba
87b6: dang / rtsis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dbang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'bags khyod kyis ltos shig/
87b7: ces byas te// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ni rtsis mgo phog/ shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis ni brtsis pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la slebs par ma nus so// de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis
87b8: dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu brtsis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lam slebs

88a1: k u ku rgyu nadun tu ga sa ga du
88a2: mchod pa la ma smrangs / saHgzhan nu gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhid lda / ga / sum bcu dang / dang / du ldan pa gnas
88a3: kyimi dus gcig tu kyis mgo log tu byang chub sems dpas kyis kyis tshad pal ma slabs so/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dis brgyad de yang ci rung gos// byad thams cad gag
88a4: 'dus te rtsis mgo phog shig dang / kho bos brtsi'o// de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas tshig gcig tu brjod pas snga phyi med par rtsis mgo phog na// byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brtsis te/ de ltar
88a5: shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug thug par gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' med par gyur to// de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
88a6: smras so/ / legs pa'i blo mnga' 'di dris na/ mkhyen pa shin tu myur ba ste// shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam/ kun kyang rtsis kyi lam la thug/ de ye shes rab 'di 'dra ste// ye shes blo gros dran ldan yang / rtsis
88a7: kye mkhyen pa rgya mtsho de/ / da dung sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad// de nas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ shin du rmad du thung par sems shing / de'i tshe thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras
88a8: so/ / kye don grub gzhon nu khyed ni rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes thams cad stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal

88b1: na byang gra rnas pa ma mas bzung chu byugs pa/ / sha thags dang na nam ban rnas pa na // pa nas du sa 'dun pas sa / sa nga/
88b2: bsri sgrub grangs kyi shes pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam// smras pa/ lha rdo thog go// smras pa/ 'on gyis shig/ de nas byis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'dzi
88b3: skad ces smras so/ / gzhon nu khyod bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa zhes bgyi ba'i rtsis kyi lugs mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ shes so// smras pa/ 'on bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa'i rtsis kyi lugs
88b4: la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bye ba phrag brgyan ther 'bum zhes bya'o// ther 'bum phrag brgyan khrag khrig ces bya'o// khrag khrig phrag brgyan gtams pa zhes
88b5: bya'o/ / gtams pa phrag brgyan dkrigs pa zhes bya'o// dkrigs pa phrag brgyan me 'khrugs shes bya'o// mi 'khrugs phrag brgyan khyad byin ces bya'o// khyad byin phrag brgyan pang steng zhes bya'o//
88b6: pang steng phrag brgyan mang 'dzin ces bya'o// mang 'dzin phrag brgyan glang po'i stobs shes bya'o// glang po'i stobs phrag brgyan dogs 'thob ces bya'o// dogs 'thob phrag brgyan rnam par
88b7: gzhag pa gdagra pa zhes bya'o/ / rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa phrag brgyan rgyu rig ces bya'o// rgyu rig phrag brgyan lag sbyin zhes bya'o// lag sbyin phrag brgyan rgyu dbang zhes bya'o// rgyu
88b8: dbang phrag brgyan rdzogs thob ces bya'o/ / rdzogs thob phrag brgyan bgrang rtogs shes bya'o// bgrang rtogs phrag brgyan sgrib pa zhes bya'o// sgrib pa phrag brgyan stobs shes bya'o// stobs

89a1: zag brgyan pan rtags gas bya/ / dran rtags phrag brgyan rnas par bad shes ldan sa bya'o// sa pang ba shes ldan grag ga bag // dgasusun d+hag btan rnam nga
89a2: shes bya'o/ / rnam 'byung phrag brgyan de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i rjes kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang tsho par drangango // de yi yang gong na rtul
89a3: mtshan gyi rtse ma'i nang bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des ni gang gA'i gleng gi byam snyed brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang cod par rungango // de'i yang god na la mtshan gyirtsa ma nges par rdzogs pa zhes
89a4: ba'i grangs yod do/ / de'i yang gong na deng 'dren gdags pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gong na gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs shes bya ba'i
89a5: grangs yod do/ / de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs ldan zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gong na thams cad rnam par 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de// grangs des ni gang gI klung bcu'i bye ma brtsi ba'i/
89a6: gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo // de'i yang gong ma snying po mchog ces bya ba'i grangs yod de// grangs des ni gang gA'i klu bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo //
89a7: de'i yang gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de// grangs de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
89a8: chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba mngon du gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na grangs de shes pa ni nga dang gzhan yang de dang 'ang bsrid pa tha ma par gyur pa khyim gyi gnas

89b1: nas mngon par ma byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par gang yang med do/ / srid sgrub kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i grangs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi//
89b2: byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdul phra rabs kyi rdul bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni chung ngu gcig go/ rdul chung ngu bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go// nyi zer gyi rdul bdun
89b3: la ni ri bong rdul gcig go/ ri bong rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/ srom bdun la ni yungs 'bru gcig go// yungs 'bru/
89b4: bdun la ni nas gcig go// nas bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor bcu gnyis la ni mtho gang do// mtho do la ni khru gang ngo // khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo // gzhu stong la ni yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyad grags gcig/
89b5: kyang grags bzhi la ni dpag tshad gcig go/ de la khyed kyis nang nas dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yongs su shes/ srid sgrub kyis smras pa// gzhon nu bdag nyid kyang de la mgo rmongs na gzhan blo
89b6: chung ngu dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de bas na gzhon nus dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du mchis bshad du gsol/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rabs mi 'brus
89b7: khrag khrig gcig dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum bcu dang / bye ba drug bcu phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bum phrag lnga dang / khri nyis stong yod de/ dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab
89b8: de snyed cig yod do/ / de ltar 'jug pa des 'dzam bu'i gling 'di la ni dpag tshad bdun stong yod do// nub kyi ba lang spyod la ni dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags la ni dpag tshad dgu stong yod

90a1: do/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan la ni dpag tshad khri yod do// de ltar 'jug pa des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /
90a2: rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / khor yug dang khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag
90a3: brgya dang / 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'phrul dga' bye ba phrag brgyad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya dang / tsha sa ris skye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i mdunan
90a4: na 'don bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs chen bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge chung
90a5: bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can
90a6: 'du shes med pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'og min gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya
90a7: la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ces bya ste/ yangs shing rgya che ba de la dpag tshad du yod pa dang / dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang / dpag
90a8: tshad bye ba phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad ther 'bum phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad khrag khrig phrag du yod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpag tshad snying po dam pa'i rtsis kyi bar du thugs pa la rdul phra rab de

90b1: sna bu du yod ces bya ba tsas de ni grangs dang bgrang pa las 'das pa ste/ de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o// de bas kyang shin tu grangs med pa de skad kyi rdul phra rab na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig tan
90b2: gyi khams na yod do/ / byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rtsis pa chen po srid sgru ba dang / shAkya tshogs thams cad kyang tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te ngo mtshar zang du zung ba
90b3: nas/ de dag thams cad kyang gos re re zhig bzhag ste gos dang rgyan lhag ma gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo// de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
90b4: bye ba brgyan ther 'bum zer 'bum de bzhin du// khrag khrig dang ni gtams pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du// dkrigs pa mi 'khrugs bdag gi shes thug de god min// mtshungs pa med kyi mkhyen brtsis la deng/
90b5: lhag/ yang kye shAkya dag/ stong gsum dag gi rdul dang rtswa dang nags tshal dang // sman dang chu yi thigs pa ji snyed yod pa dang // dud zhes bya ba gcig lo 'di yis rtsi nus na// lnga brgya tsam dag gi lta ngo mtshar/
90b6: ci zhig che// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjodado//
90b7: dus gsum sems can ma lus ji snyed gang yod pa'i// sems dang sems byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dag/ mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag/ thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig
90b8: gis rab tu mkhyen/ / dge slong dag de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad zil gyis non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to// de'i rjes la 'tshongs pa dang / rgyal

91a1: dang / bde la sogs pa thams cad pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par ra phags par gyur nas// rnam ma pa'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis chags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// d+ham thun
91a2: dka' thab sdom pa'i yon tan dang / / bskal pa bye bar bzod dul byams stobs kyis// lus dang sems ni cinas yang mdzad pas// de yi shugs kyi khyad par mnyam par gyis// sems can mchog 'di grong
91a3: khyer 'di na bzhugs pa khyed kyis mthong / / 'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cadaH// skad cig gcig la rin chen gser dang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// rgyal ba dpag tu med pa
91a4: dag la mchod pa mdzad du bzhud/ / 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra brnyes pa de// byon tam bzhud par khyed kyis yod mi shes// ji tsam zhugs shes de la ci zhig bskyed// 'di ni mtshungs pa med kyis rim gro
91a5: skyed/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to// de nas shAkya de dag gis smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod pa'ang sad par bya'o// de nas byang chub
91a6: sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur to// shAkya gzhon nu sum bcu rtsa gnyis shig 'tshogs nas byang chub
91a7: sems dpa' la brgal ba ltar chos te 'khod do/ / de'i nang nas dga' bo dang / kun dga' bo gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal ba'i phyir drung du phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lag gis/
91a8: reg ma thag tu de gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang gzi brjid ma bzod de sa la skyel to// de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lhas bya ni nga rgyal can mthu snyems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang shAkya'i

91b1: rgyal gyis snyems la/ byang chub sems dpa' la sngo zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i lhad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te/ bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal to// de nas byang chub sems dpas
91b2: m a bsgrubs shing mi rings par spangs bzang por gzhon nu lhas byin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bsad pa'i blos ma yin gyi nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis nam mkha' las bskor bskar
91b3: sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bur gnod par 'gyur bas chog gis thams cad gcig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig/ de nas de
91b4: dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to/ / de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang / lus kyi
91b5: mthu ma bzod de/ byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la skyel bar gyur to// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing // ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo // nam mkha'i
91b6: dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ dbyangs gcig tu tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag kyang
91b7: chen stobs po che 'dral/ / cig char skyes bu'i mchog la rung gyur kyang // reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// lhun po ri rab rdo rje ri khor yug dang / phyogs bcu dag na ri gzhan gang yod pa// lag pas
91b8: mnyes shing dmig med phyir klog na/ / mi lus snying po med pa mtshar ci che// 'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang ba'i gyad// dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mtshan sder bcas pa// nag po'i rtsa lag

92a1: byams pa'i stobs kyis 'joms/ / bla med byang chub zhi bar 'tshang yang rgya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to// de nas shAkyalag na bcon can gyis shAkya gzhon nur
92a2: dgal 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'di dag ni sad kyang zin/ mthong yang zin gyis da ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig/ de'i tshe kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so//
92a3: de'i 'og tu lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ber du btsugs so// de'i
92a4: 'og tu shAkya log na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs
92a5: te/ de'i drung du shing ta la bdun dang ra nas de'i pha rol du lcags kyi phag god kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig btsugs so// de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu rnga'i 'phen 'dug
92a6: pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ / de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus//
92a7: mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te// de phan chad kyil phog par ma nus so// lag na becon can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga
92a8: 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dang gang byin pa de dag la la ni gzhu rgyud chad/ la la ni

92b1: chag nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ / grong khyer 'di na gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis bdud bzod pa 'am// lus kyi stobs dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu yod do// gzhon nus
92b2: smras pa/ lha da lta bu gang na mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod kyi mthu seng ge'i za 'gram zhes bya ba byung ste/ da'i sngam rung ltar lha langan spos dang phreng bas mchod de/ da ni sus kyang bdung bar yang me
92b3: nus na/ dgang bar lta spos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha de blang du gsol/ sad dpar bgyi'o// de nas gzhu de blangs te 'ongs pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis
92b4: nan tan gyi mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de gdung bar yang ma nus na dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so/ / de nas gzhu de shAkya lag na be con can gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/
92b5: ga'u de bdung bar brgal na ma 'dungs so// de nas gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te stan las ma langs par skyil mo krung pyad bcas te/ lag pa g.yon
92b6: pas bzung nas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis bdungs so/ / gzhu de de ltar bdungs pa'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sgra mngon par grag par gyur to// grong khyer gyi mi thams
92b7: cad kyang sreg sreg por gyur te/ gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di lta ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro// de la la lan re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi snam du badrangs nas/ de'i sgra byung ba 'di yin no zhes zer ro// de nas
92b8: lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i

93a1: rtogs tham ba da de dag chags sa pa da smras pa/ / gdan lasam gnas mal ba masas// babs rnams du dus pa lag// na dgas
93a2: rdzogs gyur te/ / bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub par byon// dge slong de ltar byang chub sems dpa'as mnga' thangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te bkang nas 'phangs pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun dga' bo'i 'bed du rnga tsugs/
93a3: pa dang / lha sbyin gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lag na be con can gyis 'ben du rnga btsugs pa de dag thams cad mas lang rgyad grags pa cu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ban lcags
93a4: kyi rnga btsugs pa dang / shing rta la bdun dngar pa dang / phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te mda' des la zug nas mi snang bar gyur to// sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i
93a5: sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas da ltar yang mda'i khron pa zhes bya ba yin no/ / de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong dag/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to//
93a6: shAkya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/ kye ngo mtshar to// 'dis ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs par rtsal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// zhes zer ro// nam mkha'i dkyil
93a7: na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye ba'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni si'i snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan/
93a8: la bzhugs// zhi gnas snam ru thogs shing stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis// nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral nas su// byang chub dam pa zhi brtul med mya ngan med pa 'thob// de skad ces

93b1: spras nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo // de bzhin du mchongs pa dang / yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs
93b2: dpe/ rgyad nas phog pa dang / bang dang / tshang dang rgyal dang / 'bong dpyang dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rtsal dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / mda' gcu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mar+tha dang / dpa' ba dang /
93b3: 'gyed stobs dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / mdun du bcu ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / bzung ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba
93b4: dang / dbug pa dang / gzhig pa dang / gsheg pa dang / mi 'tsheng bar 'phog pa dang / gnad du 'phog pa dang / tshogs che ba dang / tshe lo'i rtsed mo dang / snyan dang gas sbyar ba dang / lam dang / ri mo dang / gzugs dang /
93b5: gzugs kyi las dang / thabs kyi dpyad dang / me'i las dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / glu dang / yi ge klag pa'i mig 'or dang / gtam dang / bzhad gang dang / rtsed mo dang / bro dang / sgeg pa dang / phreng ba dang /
93b6: brgyu ba dang / rlung yab g.yab pa dang / nor bu chen gyis bsgyur ba dang / gos tshon gyis bsnung ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang / rmi lam gyi dpyangad dang / bya'i skad dang / bud med kyi mtshan dang / skyes pa'i mngon
93b7: dang / glang po che'i mtshan dang / rta'i mtshan dang / ba lang gi mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug gi mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan dang / shes gsapa dang / sgra nges par sbyor ba dang / da ro skur pa dang / sngon gyi rabs dang / sngon byung ba dang /
93b8: rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge lci yang dang / tshig bsdeb pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang / skar ma'i lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang / rnal 'byer gyi lugs dang / las kyi

94a1: tshogs dang / bya zag pa lugs dang / na gyi gi pa dang / byung ba'i 'grus dang / chu lags dang / skam yin gyi lpags dang / byangang dgas kyi skad dang / gtan tshigs kyi ga pa dang / 9
94a2: kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / sA tshul gyi las dang / 'dra ba shur dang / brko bzhog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgra rtsal 'jig rten pa dang lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'adra byu
94a3: chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ / de'i tshe shAkya lag na be con can gyis rang gi bu mos 'tsham/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / der mi rtse
94a4: bag mar blangs te byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ / de na byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang 'thun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtsel yongs su sbyong
94a5: pa spyod pa ston to/ / bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshom btsun mo'i mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to// de na shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom gyo byug gam nang mig
94a6: mthong yang rung ste/ gdong mi sbed do// de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes 'phya skrod cing mi snyan par ze'oro// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mos 'tsham ma
94a7: de thos nas nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dug dang bgreng dang 'chags pa la// 'phags pa dag ni ma g.yogs mdzes// nor bu rin chen 'od gsal pa//
94a8: rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes// 'phags pa 'gro na 'ang mdzes pa ste// 'od na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin// 'greng ba'ang de bzhin 'dug pa dang // thams cad du'ang 'phags pa mdzes/ 'phags pasmra

94b1: / / sa da/ nasmras / /
94b2: tan ldan pa yon tan brgyan// gang la sdig pa med byung ba// 'phags pa kun dge ba yin// byis pa sdig/ pa ni// ji ska brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// gang dag ska la sdig pa yod ci cag 'jam sa/
94b3: de dag drug gi bum par bdud ci blugs pa bzhin// zag gi seng ga rtsub pa lta bur nang yang rtsub// de 'dra de dag sbrul gyi kha la ga pa bzhin/ des pa de dag kun du kun 'od kun phyag 'tshal// 'bab stegs thams
94b4: cad lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ / 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu'o zhes bkang bum 'dra// bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dge/ gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po yun ring yongs spong zhing // dge ba'i bshes
94b5: gnyen rin po ches ni yongs bzung la/ / sdig pa rnam spong sangs rgyas chos la mngon chags pa// de lta bu dag mthong ba bkra shis 'bras bu yod// gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang /
94b6: gang dag tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig 'tshal med gyur la// dbang po sbas shing shin tu bsdams la yid dang ba// de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gal te lus la gos ni stong gis g.yogs gyur/
94b7: kyang // gang dag sems pa shus ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang // gang dag 'di 'a'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med// de dag spyan mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu/ gang zhig sems sbas rtag tu dbang po bsdams
94b8: zur cing / / bdag gi/ khyos chog sems can gzhan la mi sems pa// de 'dra bdag nyi zla bzhin du ma g.yogs snang // de 'dra bdag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid tshi dang gzhan/

95a1: mam rnam sa// bdu tshigs dgagasu ma bam pa dang / 'a DU nas rna smra na ga sa ma// na 'ams gdug ga/
95a2: dgargyal po zas ga khams shAkya'i bums 'tshe ma'i slebs pa bstan pa'i tshogs sa bcad pa rnam pa 'dis 'idi thos so// zhes nas kya rdzim zhing mthul yid rjes te rabatu dag ni dga' ba dang mang na
95a3: nag/ ngas bcos bu bzang por rini po che dums spras pa zud gcig dang / mu tig gi do shAl sra dbye ba brgya stong ra ba dang / mu tig dmang po pozang pos spras pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAkya'i bu mos tshem la bkab nas rjod brjod
95a4: 'di ded du brjod pa'o bo'i bu ni yon tan ci 'dras brgyan pa dang / mna' ma rang gi yon tan ji ltar rab smra ba// sems can dag pa de gnyis phrad par gyur pa ni// mar dang mar gyi nyid ku ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin// sgyu rtsal bsten
95a5: pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i medo// bam po brgyad pa// // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo
95a6: 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las byed pa la spro bar gyur pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
95a7: po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra 'byin cing lhags par gyur to// de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
95a8: yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spyod pa mang po dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// ma la skyes bu dam pa 'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du

95b1: ha cang yun ring du thogs par gyur na sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun pas yongs su srid par byas pa dang / gang dag
95b2: 'dis byang chub thob nas/ / chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas// byas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ste/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
95b3: byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'am cig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/ / de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te// byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/ nam zhig na bdag cag gis
95b4: byang chub sems dpa 'dam pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas kyang shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs kyi
95b5: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang
95b6: ldan pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa skor zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lha dang me dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos pa di
95b7: bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grangs
95b8: med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg par gyur cing// dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la bdag nyid slo

96a1: dpon du thar pa yin la/ yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang / da shes pa dang / na pa shes pa byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa las mnyams pa dang / mngon par shes palnga dang ldan pa da
96a2: 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang dbang po la mkhas pa dang // dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang / dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rus ran pa las ni yol bar gyur pa'o//
96a3: de mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu gzung ba'i dus so// 'di ni char gcad pa'i dus so// 'di ni bsdu pa'i dus so// 'di ni phan gdags pa'i rus so// 'di ni btang snyoms su gzhag
96a4: pa'i dus so/ / 'di ni smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni mi sgra bar bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni kha ton bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshul bzhin yid la bya ba'i dus so//
96a5: 'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas// 'di ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi bar gyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod
96a6: rkyen dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor
96a7: rang du 'gro ba'i dus so/ / 'di ni chos bstan pa'i dus so// 'di ni nang du yang dag gzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par 'dra
96a8: shes par gyur cing / dus la lta ba yin yang dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid thob pa yin te/ srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

96b1: nabazhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams glu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par bskul ba mdzad do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can mchog
96b2: gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs/ / de dag mthu yis sil snyan sgra dag las// tshigs gcad sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba yis// mi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag skul// sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems
96b3: can mthong nas ni/ / 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing // phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces// khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad btab// dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang // 'gro ba na bya
96b4: zhes smon btab dran par byos/ / 'di ni khyod kyis dus man tshod yin gyis// drang srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar byos// sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog/ yon tan ba rgyas gang bar ni gyur cig ces/
96b5: de'i phyir khyod sngon mgo dang rkang lag dang // nor gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang // khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad// khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson pas yon tan brgya/
96b6: yis gang // bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med// khro bas non cing tha ba'i dri mang ba// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab// dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log nges pa/ mi mkhas rnam mar
96b7: dag la khyod snying rje/ / bsod nams ye shes dge bas lus khyab cing // rdul bral bsam gtan mngon shes lam mer 'dug/ phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal// sprin med zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra// 'di dang
96b8: gzhan yang snyan pa rnam mang gis/ sil snyan dag las rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te// mngon par khyod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes/ lha mis mchod par 'os la skul ma 'debs/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim

97a1: dam pa mchog yo byad phran sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang 'thun pa// lha'i khang khyim lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / sa
97a2: wang dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs mchog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams tha dad pa dbye ba shin du rnam par phyag/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng pa/ rin po
97a3: dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du mas legs par brgyan pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi brgya stong du mas mngon par sbyangs pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu sbyangs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb
97a4: can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang chun po mang po sbyangs pa/ pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs pa/ dar la'i bla re bres pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing / shin du mdzes
97a5: pa dag bkram pa/ rdzing me tog pad ma dkar po dang / pad ma dang ldan pa'i chu'i gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba mang ba/ bya 'dab skyob dang / ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kun la
97a6: dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ bai dUr+ya sngon po'i sa gzhi gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba/ gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun du ston pa/
97a7: blta bas mi ngoms par nyams dga' ba/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dam pa skyed pa'i khyim dam pa mchog de na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khang pa yangs pa chen po mchog na gnas pa/ dri ma med pa/
97a8: dri ma dang bral ba/ yan lag dri ma med pa/ phreng ba dang rgyan ma bor ba// dri mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bsdus pa/ dkar zhing bzang la dri ma med cing rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang

97b1: mas lta'i ma bcas tha ba bang pa zab du bting ga'adas pag ca dang gas par gan bdab/ yan lagadam pa sasmras pa mal bzang pa'i skang na jug pa na shA
97b2: bu mo dang 'dra ba/ thams cad du lan ma tho ba med pa/ lta ba dang 'thun pa/ spyod pa bzang pos mdzes par byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba'i nang na 'drag pa/ dung dang rnga dang / rnga rje dang / khar dza dang / pi ba dang / d+had gsu
97b3: pa dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba'i sgra dbyangs dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pas bslang ba la/ bud med
97b4: kyi tshogs kyis kyang / sgra gnyen zhing 'jam pa snyan pa yid tu 'ong ba dang / gling bu 'brang ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo // phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
97b5: gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sil snyan sgra byung ba'i sgra skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / / bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga' sems dang pas// sil snyan yid
97b6: 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe/ / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dag gi mthu yis na// tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung // rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas// go 'phang mya ngan
97b7: med mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te/ skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las dkrol lo zhes// dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur// de phyir dge myur grong khyer mchog 'di nas// byung la sngon gyi drang
97b8: srong zhabs bcags pa/ / sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su/ rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis// khyod kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor// rkang lag 'phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur

98a1: drang srong chen po de ring khyong dus 'di/ / chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'grol bye// khyod kyi tshul khrims mnyams dri med dge/ sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gis brgyan// drang srong chen po khyod
98a2: khrims 'dra ba med/ / 'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang las khrol// khyod kyis srid pa brgyad ni bzod paspyad// khyod ni 'gro bas na brjod rnam sa thod// bzod pas bzod cing dul bas nges pa'i bdag/ rkang gnyis dbang po mngon par
98a3: 'byung blo gyis/ / khyod brtson brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo ba med// bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen byur// g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas btul te// ngan song gsum po mtha' dag skams par gyis//
98a4: gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad// dus ngan nyon mongs stegs ma bsregs kyis la// khyod kyis bdud rtsi chu bo'i char phob ste// mgon med ring nas skom pa tshim par gyis// 'chi med
98a5: mya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te/ / skom pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes// khyod kyis sngon sgras tshig mchog dran byas te// grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung // khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa
98a6: mkhas/ / khyod kyi ye shes mtha' yas dri med che// rmongs pa yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la// shes rab 'ong dge dam pa mdzes pa gyis// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni byams pa spyad// snying rje dang ni
98a7: dga' mchog btang snyoms dang / / khyod kyis spyod pa dam pa gang spyad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par phye// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gis gzi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs bcang
98a8: 'di/ / sil snyan dag las rnam mang yid 'ong grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la skul// gang gi tshen dga' byed bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams// shin tu brdos shing rab tu snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrog pa'i/

98b1: phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lta mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang // sil snyan dag las gsung ma chag cang po rje rjes su sgrog/ 'grol ba byung yon tan bang po ldan khyod 'gro rnams smra/ ba ba ts+tsha/
98b2: pa'i tshe na rgyal ba'i yon tan gnyug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du myur song 'chi med go 'phang thob par gyis// lha mi dag ni shin tu skem
98b3: zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral/ / khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bro rtag tu sbyin// stobs bcu'i re bro dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa// bdud rtsi de ni mi bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par
98b4: phye/ / rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed la dga' ba bo// khyod kyis sngon gyi srid par nor dang nor bu gser rnams btang // chung ma bu sdug dag dang grong khyer grong rdal bcas sa dang // rang gi mgo dang mig
98b5: dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa'ang btang / / mi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa'i tshe// mi zhig khyod la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad tshig smras te// grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho bos
98b6: byin zhes byas/ / de yi tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med// gna' sngon khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dge bar gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo bla ma bsnyen bskur byed cing gzhan la 'khu mi byed// bram ze dam pa
98b7: ngag dang skye bo mang po dge la bkod/ / de nas shi 'phos srid pa'i 'gro ba lha'i gnas su skyes// sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu las drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// rgyal po ngan pa khros pas khyod kyi yan lag bcad
98b8: pa na/ / khyod ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byas te// de yi tshe na khyod kyi rkang lag dag las 'o ma zag/ khyod sngon drang srong sngo sangs zhes byar gang tshe gyur pa na// ri mchog gnas na brtul zhugs

99a1: la / ga sa gas ca nas/ sa smra sa sa
99a2: tsan gyur ba'i ma/ ga par 'bab tu can pas mi theg khyer bar gyur pan// ban dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi byung ste zangam bzhan// khyod kyi dgra ba nyid dngas pani yang yi pa 'gyu// me mag
99a3: sngon bram ze'i bur ni gang che gyur pa na/ / khyod kyi nor ba rgya mtsho chen po yangs par ltung ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brtsams pa dang // stobs brtan lhamachog khyod kyis nor bu
99a4: phyir yang rnyed/ / skyes bu mchog khyod gan sngon drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur shog ces khyod gan 'ongs// smras pa/ bram ze dam pa kho bo dgra la byung zhes byas/
99a5: khyod kyis rang lus btang gis bram ze de ni ma btang ngo // gnang sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs drung 'ongs te// 'dod pas spras pa shing 'di lo ma du yod grongs shes byas// shing de lo mdza
99a6: snyed yod pa rab bgrangs rab mkhas pas/ / khyod kyis de bzhin nor ba med cing 'thun par tshig tu brjod// khyod sngon ne tshe yon tan ldan gyur shing la gnas pa'i tshe// zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi drin la bsam
99a7: te de ma spangs/ / lha yi bdag pos khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'// snga mkho bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas// khyod kyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs med de//
99a8: yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pa yon tan mang// khyod kyi dus la de bab grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang thod// 'gro ba dag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod la myur du khod// gang gi tshe na bud med rin

99b1: chen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te/ / sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrog pa// de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yis tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag
99b2: sil snyan dag gi sgra las rab tu byung / / rga dang shi bas zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur ces// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab// mi yi seng ge khyod kyi
99b3: sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran gyis shig/ rkang gnyis dbang po khyod mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni 'di yin no// khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po du ma byin// nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos
99b4: bzang rin chen spras pa dang / / rkang lag dag dang mig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor pa dag/ khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med// khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal
99b5: po zhi bar gyur/ / snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur// rgyal pa dpa' bo brtan dang mig bzangs dang ni de la sogs pa byas// rgyal po khrag khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa
99b6: de nyid khyod/ / bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal pa mang por tshul khrims spyod pa spyad// nor bu rin chen dri ma med pa lta bur tshul khrims rnam dag gyur// khyod kyis 'bri ya rnga ma ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs
99b7: shing spyad/ / tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis 'dir ni 'gro la rgya cher don yang byas// 'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dgra yis mdas bsnun tshe// gtum po dgra la snying rtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyod
99b8: kyis bskyabs/ / bzang zhing mdzes pa'i mche ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yod ma btang // khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// bzod la dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro ba'i mi phan
