100a1: thug pasngal steng mang dang / / gnub dag dang gsang ba dang na tsangs pa mang ba nga ba byas// byad byas gna'abyung la gang dag la ba rdzun kyapa ma tha byab// de dag byi nas kyang chug shang
100a2: mar gyur kyang khyod kyis de dag bzed/ / mgon po khyed ni ri mchog gnas na gang tshe dradang mor gyur pa 'o// kha ba bab cing chu thug pas ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi bzung ste// rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam pa mang dang bde ba kun
100a3: kyis rim me byas/ / de yis myur du khyad la gsod ba bring 'ongs khyed kyis de la bzod// byang chub bcal byor brgyal zhugs dka' thub yon tan nam mang ye shes la// khyed kyis brtson 'grus shin kya
100a4: par gnas shing mi g.yo g.yo ba med/ / dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyis brtson 'grus sebs kyis stobs ni med par byas// me yi seng ge khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// khyod 'dir gan ldan lad
100a5: kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i tshe/ / snying rje bskyed nas nam mkha' las ni srin po'i gling du myur du song // de tshe phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bad la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus
100a6: rnam par 'phrul pa mang ba byas/ / myur du 'gyur zhing g.yol yul la dga' zhing rked pa'i sems brtul te// bsam gtan par gyur dul des ni gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtse ba bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan
100a7: dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gi 'gre don byas/ / de 'dir sems can mchog khyed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab// gna' sngon khyed ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur// rgyal
100a8: po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur/ / khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod// de yi tshen mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su do // phyogs dang

100b1: phyogs mamams 'gro ba rnams mang shes pa'i chog byed rab ma 'as/ / gzhan gyi sbed dang 'am ba'i gang shes pa dang dbang bshes pa dang / rdul dang 'dral dang zlags rnam mang rtsub bar ma byung byan gyur// rtul bar
100b2: sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo/ / khyod kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas// srid pa rnam
100b3: bar gzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te/ / mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la den chen rab tu byas// tshigs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis// sil sAn sna
100b4: bsgrags de la rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' ba skul bar gyur/ / blo mchog ldan pa khyed 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni dbab kyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig/ bud med gre
100b5: dang rin po che dang de shal spos phreng sna tshogs kyis/ / rgyan pa dag kyang sems dang zangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams// sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgeg cing slong bar byed pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis
100b6: sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra byung / / gang gi den du pyod kyis 'grol zan phyir bskal pa du mar ni// btang bar dka' ba bgang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin du smad/ bsam gtan shes rab
100b7: shin tu bsgom pa khyod kyi dus la dbab kyis/ / 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur sems phyi shol ma byed cig/ sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang // skye ba de dang de dag tu ni
100b8: mchod sbyin nam pa mang po byas/ / khyod kyis chung ma bu be bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste// byang chub don du btang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis btang // khyod ni rgyal po mo dman bsod nams dpal gyi

101a1: sma ngadus na tshung na na na la du ga du/ nasun
101a2: bla mams can dpanal gang pa dang/ bas// shAba'i za can 'grus bang dang bab nams 'dan can du byung // gang ba dang ldan 'a sa maldan pa byas pag / N+Te na nga/
101a3: bgazugs ldan dpa' ba ban pa phel ba dang // rgyal pa legs par sgru ba tsa dang thazas pa dang ngas pa ga pa'i 'di da byud pa pa ga dang da byugs kyi bdag par byung // ba byed bka
101a4: ba rin chen gnag bud zhi ba bstod/ / mi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur te gtang bar dka' ba btang / khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i chang phab de bzhin chos kyi chang pa thob// khyod kyis sngan chad sems can stong
101a5: gang gA'i bye ma snyed cig mthong / / sems can thang bar bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog na tshal ba na// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa' bo grong khyer dam pa 'di nas
101a6: 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo/ / thog mar pyod kyis don yod mthong las la'i me tog gis ni mchod// nam par skad mdzad la ni dad pa'i sems kyis skad cig par du bstas// rngang dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyad kyis amra
101a7: ra'i cig dral/ / cad na mthong nas kyad kyis d+ha ma snyan pangs te byis du bzung // rdul bgrong byer 'ag pa mthang nas byam sa ga ba tugatang// sa kyi dbang phyug nas la dpan lags shes byab
101a8: khwa byin/ / kun du jigs par rjod na drug tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gsang phreng gtong // 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha chang bral zhing gsol la ba la sran

101b1: gakor/ / ye shes tag la mya ngan mad pa'i sa tog la lo myur la 'joms// rin can gtsug tong can la mang me pad ma ldan la sman yang thul// thams cad thal gnon ma tog do gas rgyam tshal ni bdam bral// bad ma
101b2: snying po la ni zla re seng ge la ni char gdang phul/ / sa la'i dbang po rgyal la mar bul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul// grags sbyin kun da'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul// ye shes ldan la lus
101b3: btung krus byin la ni ram bza' dbul ba byas/ / rab 'thor gshegs dang tsan dan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni tshwa spang re// bkod pa che la pad ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen bul// shAkya thub la spar gang
101b4: gser bul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas/ / nyi ma'i zhal la me tog rna rgyan blo gros bzang la gser cod pan// kla zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul// sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdum
101b5: bral seng ge'i tog la gri gdan phul/ / yon tan mchog ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srungs la ni klu dbyangs kun// spos mchog me tog bral zhing 'od 'grol / gal rtag tu me tog pu la// me 'khrugs rgyal la khang bcom
101b6: dul zhing 'jig rten mdzan la phreng ba phral/ / rtswa spom gtsug lag rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dka' la spos kun phul// sgron ma tshal bdag phul pad ma'i mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// chos kyi tog la ma tog/
101b7: sna tshogs sgron ma mngang la ud pa la// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na// khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
101b8: dang ston pa de dag khyed mchod dran par gyis/ / sems can mgon med mya ngan gang ba yal bar mdor mngon par byung // mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog thob ste// rjes su 'thun pa'i mngon

102a1: par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob/ / de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun du// sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas/ bskal
102a2: pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das/ / khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang zhi de dag ming yang gang du song // dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// 'dod pa rgyal srid
102a3: longs spyod rtag pa min gyis grong khyer mchog nas byung / / bskal pa zad par 'gyur tshe gzi brjid drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar// rga dang na dang 'chi ba mi gzang 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur// dngos po
102a4: thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med/ / shin tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byung / rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing // gang tshe me tshogs gling bu rgyud
102a5: gcig dang / sil snyan sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa// de chos la stan sgra las 'di dag/ byung // srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bang// 'chi me ba'ab 'di ni mgon med pa// srad las 'byung la
102a6: thob tug mas/ / ma pa chud pa'i byung ba'i ba ba y-i// dgas byed dpa sa// ma/ wA// / /
102a7: xxx/ xxx
102a8: di ga ga/ depa'i sa pa mags na// 'ad pa yang na byan ga da ma / ma ma

102b1: r+dz+dza phrugs / sus sa// ga sa bu / sgyu //
102b2: thug sa / 'i theg/ 'phel bar byed// ji ltar po 'bar 'bas ni 'jigs bcas pa// de ltar 'dod de 'phags pa'i skyibs ga/ 'a 'i 'dri grog shegs gnas 'dra// ma tha
102b3: sbrang ces smras dang mtshungs/ / ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig/ bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// rol khye ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i
102b4: yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra/ / gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang // mig yor 'dra zhing gang la lta 'dra dang // rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma rla sgyu ma
102b5: smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can/ / chu bud dbu ba lta bu yang dag min// yongs su brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na tshang thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe// phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa
102b6: spyod/ rgan sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par spong ste ri dgas klung skam bzhin// nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe// phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// nor nyams sdug bsngal
102b7: bar ni gyur pa'i tshe/ / rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin// ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing // de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed// ner nyams rga bas nyen cing spang ba na// de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur//
102b8: bya rgod bzhin/ rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin// phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed// rgan sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na// de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin// rga bas rga byas na

103a1: nA yal gyur na/ / sdong po gnas lcags kyis ni btsam pa bzhin/ zhabs lalags na 'jigs bcas khang dum 'ang// zhalas byung ba thub paskyang du smos/ bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rgabs smras/
103a2: ma ga sa dzinas snug ban// ngas bldan grus la dung thags gas// sa pa sa byed pa ni/ pag ga tsugag sa sa b+ta rgyu ga na
103a3: mthu bas 'phrog/ nabs pa dpa'abrog cing brnyas par byed// nabs 'di byed napas mngangs kyang 'phrog/ nad brgya mang dang nad bebs sdug bsngal gyiste// 'gro ba gcos ta me yi sa ri dgas bzhin/ dang nabs
103a4: bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la/ / sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myung shod cig/ dper na dgun srad drung dang Sha pa che// rna shing gel pa nags spyan mdangs kyang 'phrog/ de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrag cing // dbang pa
103a5: gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed/ / nor 'bru nor chen tha mar zad pa byed// nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyes par byed// gnod par byed cing sdu gal sdang par byed// yongs su gdung byed mkha' las nyi ma bzhin//
103a6: 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa// phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral// phyir mi 'ong zhing 'brang bar 'gyur ma yin// shing las lo 'bru 'dra zhing klu'i rgyan dang mtshungs// zhi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang
103a7: med byed/ / 'chi ba 'phrog byed chu bos shing dang bzhin// mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med// 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te// 'byung po'i
103a8: tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin/ kA la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra// rnga rtsi 'byung po'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs// skyon brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba dgrol zhes khyod kyis smon lam

103b1: u0f7f bla lapa snang ba na bya/ / da pan pa byung ba 'das pa // gang+gA 'a da gas ga ga / na gags byung dag// ga sa
103b2: kyimatha/ / tshigs pad sa migs sa la san sgra las thang/ 'dus byas thams pad srung du 'jig pan+d+ha/ mapa' mgron rten nga migs cad// khyod gnas zla sa// nam
103b3: bzang ba mngon 'byung ngus la bab/ / 'du byed mi rtag partan pa ma yin te/ rdza sam btad la bar 'jig pa'i bdag/ gzhan ci rnaMs ni brnyan po byas dang mdzang sa// b+ha ba'i grong b+he / byar ring mi gas// 'du bye
103b4: dag 'jig pa'i chos can ste/ / dbyar gyi zhal zhal ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin/ chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste// rkyen la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste// myur du 'byung zhing
103b5: 'gug pa'i chos can yin/ / rlung dang mtshungs par ring du mi gnas la// dbu ba lta bur nyam chung snying po med// 'du byed g.yo ba med cing stong pa ste// brtags na chu shing dag gi phung po 'dra// sgyu ma lta bu sems
103b6: ni rmongs par byed/ / lag bcangs stong pas byis pa bring dang mtshungs// 'dus byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang // rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste// gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten nas byung // byis pa'i
103b7: skye bos 'di 'dra 'di ma rtogs/ / dper na gres ma mun 'dza' rten byas la// brtsal ba'i stobs kyis theg par 'gyur ba dang // za chun rgyud mo 'khor lor bcas pa yang // de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de ltar
103b8: srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa/ / gzhan dang gzhan tshegs pa la brten nas ni// de dag so sor re rer 'grub par 'gyur// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te// sa bon gang

104a1: na du man su su/ / su sa//
104a2: xxx/ xxx
104a3: pa/ ga da ga thags na pabyas nasas// ga sa pa gas pa da / gagags la / rnas ga sa/
104a4: mi sdug chos can yang // de dag bdag dang sdug par btags pa sa// nor ba yang dag ma yin btags yin yang // de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te/
104a5: mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong // gang dum sor gang nas 'ongs pa min// rnal 'byor pas ni stong pa sgyu ltar mthong // dper na gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang // lag pas brtsol ba byas pa gsum
104a6: tshogs pa/ / de las brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas ring por mi thogs 'gag par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs
104a7: mtshams kun du brtags byas nas/ / de'i 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so// phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi// rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las// de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes brjod kyang //
104a8: de ni dam pa'i don du dmigs su med// mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni// lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang // lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las min// re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med// tshogs pa

104b1: da na nas da/ das/ thas da nga da// ya dang dganam ga gas da// dad kya dgas sam// ngas ya das // da
104b2: la rnam par btags byas na/ de ci dag kun zag chug bu dang // sad cig pa dang snang pa med par mthong // dper na shid dang rgyadal brten byas la// lag pas bcol babyas pa gsu mtshags na// u0f89u0fa4 sman pa' t
104b3: haM thul sogs pa/ / de dag las nan yang 'byung bar 'gyu// de nas mkhas pa la las btags byas te// 'di ni ga nas 'as su gang me nas// thugs dang byugs marnams kun du btags byasan/
104b4: zla la 'ong ba'am 'grib mi dmigs sa// de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnams las// 'a byed gyur pa thams cad byung ba ste// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byung ba las na// 'ang byed snang pa gal pa med par mthong/
104b5: phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni// nang yang skyong la phyi rol stong pa ste// thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la// chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag
104b6: ni/ mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs// ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin lha mir bcas pa rtogs par gyis// gnod pa yang dag ma yin btags pa yi// 'dod chags zhe sdang
104b7: dag gis 'gro ba gdungs/ / snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu// 'dren pa bdud rtsi rgyun ni rab tu phob// byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni// 'phags pa'i nor gyis srog chags bsdu'o zhes// mkhas pa
104b8: khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir/ / bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i nor gyis dman dbul sdug bsngal la// sems can kha lo sgyur ba mgayel bar/ phags

105a1: sa'i nor gyis de dag bsdub gyis/ / ngan song sa yi lam ni gcad pa dang // mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo mo mchog da ni// sems can bye ba mngal bstan zhes te/ khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu
105a2: bsrungs/ / tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsams pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// ngan song gsum pa'i sa yi sgo tshed de// mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo ni dbye bar gyis// srog chags rnams
105a3: kye khong khro khro gzhi la dang / / srid pa'i mtsho las sems can bsgral byas te// zhi ba de rims nad med la dgod do zhes// khyod kyis rtag tu bzod pa shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te//
105a4: dgra dang gnod sems 'tshe bas dkrugs pa yi// 'tshe ba spyod pa yal bar ma dor bar// 'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la khod// chos kyi gru ni legs par sbyar byas la// srid po'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams
105a5: bsgral te/ / zhi ba de rims nad med la dgod do zhes// gang gi don du khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsten// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyur pa/ sems can mgon med pa
105a6: dag brtson stobs dang / / brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du 'di dag thon// dbang po 'khrul dang phal pa'i dbang po dang // spre'u 'gra'i sems las zhi gnas ngas dgod ces// 'dren pa khyod kyis gang gi ched
105a7: bya / na mangs gzhal ba bsam gtan bsgoms gyur pa/ ngas man/ namapa 'ang thugs pa shAl mag nas sa gas las
105a8: tshogs skye dgu dag sad/ / ti chags rig sanapas bsgribs pa pa// 'phral chos brgyamang tha mthong byeng pa// yang dgas thong bar bag gtan nags/ kyad kyis kya rba dgas bzhin tu brloms/ ldan

105b1: snyed de rdzas su dran gyis la/ / gti mug sa ga mun pas bsgrubs pa yi/ 'grol shes rab dam pa 'du bzad pa// chos mag dri med nyan mangs med pa nyin// brad med rnams sa la snyan kru byangs las// chag
105b2: su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di byung ste/ / de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnam spangs nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btad do// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe yang
105b3: chos mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / chos yid la byed pa dang / bral bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas chos dang chos smra ba rnams la gus pa dang
105b4: bcas par gyur cing / bsam pa thag pa nas chos don du gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ba// chos tshol bas ngoms mi shes pa/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par
105b5: ston pa/ bla na med pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa// zang zing med par chos ston pa chos sbyin pa la ser sna med pa// chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa/
105b6: chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba/ chos la gnas su 'dzin pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa// chos la dpung gnyen du 'dzin pa/ chos la rton pa/ chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba shes
105b7: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ste/ thabs la mkhas pa rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par brtse zhing btsun mo'i 'khor thams
105b8: cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ni bstan/ / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang 'thun par ni

106a1: byas/ yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod na kun du bstan/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i
106a2: bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun du bstan/ lha'i dang mi'i las shin du 'das pa snying po dang ldan 'di rgya la/ rnam pa tha dad pa rna pa
106a3: pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba ni bstan// 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa med par rang gi sems la dbang
106a4: bsgyur ba ni bstan/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa'i sems can rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smin par byas nas// 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon
106a5: mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas te/ / ji ltar 'gron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing / de'i
106a6: tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes su dran no/ / sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed de// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrub bo// sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen
106a7: po gtong ngo / / sems can rab tu thar bar bya bar yang sems so// 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin par yang so sor rtog go// 'khor ba la gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa mang po du ma yod par yang rtog
106a8: 'du dang nyas pa gags pa yang dag pa ga nga/ / 'khor ba byud pas kyang bdag da bar byed // bya na pas 'das pa la yang sems pa dag pa ga //

106b1: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa// / dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' na sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor ba'i skyed shin tu rig pa yin/ 'dus byas
106b2: la bsam pa zag pa nas don du mi gnyer ba yin/ nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/
106b3: 'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin/ bdud kyi spyod yul de la ma 'dres pa yin/ srid pa la 'bar bar sbyor du mthong ba yin/ khams gsum pa las
106b4: byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ / 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ mngon par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin// dben pa la gzhol ba yin/ dben pa la
106b5: 'bab pa yin/ dben pa la bab pa yin/ dgon pa dang bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ rab tu dben pas rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin// bla na med pa'i nan tan la dpa'
106b6: ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi don du 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin/ bde bar 'dod pa yin// grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ byams pa la gnas
106b7: pa can yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/ rtag tu yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin// sems can thams cad
106b8: la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa bgod pa la dga' ba yin/ lhag par gtod pa yin/ lag pa brkyad pa

107a1: na/ gtang bas dpa' ba san/ mdzadu ldan byas pa yAn/ bas nams shin du rdzun sa ma rdzogs pa yin/ maud nams kyi khyod ga rgyu bang sa sa// ma da seMng dang
107a2: thal pa yin/ sems can dum thang bayin/ blan med pa'i na bdag rten pa yi// sbyin nas pa rnam par sbyin pa la ming bayin/ sbyin pa la dpa' g.yon/ 'dod pa dang / 'ad bache bdang chag
107a3: dang zhe sdang dang / thugs pa dang / brgyas dang / gti zug dang / sing ska ma rdzogs pa nyin mangs pa'i mtshogs pa nom pabams dan dag dpar byung ma na pa byung ba yin/ da na
107a4: pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin/ gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin du bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ ya lang
107a5: bgos pa yin/ go cha bgos pa yin/ sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir mi ldog
107a6: pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin// gtong ba'i lag cha can yin/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa yin// byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa yin//
107a7: dus dang phyang bar chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lam byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa na/
107a8: ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon chas pa dang ldan pa yin// nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu char gcod pa yin// tshul khrims dang / yon tan dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang /

107b1: yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma med ci dri ma dang bral la dri ma spangs pa'i sems
107b2: dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / brgyad pa dang / spro ba dang / smad pa dang / bshud pa dang / brdeg pa dang / bsngags pa dang / gsang pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzung
107b3: ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma brnyogs pa yin/ sems ma 'khrugs pa yin/ bzod pa dang nges pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gnod par mi sems pa yin/ gnod pa mi byed pa yin/
107b4: gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin// sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pa yin/ yi dam la brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang
107b5: dag par sgrub pa la phyir mi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ shes bzhin can yin/ shin du mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ sems ma g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid
107b6: la byed pa yin/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ snang ba phob pa yin/ mun pa mun gnag dang bral ba yin/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam
107b7: par sems yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang
107b8: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su spyad pa byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shin du dkar bar byas pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin/ brten cing 'brel bar/

108a1: 'byung ba sa pa yan/ bdun pa rnas sartags pas gzhan ma dring ma 'dag pa yin// rnam par byung ba'i sogasam kyis rnam par rtsa pa ma// chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyum da/
108a2: smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / zag cha dang / mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' de ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin/ de ltar ye shes la gnas pa
108a3: yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa yin/ de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi rlabs pas sil snyan dang glu
108a4: dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis rgya cher bskul ba dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos
108a5: kyi sgo bzhi mngon du byed do/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyor ba sgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos/
108a6: kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam pa chud mi za ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul
108a7: zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / byang chub kyi
108a8: phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par sgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa'o//

108b1: byang chub sems dpas sa rgyas zan par dag mngan du byas nas/ bdun ma 'a' thams dayongs su smin par bya bar gyur da // rnam pa sa tham 'jal ba na pa khyab pa dpa bya/
108b2: bas byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sil snyan dang klu byungs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di la bubargya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdza 'bra mngan par 'du bya ba mngon par byed do// zos pargya chen dang ni
108b3: bsam pa dang / / lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rjebs// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skye zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dag sil snyan rnams las byung // dang zhing dang dang mos dang gus pa dang /
108b4: nga rgyal med cing tha la 'dud pa dang // 'dri dang dge ba ci nas tshol ba dang // rjes su dran pa bsgoms pa'i sgra byung ngo // sbyin dang rdul dang sdom dang tshul khrims skye// bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin brtson 'grus
108b5: sgra/ / bsam gtan mngon par sgrub dang ting 'dzin sgra// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang 'byung // byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin snying rje'i sgra// dga' dang btang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra// bsdu
108b6: pa'i dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pas/ / sems can yongs su smin bya'i sgra yang byung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab bye smra// yang dag slong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang // dbang ba ldad stobs lnga ba skye
108b7: dang / / byang chub yan lag sgra ni sil snyan byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang // zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong dang // mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med
108b8: sgra/ mi sdug sgra yang sil snyan rnams las byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra// zad pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye sgra// 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhin gnas med sgra// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra

109a1: yang sil snyan byung / / rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis na// sil snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste// sgra de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis// sems can mchog rab rjes bsla
109a2: byang chub smon/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla
109a3: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i bya
109a4: zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub sems
109a5: dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i khang bzangs gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan// skyes bu se dges
109a6: tshe yang bstan/ / btsun mo'i 'khor yang bstan pa mdzad// khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes 'thun mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pas// lha mi mang po yongs smin mdzad// mngon par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i// de yi dus
109a7: la deng bab po/ / ma grol bas ni dgrol mi nus// long bas lam yang ston mi nus// grol bas dgrol bar byed par nus// mig ldan long ba lam ston nus// sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol// khyim nor bu dang chung ma
109a8: chags/ / de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing // mngon par 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse ba dang // gling bzhi rin chen bdun spangs te// khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten

109b1: mos/ / khyod ni 'dod la mi dgyes te// bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad kyang // lha ma bcu phrag mang po dag/ gnad kyi log las sang bar mdzad// daral bab 'di shin du 'dang // rig par 'bab rgya ma gyogs 'gro
109b2: bzhin/ / dar la bab pa yal gyur nas// mngon par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags// de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dar bab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dam nyams 'og chud mdzod la// lA mi don ni mdzad
109b3: pa'i rigs/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan mi ngoms te// dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das// shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang dang // yul
109b4: 'khor rnams kyi yid 'od sdug/ mda' ma brgya pa'i zhal 'dra ba// mngon par 'byung ba dgongs su gsol// nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing // 'byung med bcing bas dam bcings rnams//
109b5: dpa' bos myur du mtshungs med pa// thar lam bzhi la dgod du gsol// khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas// sems can yun ringan rnams la// chos kyi sman ni sbyor mdzad de// mya ngan 'das pa de myur du
109b6: khod/ / mig med mun pa gti mug glags// lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi// lha rnams dang ni mi yi mig/ shes rab sgron ma myur du sbyongs// byang chub thob pa blta bya zhing // bla na med pa'i chos mnyan ces/
109b7: lha dang lnga yin klu ga dang // gnod sbyin dri za mang po sdong// klu yi rgyal pos rang gi gnas// khyod kyi dpal gyis snang bar mthong // mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas bgyid// de yi brtul zhugs bsam pa skongs//
109b8: byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la// lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten skyong bzhi sder bcas pa/ de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa rab tu ni spyod pa// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang //

110a1: med 'khor lo rab skor bar// mi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis// byang chub bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha// byang chub snying por gnas rnams kyang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// blta'o zhes te
110a2: sdod cing mchis/ / byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i nang // bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis// de dag thog mar khyod gyur mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus sa re// dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa// mar me
110a3: mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs/ yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba// rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs bskrag tu gsol// bskul ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub
110a4: sems dpa' bskul ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lam 'di bstan to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ lha'i
110a5: tshogs kyis bskor te mngon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung ste/ gos ngung smrig gyon pa rmis so// de nas de sad pa dang / rings pa rings par nyung ru ma la dris pa/ gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gas/
110a6: des smras pa lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du// gzhon nu ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te// snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas/ khong ba'i snying
110a7: la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyur to/ / de yang 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gi gzhon nu ni bskyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di
110a8: nyi du drags par 'bru mad pa srung ba nim byung ro snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gzhon du'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang dbyar dang ston gyis dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang bzangs gsum byed du bcug go/ de la/

110b1: dbyings gang yin pa de ni shin du bsal ba'o// dbyangs gang yin pa de ni grang doran pa'o// dgranas gang yin pa da ni rang bzhin gyis dra ba'o// khang bzang ri'i grags rnams kyang mi lnga bcwa lnga brgyas 'dugs
110b2: shing 'bebs so/ / de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang mtshor bar mngon par byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad byed du grag pa byung ngo // ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang /
110b3: gzhon nu'i chabasgo bkra shis pa nas mngon par 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'bar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo 'bar de re yang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed
110b4: cing gcod do/ / de dag gi sgra yang dpag tshad byed du grag go// de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa yang sbyor ro// glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa dang / gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag
110b5: par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa// deng bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gros shing rta myur du sbyor cig/ de nas kha lo sgyur ba rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste
110b6: 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar nam yang ma phyung bas sa
110b7: bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung na 'on tang gzhon nu bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas/ / mngon par mi 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas rgyal
110b8: be zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang / rim gro byed pas da ste zhag bdun na gzhon nus bzang po blta ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung gis// der khyed kyis gzhon nu'i mig tu mi 'ong ba/

111a1: mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du ma 'ang ba thams cad na sal cag/ yang du 'ong ba dang / yul nyams dga' ba thams cad na sbyar cig ces grang khyer du dril bsgrags so// de nas zhag bdun rgya nyan/
111a2: par grong khyer thams cad brgyan to// skyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te// ngas bcos phul dog tha dad pa'i blar ni bres// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyis ni legs par brgyan to// byang chub sa
111a3: dpa' lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste phyogs nas/ spos chu'i chag chag btab ste/ me tog sal ma ni chal bar bkram/ thog por nas ni bdugs/ bus pa gang bas ni mdzes par
111a4: byas chu shid ldan pa ni bskyed/ dang tha dad pa snga tshogs kyi blar ni zas/ ngan pa cha'i dril bug ser/ 'i dra ba dang / rgyan phreng dang chun pa na sbyangs// dpung pana'i bkod pa ni byas so// g.yog 'khod kyang gnon
111a5: nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems
111a6: dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rgan po gtugs pa/ 'khogs pa/ lus las rtsa rgyus 'thon pa/ so rgal po/ lus gnyer mas gang ba/ skra byi ba/ rgung ba gdung rten
111a7: ltar dgu pa/ zhom pa/ mkhar pal rten pa/ mthu zang pa/ dar yal ba/ mid pa nas sgra dang dang po 'byung ba/ lus dgu pas mkhar bal brten nas yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad 'dar bzhig lam ka
111a8: bstan par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'as shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi ring nyam chung zhing // sha khrag skams la rgyus lpags nyi chos dkris// mgod

111b1: so rgal lus na rab skes la/ sa ra brtan cing mi bde 'byor 'gros su// kha lo sbyar bas smras pa/ lha cig ma 'ad rga bas bal byas nan// dbang ba nyams shing sdug bsngal ba rgyan skabs nyam ga// nanya tu/
111b2: skye bos brnyes shing mgon med gyur// na bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing ltur bar// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'di yi chos 'di rags kyi yin nam 'on tam no// 'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'di srid de ma
111b3: shig/ tshig 'di yang dag rje bzhin myur du smros shig dang // thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin pas maM// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha 'di rigs chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags// skye ba kun
111b4: gyi dang la bab parga pas 'joms/ / khyod kyi yab dang yus dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang // rgalas thar 'gro ba'i thabs ni gzhan ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ kha lo sbyar ba byis pa'i skye bo mama'
111b5: pa'i/ blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos pas rga ma mthong // nga ni slar 'gro nga yi shed rta myur du sbyar// da yang rgal gnas pas rtse dga'as ci zhig bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog
111b6: slar bsgyur te phyir grong khyer du zhugs so/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/ bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des
111b7: yam ka ni mi nad kyis nyan pa/ dmu rjid can lus nyam chung ba/ rang gi gcin rgyug tu bying ba/ mgon med pa/ skyabs med pa/ shin du sha thang bar dbugs dbyung shing brngub dgos pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas
111b8: kyang yang byang chub sems dpa'as shes bzhin du la lo skar pal 'di skad ces smras so/ / kha lo sbyar pa mi rtsub lus kyi mdog ngan la// dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyung rab tu dka'/ 9

112a1: lag kun skams stobs dkrugs shing nyams thag gyur/ / rang ga gcan rtag smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'dis// kha lo sgyu bas sbas pa/ lha cig po 'di shin tu nad kyis btab pa ste// da
112a2: 'jigs pa nye bar mchis pas 'gum la thug/ dad med gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyabs// mgon dang skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen ma mchis lags// byang chub sems dpas
112a3: smras pa/ nad med pa yang rmi la man ni rje dang mtshungs// nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin du mi zad pa// skyes bu mkhas pas gnas 'di mthong nas ji lta bur// rtse la dga' dang sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed par
112a4: 'gyur/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos
112a5: grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lim ka na mi shi bar gyur pa/ khyogs la bzhag pa/ ras kyi bla re phub pa/ nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor te// kun kyang ngu zhingadi skad
112a6: byung ste/ dul smre sngags 'dod cing slab shig la mgo las 'thor zhing brang rdung la tshod 'dod cing phyi bzhi 'brang bar gyur pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ma khyang pa sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sbyar
112a7: bil 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'alo sbyar ba mi 'di khyogs la ban gnas ni// mau dag sra ba shig pago las yis 'thor byed cing // sna tshogs dag gi tshig ni rjod la brang rdung pas// kun nas bskor ba byas
112a8: khyer ba su zhig yin/ / kha lo sgyur pas smras pa/ lha zhig mi 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du gum pa ste/ slan chad pa ma mchis brad bu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// longs spyod khyim dang mdza' gnyen tshogs rnams

112b1: spangs nas ni/ / 'jig rten pha rol mchis te slan chad gnyen ma mthong // byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rga bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cing mi rung // snga tshogs dang kyis gnod 'gyur nad med cing
112b2: mi rung / ring du mi gson gsod pa mkhas la cir mi rung // rgal chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir mi rung // gal te rga med nang med 'chi ba med gyur kyang / 'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal na yin no//
112b3: rgan 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba spos ci dgos// legs par slar zlog rab tu thar bar bya ba bsam// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta ma chog de slar bzlog ste/ phyir yang grong khyer du
112b4: zhugs so/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag
112b5: nyid kyis la pa ka der dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dge slong zhi ba dul ba yang dag par bsdams pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ mig phab pa/ gnya' shing
112b6: gang tsam du lta ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun supa tshogs pa/ 'gro ba dang ldog pa mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yos su lta ba mdzes pa/ bskum pa
112b7: dang spang ba mdzes pa/ chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs pa mdzes pa zhig lam kan 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du
112b8: ba l-i sbyar ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kha lo sgyur pa skyes bu sems zhi rab zhi zhing // mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta byed cing // dur smrig gos gyod shin du rab tu zhi ba

113a1: u za dpags nas mgang mkhas banan / sbyangs ga/ na 'an na nalags/ 'ad
113a2: blangs shing shin du dul bar spyod/ / bdag nyid zhi ba tshol zhing rab tu byung bar gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang bral bar bsod snyoms spyod cing rgyu// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di
113a3: na dge bar legs smras pa yang 'dod pa ste/ / rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// de ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la'ang phan// mtsha ni
113a4: nyams 'thun 'chi me 'bras bur 'gyur/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas shing te mchog de slar sbyar te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byung
113a5: chub sems dpa' la bskul pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po bas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir rab rgya chen po byed/
113a6: du bcug ste// 'obs kyang rkor bcug/ sgo gtan dam po yang 'dzugs su bcug/ srungs ma yang bkad/ dpa' bo rnams kyang than// gzhon pa yang sta gon byas/
113a7: sa yang gyon du brtag ga/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i byeng / grong bye chen pa'i ga bzhi'i lam gyi 'odas ma rnams sna bung can po'i da pa bzhin
113a8: chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ba re zhes de dag de srang du bcug go/ btsun ma'i 'kho ro la yang res 'ga' tsham yang gla dbyangs kyi rgyan chad dare/ dga' ba dang

113b1: thams ca sa rgya nga gzhan na chags nas ra 'byung bar ma 'gyu dang / ba ba sa nan khams na// da na
113b2: ces bya ste/ / zab mo mos pa'i skyes bral ga na ral za mtshon thogs sgo gar bkod// go bgos me rta glang po shing rnam bston grang ze'i phreng ba'ang bgod// 'obs
113b3: shing thugs ngag dang rta babs phyir 'thon po'o dbyed du bcug/ sgo mo rtsod grags zag pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam po bcug/ shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yod mi dag
113b4: zhing nyin mtshan srung bar byed/ / dpung chen mo de dag rnams kyang sgra skad chen po shin du zag par byed// nges pa 'di nas 'byung du 'od zhes grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid sngangs skrag
113b5: shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par mi 'gyur grang snyam byed/ / skye bo bud med dag la bsgo ba rtag tu klu dbyangs rgyunam gcad// rtse bas dga' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur
113b6: gyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis/ / bud med sgra thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang po ston// nges pa 'gror mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byas shing bgegs kyang rab
113b7: tu byos/ / kha lo sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste// dad pa khrung thung dag dang rma bya ri skegs dag dang ne tshe rnams// khang bzangs skar khung rta babs
113b8: mchog dang yang thog khril 'khod nas ni/ / dman zhing dman la mi dga' mi bde mgo sman sems shing sgra mi 'byin/ rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gis pad ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par

114a1: 'gyur/ / ldan rnams gang la gas gas pas kang+gA ma chags/ 5/ na du dgasas gan na pa//
114a2: rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra mi 'byung // grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu gnyid kyis non/ gang gi yid kyang gar byed pa dang glu lan pa la
114a3: dga' ba med/ / rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman gyur te sems khongs chud cing 'dug/ e ma ma rung shag rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen mi tshig grang snyam byed// sa 'tshom dang rgyal
114a4: bu mal cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe/ / nam phyed tsam nas 'tsho ma yi rmi lam du ni 'di dag rmis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur// shing ljon rnams
114a5: kyang rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas 'thon te sa la skyel/ / nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkha' las sa la lhung // lag pa g.yon pas sgra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pan ltung
114a6: mthong / lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og dpag chad par mthong // nyal khri de yi rkang pa bzhi chags yi
114a7: steng na nyal ba mthong / / rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu ba spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong // rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par 'thor cing chu yis khyer bar gyur pa dang // khyim thab rgyan
114a8: yang gos dang cod pan bcas te mal steng 'thor bar mthong / / grong khyer dag nas me sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang // rin po che las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chad par gyur pa

114b1: mis/ / pra tika dashal 'phyang ba ltung nas rgya mtsho chen pas dkrugs pa dang // da ma mnA ra ya rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yas pa rmis// shAkya'i bu ma'i rmilam duni 'di 'dra 'didan
114b2: mes gyur nas/ / des mig na ma mchim thaka N+Di rang gi khyil 'di skad smras// a cig rmi la ma 'di 'drams pa cir 'gyur ba ni bka' stsam cig/ bdag ni dran pa 'khrum cing mi/
114b3: kyang 'khrul la yid na mya ngan non// de yis de thos ka la bing ka rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas// sa 'tshem la spras pa khyod ni rab tu dgar 'gyur sdig pa med// sems can
114b4: gang dag bsod nams sngon spyad de dag rmi lam 'di 'dra rmi/ / sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa rmi lam 'di 'dra rmi ba ga la yod// khyod kyis sa ni rab tu g.yos pa dang // ri rtser bcas
114b5: te sa la lhur rmis pa/ / lha dang klu dang srin po 'byung po'i tshogs// kun gyis khyod mchod gtso mor byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas 'thon rmis shing // lag pa g.yon
114b6: pas sgra 'bal rmis pa ni/ / sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs drab bcad// 'dus byas dag las lta ba'i de ba 'byin// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lhung rmis shing // skar ma rnams kyang ltung bar rmis pa ni//
114b7: sa 'tshe myur du nyon mongs dgra bcom ste// khyod ni 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do shal 'thor rmis shing // lus kun chad dang sgren mo rmis pa ni// sa 'cha
114b8: myur du bud med lus spangs te/ / ring por mi thogs skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur// khyod kyis khri rkang chag par rmis pa dang // gdugs yu rin chen spras pa chag rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du chu bo

115a1: bzhi rgal cing / / nga ni 'dig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur ba mthong // khyod kyis rgyan rnams chus khyerams pa dang // nga ya gos dang cod pan khwa stang mas// sa 'tsho myur
115a2: du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni/ / 'jig rten kun gyis ngal bstod pa mthong // khyod kyis mar me brgya phrag bye ba dag/ grong khyer byung nas mun gnag gyur zis gos 'tshe myur du ma rig
115a3: rmongs pa'i mun/ / 'jig rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur// khyod kyi mu tig do shal chad pa dang // gser gyi tsheng tshong smras pa chad rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra bcad
115a4: de/ 'dus byas dag las 'du shes sud pa 'byin// sa 'tsho gang phyir nga la gus par ni// rtag tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gro med cang mya ngan med/ myur du dga'
115a5: zher mchog tu dga' ba 'thob/ ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pagyi nom byin// tshul khrims bsrungs dang rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms// de bas nga la dad pa gang rnyed pa// de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed// 'khor
115a6: bar bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/ / ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs// de bas ngal dad pa gang byed pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad// dga' ba 'thob
115a7: kyis me dga' ma skyed cig/ tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skyed cig/ dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur 'thob ste// khyod kyi rmi ltas bzang gis sa 'tsho nyol// sngon chad dge ba'i las na
115a8: yang dag bsags gyur pa/ / mi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab che// mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi brjid bsags pa dang // dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po can des rmi bar/

115b1: 'gyur// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gis chud krug dang // sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur pa dang // rab lhun po mchog kyang sngas su
115b2: gyur pa rmi/ / rmi lam na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na// mun pa mun nag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang // sa las gdugs shig byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab dang // 'od kyis
115b3: rig pas log lhung sdug bsngal rab zhi rmi/ / dkar nag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang / kha dog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs kha dog gcig sgyur dang // mchog tu ngan pa smad pa ngan
115b4: sgrags ri la yang / 'dzegs nas 'gro yang de na gos pa med pa rmi// rmi lam na ni chu bo chu yis rab gang nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba las// der ni grur byas bsgral
115b5: te gzhan dag bsgral nas ni/ / de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog thad bkod rmi// rmi lam na ni nad pa mang po nang btab pa// nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams
115b6: la/ / de ni span par gyur nas rmi sman mang byin pas// nad btab sems can khrag khrig mang po thar byed rmi// ri rab ngos la seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas ni// slob ma thal mo sbyar cing lha rnams
115b7: phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag ni yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams nam mkha' las/ kun du dga' ba'i sgra sgrog par ni rmi lam rmi/ bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par
115b8: yang / / byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi// de thos nas ni 'di ni ring por mi thogs par// mi yi lha yi lhar 'gyur snyam ste lha mi dga'// rmi lam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//

116a1: ga dang / dadas kyang rnams pas dang 'a sa mangs mas// thugs rnapa can gnas gan nga ba rgyas kyang / sa nga pa byu
116a2: bdag la pa rigs te/ byas pa gzeb ma yin par 'gyur ra snyam nas/ dmaran ma maM nyal tsaman rang gi gnas kyi 'ang bzangs nas blang ste// rgyal ba zas gtsang ba'i khang bzangs su phyin
116a3: nas 'dug go/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ma thag tu'ang bzangs thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sang ba dang / 'od de mthong ste mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar
116a4: nyung ru ma la smras pa/ kye nyung rum ci nyi ma shar tam/ gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes/ nyung rum gyis smras pa/ lha da dung du dgung phyed kyang ma pas so// lha gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing
116a5: dang rtsig pa thal mi phyin/ lus la gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid// dang bar dus na dang ba dag dang rma bya dang // ne cho khu byug dur bdag kyang rang sgra 'byin// 'od 'di lha mi'i yid du 'chi zhing bde ba ste//
116a6: rab tu sim bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar bgyid ma lags// shing dang rtsig pa thal phyung sgrib pa yod ma mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig cig deng ni 'dir byon ngas// rgyal po de ni mi dga' phyogs bcur bltas
116a7: pa dang / / sems can dag pa pad ma'i mig can de mthong nas// de ni mal nas ldang bar 'dod na ma nus te// rnam dag blo can dam pa pha la gus pa skyed// de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras/
116a8: lha cig bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab rigs// bgegs kyang ma mdzad mi dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po gnyen bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod pa mdzod// rgyal po de ni mchims

116b1: mig gang 'di skad sbas/ / khyod ni phyir ldog pa yi dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ci slong smros shig thams cad sbyin// bdag dang pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di phan thogs// de tshe byang chub sems
116b2: dpas snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/ / lha cig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la stsol// gal te stsal bar spyod na mnga' ni khyod la mchis// 'on tang rtag tu khyim na gzims shing 'byung mi 'gyur// lha cig bdag ni rga
116b3: bas tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing / / rtag tu mdog bzang dar la bab par gnas pa dang // nad ma mchis pa thob cing nad kyis mi btab dang // tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang rgud par mi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig zos
116b4: shin du sdug bsngal nyam thag ste/ / gzhon nu gnas min slong bas bdag la mthu med do// bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang // rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud las mthar to// rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs
116b5: dang rgud par mi 'gyur ba/ / lha cig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag mi stsal na// gzhan yang mchog cig gsol gyis rgyal po gsan du gsol// 'di nas shi 'phos nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur mdzod// me'i dam pa'i
116b6: tshig ni de skad thos pa dang / / sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod// phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yid rang ngo // khyod kyi bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems
116b7: dpa' slar song ste/ / rang gi khyim du phyin nas pal na 'dug pa dang / de song ba'am 'ongs par sus kyang ma tshor ro// dge slong dag de'i nam langs pa dang // rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te de'i
116b8: lo rgyus rnams spos nas/ gzhon nu ni mngon par 'byung na da ji ltar bya zhes smras so// shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAkya'i tshogs 'di ni mang la/ de ni gcig pur gyur

117a1: bas mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis so/ / de nas shAkya de dag dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa'os su gyur pa/ 'phong bslabs pa/ tshan po che chen po'i/
117a2: stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi gar sgor bkod de/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya gzhon na re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rtang rel
117a3: yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur pa/ 'phod bslabs pa
117a4: chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / / shAkya gzhon nur re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang // shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa'
117a5: bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / mdo sum dang / lam po che mang po thams cad la gdod cing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun gyis
117a6: bltas te/ rta dang glang po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgron mel tshe byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/ mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu thams cad rgyal mtshan
117a7: rtse mor thogs/ / mu tig rgyan phreng rnams kyang sbyongs la khyim 'di kun du 'od kyis snang bar byos// glu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel ba med par me 'tshe ma du gyis// gzhon nu ci nas mtsho bar ni 'gro bar
117a8: mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung bgyis/ / go bgos lag na lag cha ral gri dang / mdung thud mda' dang mtshon tsha rtse gnyis thogs// sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis//

117b1: kun chod la gtan pa ma du chud// sgo 'phar sra brkang par gtan chug la// dus la ma bab par ni skom dbye// sems can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re// nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs// me tog zla gam se ge shing
117b2: lo ris/ / ska rags sor gdu ban rgyad chings shing thogs// rkang gdu ba dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs// lha ma phan pa glang po dregs bzhin 'gro// gal te blo bur mngon par byu dang re// ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur pa//
117b3: de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud med gang dag mdung zung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa mal na 'dug pa bskor// ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur par// bye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis// rgyal bu
117b4: 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ / khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bres// gling bu dag kyang rab tu bud cing long // do mod rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sbron byas te// do mod mnyal shin du bsrung ba
117b5: gyis/ / rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su// khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar gyur ta re// 'di ni mngon par 'byung bar gyur na go/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams mi dga'// rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang
117b6: rgyal po'i rigs dang rgyud ni chad par 'gyur/ / dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga rtsen la sogs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas 'di
117b7: ces smras te/ / grogs po dag do med byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis byed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spob gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lung se can gyi pho brang du 'gras nas gnod sbyin
117b8: 'khor chen po la smras pa/ grogs po dag de mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis khyed kyis bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas theg la/ 'byung bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa/ sun srid

118a1: med bu'i stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur mi phyengs la lci/ / sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// ri yi dam pa lhun po chen po rmad nas phyung ste nam mkhar gzung nus kyi// rgyal po
118a2: yon tan lhun po ri li bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur mi nus/ / rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ mi gang nga rgyal bgyid pa de la ston pa lnga// gang dag dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor// bsam paca
118a3: pas brtson par byos la gus pa yis/ / bya yis sha khams bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis// kho bo bdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag rnams kyis bcibs pa theg/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po
118a4: sgrogs/ / dge thong dag de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa// nye grogs po dag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis de la byed thams cad mchod pa'i las la sbro
118a5: gyis shig/ de na lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par bgyi'o// lha'i bu rtsa ba bkod
118a6: pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag gis ni rta dang glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sgra mi grag par bgyi'o// lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros
118a7: shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag gis ni nam mkha'i dkyil du shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs bus 'khor bar bskor ba nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ me tog
118a8: snatshogs chal bar bkram pa/ / pog bor nas bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam der bkod pa bgyi'o// klu'i rgyal pos srung gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so//

118b1: bdag gis bdag nyid kyi snga la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len du stsal cing glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos byang chub sems
118b2: dpa' la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos ni sgo dpe'o// lam mtshon pa bya'o// lha'i bu chos spyod kyis 'di skad ces smras so//
118b3: bdag gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par bgyi'o// lha'i bu yang dag srul pos smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal nas bzhengs par gsol bar bgyi'o// de na bu'i rgyal po
118b4: du lga dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las
118b5: kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi sprin mngon par sprul te/ / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char dbab po// dge slong dag de ltar lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa nges par
118b6: bsams te brtsams so/ / byang chub sems dpa' thos sems pa la zhugs pa/ klu byang sa len pa'i 'ang bzangs namal bde ba la 'dug pa// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems
118b7: shing sems can la phanapa bya ba rjes su sems la/ sngon gyi sngon lam gyi tshig bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon der dbyung gi bdag po 'dod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ban// go 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/
118b8: sems can sdug bsngal ba dag thong nas bye ma 'o bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bcing sa te 'khor ba'i bcon pa chen por 'jug pa la 'khor ba'i bcon dras te// bcings pa bkrol ba'i sngaskrag go// sred pa'i gags pa dang /

119a1: sgrog dpa pos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol lo zhes bya ba'i sngon gyi smod lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten ma rig pa'i mun pa'i mun gan gzibs po chen
119a2: bor zhugs pa mi shes pa'i ling tog dang rabarib kyis mig bsgribs pa shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ / ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma yang nye bar bsgrubs la// rnam par thang
119a3: pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i mig sman ri lu dang spun thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/ marig pa'i mun pa phran gnag dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab ba dang / ling tog dang / rnyog pa thams cad pas la nas shes
119a4: rab kyi mig rnam par spyad do zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur to/ / kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/ bdag dang
119a5: bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can/ / 'du shes dang / sems dang / sgrub phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa bzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i lam bstan te// nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal bsnyil par bya'o/
119a6: zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten rnam par ma zhi ba// thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa// dra bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa// 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur pa// 'jig rten
119a7: 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang / / 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor la 'khor ba las mi ldog pa mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis chog par byed pa'i
119a8: res kyang bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po 'di mngon du gyur te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to// skad cig de la lha'i bu chos spyod dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams

119b1: kyis btsun mo'i 'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te/ mi sdug par gnas pa dang / smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas nam mkha' la 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de nas lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che
119b2: rnams kyis/ / pad ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i sman la smras// dur khrod dbus 'dir bzhugs par gyur lags na// khyod ni ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur// lha'i dbang phyug rnams kyis de bskul nas// yud tsam btsun mo'i
119b3: 'khor la lta zhing rtog/ bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong // dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed// byang chub sems dpas thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang // kha cig
119b4: ni gos lhung bar gyur/ kha cig ni skra zhig/ kha cig ni rgyan brul/ kha cig ni cod pan lhung / kha cig ni phrag pa mi sdug par gyur/ kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/ kha cig ni bzhin mi sdug par gnas// kha cig ni mig gyur/ kha
119b5: cig ni kha chu zag/ kha cig ni sdur/ kha cig ni lung pa lu/ kha cig ni dgod/ kha cig ni brdo la/ kha cig ni so 'khrig kha cig ni bzhin mdog 'gyur/ kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug par gyur te/ lag pa ring por gyur/ kha cig
119b6: ni rkang pa phral/ kha cig ni mgo phyung / kha cig ni mgo g.yogs/ kha cig ni bzhin gyi dbyibs gyur/ kha cig ni lus ma rung bar gyur/ kha cig ni lus sgren mor gyur/ kha cig ni lus bskums shing sbur/ kha cig ni rdza
119b7: rnga la 'khyud nas lus gan rkyal du 'gyel/ kha cig ni bi bang dang rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag pa brkyang / kha cig ni gling bu la sos 'debs/ kha cig ni rol mo'i cha spyad kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang /
119b8: pheg la 'dzin/ kha cig ni mig 'dzums shing 'byed la 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha gdangs par gyur te/ de ltar sa la mi sdug par gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor lo lta zhing byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed do/

120a1: de la 'di skad ces bya ste// 'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid byung ste// snying rjes shugs byung nas ni 'di skad smras// e ma skyes dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur/ srin mo'i tshigs la dga' ba ji ltar rnyed 'dod yingan/
120a2: tan yod min yon tam dzin/ gti mug mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan// dper na bya ni d+ya rgyang chud pa bzhin// nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
120a3: mdo/ / / bam po bcu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis yang btsun mo'i 'khor la rtog cing snying rje chen po'i skye bas sems can gyi phyir smre ste/ 'di ni byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/
120a4: gsang ba'i gnas su gsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i snod ri mo can rnams la mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di
120a5: na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste/ glang po che tshur bying ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ brtson ra'i nang gi btson bcas pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste/
120a6: phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ khyi keng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ bye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs
120a7: so/ / 'di na byis pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/ spre'u rnyong la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su bzung ba ste/ nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/
120a8: tshong gi gnas kyi lug dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsugs pa ste/ sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'dam du zhing thogs pa ste/ glang po che rkan

120b1: bo 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so/ / 'di na byis pa de dag ni bong pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ dmus long g.yangs chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so//
120b2: 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ste/ sa'i steng gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni dub 'phrul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni
120b3: 'khor ba ste/ rnga mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog rtsol ba ste/ dmus long ril byin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi sbyang gis
120b4: btags pa dang mtshungs so/ / 'di na byis pa de dag ni rnyis pa ste/ dpyid kyi rtswa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/ zla ba mar gyi de'i zla ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni
120b5: byis pa rnams la za ba ste/ klu la nam mkha' lding dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba ste/ gru bo tshal chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/ 'dron po la
120b6: chom po mang po dang mtshungs so/ / 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jig pa ste/ shing sa la la rlung mar chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la bsod pa ste/ skye bo la sbrul mig gdug pa dang mtshungs so//
120b7: byis pa rnams ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/ ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bskus pas chod pa bzhin no// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer ba ste/ shing gi phung po chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa
120b8: rnams rtsen pa ste/ byis pa chung ngu rang gi gcin rtug la rtse ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/ glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slub ste/ g.yon

121a1: can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag brid pa bzhin/ / 'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste/ brgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so// 'di dag gis byis pa rnams 'tshos pa ste/ srin mo
121a2: rnams kyis tshong pa 'chos pa dang mtshungs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dgags btsun mo'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/ lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par
121a3: sgom/ mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/ smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus la yang de dang 'dra bar rnam par sgom/ lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par mthong // lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las sbyor//
121a4: sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed// 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas steng gi glad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba dang / mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang / rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag
121a5: par mthong ngo / / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smraso// las kyi zhing las skyes shing sred pa'i chu las byung ba 'jig tshogs ming du gtags// mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag
121a6: gi thigs pas gang / zhag dang rnag dang lgad pa dang ni glang rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang // rtag tu ngan skyugs zag cing kun kyang dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa/ lpags dang so dang sgra dang spu yis bsgyur cing lpags/
121a7: pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan// rgyu ma mchin pa mtsher ba chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyams chung ba// rkang ding chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang
121a8: zhing mya ngan khyab la bkres dang skom pas kun du nyen/ / skye ba po dag lus ni bug mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa// mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur// de ltar

121b1: byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to/ / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i
121b2: 'khor la rnam par lta zhing 'dzum yang ston/ / sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyir zhing lta na phyi shol byed dam ci// yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad gzung bar mi nus so// yang na chags pa med pa 'di
121b3: yul rnams la chags par mi 'gyur grang / / lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i yid dam brjod par ma gyur grang // lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras pa/ de skad smra ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod par yang mngon par
121b4: 'byung ba dang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa de khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yin na/ srid pa tha ma pa la gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub
121b5: sems dpa' nges par byas pa/ yid byung bar gyur pa/ blo brtul ba/ tshul du shes shing ri ngas thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs na shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas lag pa g.yas
121b6: pas rin po che'i dra ba slang de khang bzangs kyi steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang des mthong ba/
121b7: nam mkha'i dkyil na lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lha brgya stong gis bskor cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog gi rna
121b8: rman dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btud nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'jig rten skyod pa bzhi yang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor/

122a1: cing go cham pa bgos/ ral gra dang/ mad gzha dang / hU~M shung dang / mtshon rje gnyis pa dang / ci gsum pa la kun thogs shing tshul tu shes par nang rdzun cod pan dang / gnag nan 'byung ba/
122a2: byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'i bu ma dang zla gnyis ca thogasas g.yon na 'jug par mthong ngo // sa ma'i bdag po rgyal yang rnam byed tsam na sha ba maman/
122a3: chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/ ra yi bkra shis 'di ni don kun grupa// dmong gdon mi za par don thubagyis// 'dun pa phyi shol ma byed la gong na// rgyal rgyun gyis brgyan pa la byin// denas 'du pas
122a4: tshig de thos nas/ yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// sprin ma ring nang pad ma'i mdabam rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' mi'i seng ge skyon ka'i gla bcubs bu dang / me tog ku mu dang tha ba dang ni dga' ba pad ma'i rdzing
122a5: sar bar 'jam pa'i pad ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal/ / sbyangs pa'i gsang dang nyi ma shar mthag dang tha ba dri me dag zi dang ma dkrugs me'i 'od 'gro nor bu klog 'od 'bar ba'i gzi brji can// glang po rgyags pa bgyid pa'i glang po'i/
122a6: stobs can pa lang khru mchog dgas rgyal dang da pa'i skabs can thakhas mdzes shin du napas lags gang du bzhid// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa gang gi don dung yis sngon chad lag gang pami
122a7: dadra de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing / / chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rdul srid nor gser gos dang rin chen gang pa'i shing dmang po rlung mthogs thugs ldan tos la mcho/ ldan pa pang// bskal pa bye /
122a8: khrig mang nas tshul thams pa bsrungs bzad pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shes pa thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can da yim yongs

122b1: dbum pa dus la bas/ 'dun pas smras / pyod brnamam thag tu lta ba'i phyir zlas na snyas ma na mas rgyunan// gagis sa rnyan
122b2: 'phel bar 'gyur rigs sung bstan ces bdeg na mamapa pa/ rnas pa/ de bur gyur/ smras pa gzhan nu 'don pasad rnanams pa mtshan ldan// byed kyi zu sa yod rnam pa tA~M dza~M swA na// den
122b3: dbang pag 'joms sbyar/ / na 'dun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur// gral te 'jig rten gyig brtul bags nas ni// btsun ma 'khor za sa mngon par byung 'gyu na// byang chuban gi med pa'i gnas thob /
122b4: na yis skyed pa 'di ches byed// ngo srong brtan pa 'di ni mchis // dim mchis pa ma lags med kyis/ na ldan par 'tshal ba bdag gis tshigag san pa dgas// rnam pa/ bzhig/ b+h+yas pa/
122b5: gang ga don du 'dan lacig brgyal thugs dang dka' thub rnam padu mtsham/ ri dgas kyi grags pa dang / ral pa'i bor tshugs dang / u0f88u0f90dang shing kun gyon pa dang / sen mo dang / prA dang / Ags d
122b6: ang / las la gdu dang / yongs su gdud pa rnam pa du ma sgo pa bgyid de/ bdag cag ji ltar lha dang mi'i thun su mtshogs thob par 'gyur nas brtul zhugs dang gang thab drag ba com mo// ngo da pan su mchogs pa na
122b7: khyod kyis brnyas lags te/ rgyal zed babyor cing rgyas la ba zhi la legs te/ nyams dag shed me dkyi mo pos gang pa 'di dang / skyed mosatshal dam pa mchog sa rtog bras pa rnam pa tshogs kyis brgyan te/
122b8: tshogs sna tshogs tham pa 'ong ba byin pa 'di dag dang / rje ngam rtag ung pa la dang / bad ma dpa sa su dang / pad ma gar pos mdzes par byang ga/ dang dang / rabya dang / 'ardzab dang / dras dang / khwa shung /

123a1: dang sgra s+tha sad 'byin pa/ shing a s+tha dang / mya ngan tshang dang / tsam pa ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang / ka sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor garin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi phreng gis leg
123a2: par brgyan pa/ mig mangs ris su bkod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bum bskor ba// rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa/ dgun dang / dbyar dang / ston dang / dpyid gnas bde ba rnams dang /
123a3: khang bzangs chen po chos dang / chos bzangs dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs te sa lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / kar khur dang /
123a4: bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i da ba sgra 'byung ba 'di dag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang rol mo'i cha byad rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bar dang / khar tra
123a5: dang / gling bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / sgra snyan dang / rdza rnga dang / pa ta ha dang / glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgod pa dang /
123a6: 'jo ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / tshul du shis pa dang / spyod pa mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la/ lha khyod kyang dang ni ma yol to// gzhon pa thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa/ lang tshol bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa 'dod pa la
123a7: ma rol pa lags kyis/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mig stong dang ldan pa lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dgyes par rol la/ slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di lnga smras
123a8: so/ sum bcu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar// dgyes pa'i cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol// slad kyis bgres par gyur nas brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsom par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/

123b1: 'dun pa mi dgos te/ 'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ myur du 'gro ba/ g.yo ba/ ri bzang po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba// zil ba'i thigs pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa/
123b2: lag pa bcings pa stong pas byis pa bring ba ltar snying po med pa/ chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu med pa/ sdod som ta pa ltar mthar 'jig pa/ ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha'i glog ltar ring du mi
123b3: gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal can/ khri shing ma lus ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/ byas pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba/ chu'i chu bur lta bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/ smig rgyu ltar
123b4: 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba/ sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam ltar lta ba phyin ci log gis yongs su zin pa/ rgya mtsho dgar dga' ba ltar ngoms mi shes par byed pa/ tsha chu ltar skom
123b5: par byed pa/ sbrul gyi mgo ltar reg par dka' ba/ g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhru pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa/ shes rab can rnams kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa dang bcas
123b6: pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas rnam par spangs pa/ rig pa rnams kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa/ mi mkhas pa rnams kyis yongasasu bzung ba/ byis pa
123b7: rnams kyis brten pa yin no/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs// ngan skyugs snod bzhin mi gtsang rnam par spangs// 'dun pa dge ba thams cad 'jigs byed par/
123b8: 'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga' mi skye// de'i tshe 'dun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste/ ngu zhing de nas mig nas mchi ma zag la/ sdug sngal bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig/

124a1: brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po rtsom ste ri dgas pags pa 'chang // sgra dang sen mo ag tse ma ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing btul zhugs gnas// sred pa dang ni sngam ldu
124a2: dag dang drus ma 'bras za kha cig spyi'u tshugs 'dug dang ba lang btul zhugs gnas/ / ji ltar bdag cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyad 'phags 'khor los sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // brgya byin rdo rje
