124a3: 'chad dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul bar 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam gtan bde ba 'dod/ / mi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shin du 'byor cing rab tu rgyas la shin du lo legs pa// de bzhin kun dga'ir
124a4: bdag dang ba skyed mos tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs/ / bud med 'di dag rnams kyang pi bang dang ni gling bu dag dang klu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra len cing mchis// dga' bar babyed
124a5: dang gang dang glu dbyangs sbyar ba shin du bslabs pa 'di dag spyod cing des pa ma bzhud cig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang bcas dang bsngags
124a6: dang bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dgangs ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga yis yid byung byas ma gyur/ / sngon chad bag med dbang du song zhing gti mug dbugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkris shing mun gyur chos 'di mi
124a7: shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzin dang tshor ba las 'das/ / dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shrI glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsob gsog snying
124a8: po med la bdag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste/ nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan dbyin ngas sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos

124b1: kun dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par 'gyur/ / 'dun pas smras pa/ pad ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing // do shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// mkha' la sprin tshogs dag las byung ba'i
124b2: glog 'dra ba/ / malan rnam par mdzes pa 'di la mi gzigs sam// pi lding dang ni kharda dag dang sgra snyan dang // rdza rnga dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang // bya ba rma bya ka la bing ka sgra 'byin pa// me 'am ci yi byam 'dra/
124b3: 'di yang dor lags sam// su man dang ud pa la dang par sha ka/ tsam pa ka dang dri mchog phreng ba me tog bskus// dus kyi a ka ru mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang // byug padam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs mapa
124b4: shin du dri gad 'dri ldan ro bro gyo nom dang / / sku ru ma dag dang bshos skur shin du legs sbyar dang // skyems kyi ro yang khar bcas pa rab sbyar ba// 'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lha khyod gang du bzhud // grang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba
124b5: dam pa dang / / cha ba'i dus na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang // ka shi ba'i na bza' bzang po mang po dang // de dag la yang mi gzigs lha khyod gang du bzhud// lha yul dag na lha rnams dag ni ci 'dra'abar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngapo
124b6: 'di dag rab 'byor pa/ / dga' zhing pade dang ldan la dgyes par rol mdzad de// de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'dun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med
124b7: par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang me dang lha'i 'dod pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur pa med/ / rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi gdu 'khor los sgyur ba'i
124b8: rgyal por gyur nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med nang na 'dug pa dang / / sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'di 'ongs sprul pi'i lha'i

125a1: nang na yid 'od dpal ldan dam par yis sngon chad spyad/ / lha'i gnas su dbang sgyur bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor ba mchog la spyad kyang ngoms mgyur nang ci dman pa'i di la bsnyen
125a2: pas ngangoms 'gyur ram de ni gnas min no/ / gzhan yang 'dun pa de ni sdug bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gdug pas dkrugs shing nyam ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon med skyabs med cing // /
125a3: gti mug ma rig mun pa dag na rga dang na dang mchi ba'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra' yis kun du gnod cing rnam par gnod pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong
125a4: dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs bstsags te sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan por gzungs btab byar/ / gru de dang nyid zhu gnas bdag nyid
125a5: r gal te bdag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'dal bar che ba khro ba'i dba' rlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri glong 'khyil dgra yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar dka' las sbrul lo snyam ste de sems
125a6: de 'dra'o/ / de phyir srid 'tshe dgrar bcas lta ba'i 'dzin khri dang // nyon mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag rgal te// bdag nyid rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa// rga med shi med zhi ba'i thang ba dadod par bya// de'i tshe
125a7: 'dun pa de bas kyang rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdun pa nga yis nges par byas pa nyon// sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson// /
125a8: mi g.yo las kyang mi g.yo gnod pa med// ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mi g.yo// bdun pas smras pa/ rdo dza'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdo rje'i gonam lcags dgra lta mdung

125b1: thung mda' char dang / / lcags bskol glog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang // ri rtse kun du 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'bab kyang // nga ni khyim la 'dod pa phyir yang mi skyed do// de'i tshe lha'i bu nam mkha' la 'khod pa dag
125b2: gis ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ste/ me tog gi char yang phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yul rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // sems can dag pa snying rje snying brtser ldan// blo gros mchog
125b3: ldan rgyal gyur rgyal gyur cig/ mgon po 'gro la mi 'jigs sprin mdzad pa// mkha' la rdul gnag dub 'jug rings dag/ mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog thugs mi chags// dri med yul gya bde bas mi gos te// chu
125b4: las pad ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin/ / dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros dang // lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pas// byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud
125b5: med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so// sgra thams cad kyang mi skrag par byas so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig/ nam
125b6: gyi gud la bab par rig/ skar ma'i bdag po rgyal dang ldan par rig/ de kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa dang skyo bar ma byed par rta sngags ldan legs par brgyan te ma thogs
125b7: par ngal byin/ byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis// byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
125b8: la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi bkod pas rings pa rings par yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so/ / de na dri za'i bdag po rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ni dri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du

126a1: ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyad dang glung dbyangs sna tshogs len cing shar phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser sgra'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bsor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i sha
126a2: phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs
126a3: pa/ / spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang pa'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba
126a4: byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas nas// byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'byung ba/ nor bu rin po
126a5: che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos kyi phye ma dang me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas slong pa'i rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs nas 'ongs par
126a6: gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te// ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas// byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po lus
126a7: dan ni gnod sbyin nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer thogs pa/ / lag na mar me thogs pa/ sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa/ mnga' gzhu dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum
126a8: pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'phang mdung la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa// go cha dang ya lad sra ba bgos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs

126b1: nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sem dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu gsum/
126b2: 'i b+halha lha'i matog dag slo dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog na rgyan dang / rgyan thogs pa rnams dang / lhan cig tu 'angs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang
126b3: ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la khor dang bcas te// byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// dge slong dag de ltar 'dun pas byang chub sems
126b4: dpa'i tshig thos nas/ mig mchi mas gang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// rdo rngo khyod ni dus mkhyen pa/ tshod mkhyen pa/ ran pa mkhyen pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang / tshod ma
126b5: lags na/ ci'i slad du bka' de skad stsal// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pang ni dus la bab po// smras pa/ rdo jo gang gi dus la bab/ byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ sems can rnams kyi don ni cho la ba
126b6: na/ / byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas// 'gro ba dgrol zhes nga yis yun ring nas smon lam btab pa de yi dus la bab// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid de// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sa bla ba dang bar snang de bzhin
126b7: spyod/ / lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams brtson par gyur// klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang // ba dros pa dang
126b8: de bzhin rgya mtsho yang / / mi mchog mngon par byung ba'i dus babapas// de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson par gyur// gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang // rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab

127a1: zhi byu / / de dag rnams kyis 'jig tan gsum mdzad pa// mi mchog da la mchod phyir mngon can// sngon kyang spyod rdzo rdzogs par gyur payi// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu sngags
127a2: pa yang / / rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta byed cing // rjes su mthun pas mchod pa bya snyam byed// gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po de// rdo rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas// lus lago bgos/
127a3: stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan// gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar ba thogs// lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis kyang // g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur// sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas te// mngon par 'byung la//
127a4: rjes su rtog par byed// skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang // rang gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te// mi yi dam pa de'i mdun 'dug nas// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te// skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus
127a5: la bab/ / do mod khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub// bdag kyang khyod dang thabs cig mchi bar bgyi// 'dod chags sel ba bar chad 'byung mi 'gyur// lha'i bu yang dag skul pos bskul byas pa// stobs dang brtson
127a6: 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs/ / sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol// nga ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang // yid 'od me tog char pa 'bebs shing
127a7: lhags/ / de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dud// lha yis bskor cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar// grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo gang yod pa// de dag thams cad yi dngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam
127a8: rnams las nyams/ / rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung rma bya ri skegs rnams// de dag rnams kyang yi dngal myur du nyal te de dag gzugs mi mthong // shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang //

127b1: glang chen rta dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par gyur// bud med tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yod mtshor// de
127b2: ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'od tshig ka la bing ga'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ / nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas 'dun pa de la spras// 'dun pa rta po bsngags ldan bzang po legs brgyan legs pa rang la byin//
127b3: gal te ra la byams par sems na bgegs ma byed par myur du byin// 'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas mig gang rang ga jo bo dal smras// sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas ci zhig bgyi// dus mkhyen
127b4: cing ni tshed mkhyen chos spyor gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ / khyod kyi sgo bkum gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur// brgya byin gyi ni yid kyis sems pa'i dbang gis sgro yang bye bar gyur// 'dun pas/
127b5: de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor// kyi hud bdag grogs su yod ji lta bya zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug snyam// gzi brjid ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' shig thos// yan
127b6: lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed/ / rgyal po rgyal po'i skye ba de dag rnams kyis 'di mchor// bud med tshogs kyang gnyid lag lha rnams kyis ni thags ldan gnyed log byas kyi thad 'di 'i
127b7: snron nadabasams pa'i smon la mthams cad gra 'gyu ga/ nga bya dag dgo' ba'i yid kyis 'dran pa de la smras// 'dan pA ta mchog bstag sa la na migs par bral cig dzin pa rtsomabya// lha dang min/
127b8: gis rnga dung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas// 'on kyang lhas bskal pa mthong khyer mchog 'di sad par yod ma gyur// 'dren par snang drim med la lha'i 'od ba mdzes la ltos// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba ma das/

128a1: mchod phyir gang lhags lhas// bad srogs khyim thab brgya byin dpung bskor sngon mdzes par 'dug pa dang // lha dang lha min mi'am ci tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos// bdun pa des kyang
128a2: lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan ta bo de la spras/ / sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rtag skad sgrogs shing shog/ de yis dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas nas// yid me dga'
128a3: bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs par dbul pa byas/ / mtshan mchog mda' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chibs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags// khyod kyis sngon chad gang dgong sa smon lam dgrub
128a4: g+hagyur cig gshegs su gsol/ / gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/ de ni gang tshemal nas langs
128a5: sa 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos/ / targyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon// spyod ba'i lag pa rnam dag pad ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog brteg/ brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de'i mdun na lam ni 'di
128a6: zhes ston/ / de yis gsal ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btangs rnams snang bas gsal// de tshe ngan mod kun ni sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa med// me tog char babasil snyan bya ba sgra byung lha dang lha min bstong/
128a7: thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong byer mchog la bskor ba byas padang // skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs// mdun du 'dug nas snying rjes dra ba'i yid ldan da mas
128a8: padama'adra ba'i bzhin la sbas/ / khyod bral sgren mor mi la 'di grong kyar thams cad mun pas kun du dkrugs par gyur// do mod khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dga' bde bgyid pa 'ga' ma mchis// sran chad

128b1: byatshogs rnams kyid pa dag dang / / glags bamatha' las blad ni sa bskyed pa'i// btsun mo'i 'khyod gyi gling dra ldan pa dang // bab shis ska dang glus thos mi 'byur// na ma sa banam pa rgyang na gshegs gyur na/
128b2: gdugs mtshan khyod la mdzad pa bgyid pa yi// lha dang grub tshogs can chad mthong mi 'gyur // lha yi dri yang sbyin cad sdom mi 'gyur// phreng babatags nas zhag ma na gyungar ba ltar// khyod kyis dmed pa zang de bzhin d+ha sa/
128b3: khyod bzhud man chad gci brjod dpal ma mchis// ga la lta ba bzhin du bdag la gdang// kr-ing sh+yer bran gyi dang stobs blags te// 'di dgan pa 'dun dmangs ma 'gas// gang gisas 'dir 'khar la nas
128b4: lung bstan drang srung sdig ni nga brdzun gru / / bsod nams nga nA ba spyod byu // nas bas pa dzis// rtul ba'i ba zang bar 'di du yang 'chud// shAkya tshogs 'ad
128b5: yo tunyams/ / dri med bras bad na ga bzhu par// bdag kyang byed dang ldan cig mchi bar kyai// khan kya thugs pa kyi thugs rje basmang nas ni// kyis pazang 'di la gachags sugs pa// thakrim ldan pa ma
128b6: na pa ga ci gas/ skye mapa sbyin pa // sa byu sh-i 'dzugs / gas pa'i gnas sa pa// byung sa pa mi ma mamab /
128b7: rinI ser sku'i gnas su mngon phyogs te// bgr-ing 'dug nyal dang 'chag pa mi bya'o// gang che 'gro ba'i gtson ba// byang chub sems dpa' dbyung shing // de na mkha' las 'gro ba'i cha// lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/
128b8: 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin/ di ni pa sad nams ning chen yin// 'din pa sod nams 'dod pa'i dang // mtsho mad 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa// sems can rnams lathugs rdzabs// 'di las bskal pa khyim du

129a1: sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/ / 'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// 'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag/ brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod mnyams// 'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams// don du
129a2: mi gnyer tshul khrims srung / / sems can yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung // yan la gnyid lag gcad mur kyang // khro bo mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'// 'di ni rtag brtson 'grus ldan
129a3: bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'/ / 'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad// 'di rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad
129a4: bsregs nas ni/ / sems can bye ba 'grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab chags mi mnga'// rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las// grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te// rang byung ba yi rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtag du
129a5: byams thugs ldan/ / thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon// dga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa// tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho ga mkhyen// 'di ni shin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os// thugs
129a6: dge dag cing dri ma bral/ / yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs// mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags// ring nas na ba'i sman pa//
129a7: lags// rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta zur spyan stong mnga'// tshangs pa lta bu ro rang byung gyur// lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa// brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang / dpa' zhing thugs
129a8: ni 'dod chags bral/ / nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste/ ma rgyal dgralas rgyal ba lags// seng ge lta bur bsnyems pa spangs// glang po lta bur rab tu la thugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi gtso// bzod//

129b1: 'jug par // nga thugs pa// ma da ba mas// gas sa mu dag/ smrang ma nga ldan pa rgyu// // rlung chags sem su~M la~M k+Sha nga mas ngas/ no//
129b2: balhun po ltar mig so// dogs lta bur gsos su gyur// rin chen 'byung gnas ster mi 'khrugs// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha yi bdud kyang bcom// 'din de
129b3: dpon chen po ste/ lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la// yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa po// mun pa rab rib rnam par grol// sa dang lha yul grags
129b4: pa yi/ / rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga'ab// dpag tu medal bstod pas bsod// khyod la bstong pa'i bsod nams des// smra ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog/ da song da da ltar byang chu sem/
129b5: dpa' mngon par byung nas shAkya'i yul dang / ke'u ta'i yul dang / gyad yul las 'das te me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang nam nas
129b6: par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'dug nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
129b7: tshogs chen po slar bkye'o/ / sla rab kye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar gtang ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la
129b8: bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'dun pa khyod song la rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan khyed nye slar log shig/ sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar log pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/ de sang du yang mchod rten des/

130a1: 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gtsug pud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas ngas
130a2: ral gres gtsug pud bcad debar snang la bor ba dang / de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te// deng sang du yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyi dus skyed byed do//
130a3: der mchod rten yang byas te/ deng sang mchod rten de gtsug phung blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chags so// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung yang gas ka shib kyod pa rje lnga rung
130a4: gis gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gos shig rnyed na ni lags so snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te// byang chub sems dpa' la dur
130a5: smig dgos par gyur to snyam mo/ / de na lha'i bu gcig cig lha'i gzugs mi mngon par byas te/ rngon pa'i gzugs lta thus gos dung sbyin bgos nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du byin to// de nas byang chub sems dpapa
130a6: dal 'di skad ces smras so/ / gal te grags po khyod kyis gos dung smrig rnams kho bo la byin na// kho bo'i gos ka shi ba 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no// des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang byed la mdzes la 'on rnams kyang kho bo la
130a7: mdzes so/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khe bas byed la bslang ngo // de nas lha'i budzin pa'i gzugs la bu des gos dung smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/ ges ka shi pa rnams kyang blangs so// de nas
130a8: bu'i budes mas pa bskyed de lag pa gnyis gas go ba de dag thangs nas spyi bal bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang kur gyi bya ba'i phyir nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas das mtshad

130b1: chen tsigs te/ de sang du yang mtshad can darang sdig grangs bzhes mengad du chags sa// gang gis byang chubs pas dpas gtsug gra cad dpa/ gos drang smrig dmas chags pa da u0f7f// kwa'i zubargya mo dag na zung
130b2: tshi ma zhing yid rangs te/ / mchog tur batra dga'an/ dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes te// kye grogs po dag gzhan nu den grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
130b3: nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye ba las yongs su 'grel bar 'gyur ba nas// rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / sgra sngags 'de pa dang //
130b4: bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su bkrol te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/ bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ zhi ba/ rdul
130b5: dang bral ba/ 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang gzha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu rgyud nas 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du
130b6: grag par gyur to/ / de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang dgun da dbyar gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tshe ma snyed pa de'i
130b7: tshe gcig tu 'dus nas/ bya kur ra mo bzhin du du dmo 'thon par gyur to// de na bud med kha cig ni shin du mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas/ kha cig ni kye hud bu zhes 'dzer cing du'o/ kha cig ni kyi hud ming po zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o// kha
130b8: cig ni kyi hud khyim thab ces 'dzer to/ / kha cig ni jo bo zhes 'dzer to// kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o// kha cig ni lus rdeb cing ngu'o// kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo// ba gcig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing

131a1: du'o/ / kha cig ni mig bsnur cing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa bad+mal rdob cing du'o// kha cig ni brang rdung zhing du'o// kha cag ni lag pa dpung par rnga ba cang du'o// kha cag na mgor rdung zhing du'o// kha cig na
131a2: mgo las 'thor zhing du'o/ / kha cig ni skra 'jig cing ngu'o// kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas chongs 'don to// kha cig ni ri dgas mo dug mangs phog pa bzhin du glo bur du
131a3: rgyug cing ngu'o/ / kha cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o// kha cig ni chu shing rlung dmar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'byor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sa la skyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to// kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin
131a4: dus la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o/ / kha cig ni shing rtsa nas phyung ba bzhin du blo bur dus la sgyel nas du'o// sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams la smras pa// ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag/ shA
131a5: rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes gde'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du grong dakhyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig/ de dag gis phyi nang du
131a6: kyang ma rnyed nas skra dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau tamA smre sngags 'don te/ / sa la 'gre ldog cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du spang du gsol// de nas rgyal pos
131a7: phyogs bzhir po nya ta ba bskyeste/ khyed dang la gzhan nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog shig/ mtshan mkhan dang lhas mkhan rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi cha bsgo nas mngon par 'byung ngo zhes
131a8: lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong pa dang / lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char 'bab par mthong ngo // de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di nas byung ngo // sa nas de dag cung zad cig pazad du

131b1: song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi ba na la mgo la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni gzhan nu gas ka shi ba rnams yin na// gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bas dade
131b2: 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo/ / de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pas rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo // de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ kye 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid
131b3: de 'od gis de la ma dras kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/ de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa gos ka shi ba 'di dag gis phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang // 'dun pas smras pa/ de lnga ni
131b4: ma yin te 'dis kyang gzhon nu la gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo/ / gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka sha ba 'di rnams 'di la byin no// de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la thogs te// de
131b5: nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo / / de dag gis yang 'dun pa la dris pa/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu dong na nus sam/ des smras pa mi nus so// gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa ste// /
131b6: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por mi 'jug go zhes de de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste// gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de
131b7: bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang btul ba brtan pas slar mi ldog go// de nas 'dun brta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du phyin to// de nas ring ba zhig lon
131b8: pa dang / rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang // ming chen dang / ma 'gags pas bsnyeg pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po ltar ma khregs pa dang / sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyan de rnams de dag gis ma thog go// gang
131b9: gi cha de dag gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mi 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis rgyan

132a1: 'dir dag rdzing du dong ro snyam mo/ / de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go ta mIs rgyan de dag rdzing du bor te// deng sang du yang rgyan gyi rdzing zhes ming du chags so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe byang chub/
132a2: sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' bo byung / de tshe ser skye'i grong khyer bdag mtha dgas de/ kun gyi snying la gzhon nu ma lan nyal snyam sems// mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra// sa 'tshom dang de
132a3: bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sang / / ma la du ltas na byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas// kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhud ces// rgyal po'i khyim du drang mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur/
132a4: rgyal pos sgra thos nas sal skyel gyur te// e mang yi bu gcig pa zhes dung mo byung // de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas// shAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbyugs kyang byung // sa bcom yang ma la nas sal
132a5: lung par gyur/ / sgra rnams 'apal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur// sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring por mi thogs shes// 'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs// gzugs ni gzugs
132a6: bzang shin du dri med yan lag spras/ / gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'od sdug/ dpal yon ldan pa bsngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'os// bdag ni mal du bor te khyod ni gang du bzhud // yon tan mnga'/
132a7: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar// skam yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyi// sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par bgyi// khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs dka' brab
132a8: spyad par bgyi/ / bskyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis// rnam dag sa mo do yang mun rdul phyag dang 'dra// mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i// grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa

132b1: ma lags 'brog dang mtshungs/ / gyi byang glang byangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can// kyi hud lkug stug po'i rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor// kyi hud gser gyi drabs khyab pa'i bar snang yang // yon tan ldan dngad bral bas byin//
132b2: chad mi blta'o// su mo de yang shin du sdug bsngal thob gyur cing // shAg kya'i bu mom du shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin/ nga ni 'jig rten dag nan/ bi/ mthar byed ces/ mi mchog dam pa des ni sngon yang smrad
132b3: pa yin/ / drang srong chen po dge bsong dag spyad pa de// nam byung nas ni dpag tshad drug du song gyur nas// bdun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams gtang // 'dun pa 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song
132b4: shig/ yab dang yum dag la yang da yi tshig gis ni// gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi// chos rnams bsan nas thugs kyang
132b5: zhi bar 'gyur zhes spros/ / 'dun pa de bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa// 'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces// mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la rdeg 'gyur gyis// bdag la
132b6: nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis/ / byang chub sems dpa'i slad smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni// khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes rtag tu bsgom gyuraH/
132b7: dal byams pa bzhin spyong la'ang byams par 'gyur// 'dun pa ta mchog dang ni rkyen rnams khyer nas su// mi mchog dam pa de yi bskyed mos tshal du byin// bskyed mos tshal gyis srings ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes
132b8: nas/ / kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya' rnams la smras// gzhon nu 'di yi ta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang // bskyed mos tshal du byin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzod cig/ rgyal pos de ga dkris nas shAkyas bskor nas ni// ba

133a1: tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes bskyed mos tshal du byin/ / sa 'chos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas// tshig de la ni yid mches te dgar mgyur// gzhon nu byang chub mthob par du phyir 'dir yang // byon cing
133a2: ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin/ / rgyal pos ta mchog dang ni mdun pa de mthong nas// dung mo btab ste sa yi steng du sbrel bar gyur// kyi hud nga'i bu gling bu rol mo dbyangs sgra mkhas// rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du
133a3: song / 'dun pa khyod kyis nga la 'dir ni legs par spos// byang chub sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ sgo ni su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur// lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas// 'dun pas smras
133a4: nga rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la bson/ / dgung phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du// 'dun pa rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsungs// bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs
133a5: rang bud med tshogs kyang bslad/ / de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig mthos// bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul// phan pa mdzad pa gang du dgyes par gshegs shes bgyis// brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul 'khor
133a6: ldan pa'i chabasgo phye/ / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg/ dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos// nam mkha' shin du yangs pa 'di las gshegs gyur te// 'od ni rab tu btang bas
133a7: mun pa mun nag gsal/ / me tog bab cing sel snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung // lha dang de bzhin lha'i bu mo rnams kyis brtod// nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs// 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams
133a8: byar nas su/ / de ni du zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang // sa 'chos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas// rab tu rgyal bar gyur tes yi steng du skyel// bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni// chu ga blangs/

133b1: shing shAkya'i drim 'khru bar byed// mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'od// phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar gyur du 'od snyam byed/ shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas// rta yi rgyal po rta mchog de yi mgul nas 'jus/
133b2: sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas nas// mya ngan gyur cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra// kyi hud bdag gi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag gi mi mchog dri mer zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba// kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs can
133b3: kyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan/ kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma spad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa// kyi hud bdag gi yon
133b4: tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen po mchog ldan pa/ / kyi hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred mad bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa// byi hud bdag gi shin du 'jam dbyangs ka la bing ka'i sgra skad tshangs
133b5: dbyangs snyan ldan pa/ / kyi hud bdag gis grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po// kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dag
133b6: mdzad pa/ / kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung bsgra 'byin lum bi ni der bltam pa legs bltam pa// kyi hud bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyis mngan par mchod pa'i ye shes sdong po che// kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa'im
133b7: pa'i spos can pad ma'i spyan mnga' gser mdog 'dra/ / kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan pa zhob mo lta bu'i tshems ldan pa// kyi hud bdag gi shadra legs smin legs smin mtshams par na dri med mdzod spu gnas
133b8: pa bo/ / kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgor bzlum gzhu 'dra'i sred pa e ne'i byin pa rked pa zlum// kyi hud bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra brla ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i sen mo can// de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams

134a1: ngag gis byas pa rgyal pos ra dga' byed pa/ / kyi hud bdag gi glu dang dbyangs skra dam pa me tog drug pa bzang po dus bzang ba// kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu lan dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dka /
134a2: byed pa// kye hud bsngags ldan lags skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du brid/ kyi dung 'dran pa snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sbron cing slong ma phong / do ma grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi 'alo
134a3: sgyur ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te/ / phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes bskabs der tshig cig tsam zhig ci yi phyir ma smras// phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis phyung ba byas// /
134a4: gang gis phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mod la grogs su gyur pa dpal yon ldan// 'dun pa kho mo shin du sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig byung 'dra bas mig byin cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyis pa dang
134a5: ma dag mchod pa'i 'os shes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na/ / de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos// kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bapral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma
134a6: yin/ byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lte ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur// de yis sngon yang rga shi ldan pa'i dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan// khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su
134a7: rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur/ / rdal med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol// 'dun pa des par
134a8: mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshig ni thos gyur nas/ de ni da ro 'thon cing tshig tu smras pas 'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig leg par gson// nam gyi gung thun bud med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid

134b1: kyis log sta dben gyur pa/ / de'i chen bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan da la byin zhes gsungs// de skad cig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas
134b2: de cha khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tshe bzhengs shes sgra skad chen po phyung / / lha yis tshig de bgag par gyur pas bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur// bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta yi rgyal ba
134b3: brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul/ / bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzi ldan sgra phyung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags// 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis phog par bgyis pas grong khyer ba las 'ga' yang sad
134b4: mgur/ / gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs// de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur// de yi bar
134b5: skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas/ / ma khA las lha rnams bye ba thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal// gnod sbyin srin po chogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten
134b6: skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis/ / pad ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rkang lag bteg/ bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags de yang ku mu da dang par sha lta bu de la bcibs// sa ni
134b7: rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab/ / bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis// de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis
134b8: mchod nas gshegs/ / bsngag ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis de na 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes// lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs

135a1: lha'i bu mo glu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing / / de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs mthung byed cing snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin// bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren
135a2: pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skyo ba mi dga' ma skyed cig/ 'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'gro med par 'gyur// lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibs
135a3: par mngoni du dga' bar 'gyur/ / yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyur cung zad med// bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin chen stegs bu ni//
135a4: rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug pa snying po mchog bdugs 'di la ltos// bsngags ldan dge ba'i las 'dis sum bcu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der lha yi bu mos bskor cing
135a5: mdun gyis bltas la lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis/ / legs pa sa 'tsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dgyes par mdzod cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzad// mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yis mdun
135a6: du bder ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur/ / sa 'tsho mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i las bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags/ de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags legs kyis dgyes par
135a7: mdzod la bshums mo ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mis mchod pa yi bkod pa gang lags pa// bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag gis dgung bdun bar du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus// khyod kyis
135a8: 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab brnyes/ / bdag gis bsams na khyod kyang mi yi dam pa da ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid// mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcwa lnga'o// //

135b1: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gcig pa// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma dang / btsun
135b2: mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyi mya ngan bsad pa'i gtam smras so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas de la gos ngur smrig
135b3: rnams blangs te/ / 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba dang // sems can la snying brtse ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rigs ldan gyi gnas
135b4: ga la ba der song ba dang / / des byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la 'gron du bos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad ma'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par
135b5: bya ba dang / zas la 'gron du bos so// de nas bram ze'i drang srong nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'gron du pos so// de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang
135b6: byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos te/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to// de'i tshe sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /
135b7: slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te// de slob ma dag la ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa'
135b8: rgyad ring po nas 'ongs pa mthong nas ngo mtshar gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig/ de dag gi smras pa/ de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyis te 'di yi mtshan che'o// dge slong dag de nas

136a1: da s+yArtsa la shes kyi bu ring ba pur gal bdeng sang ste/ sbrur rtsal shes kyi bur 'phru la 'di skad ces smras so// gya sU rtsa la shes kyi bu rang 'phrubrur pyod las bdag gis tshangs par snang ba spyod do//
136a2: des smras pa/ kyo mgau ta mA dad pa'i rigs kyi bus gang la spyad na tshogs chung ngus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu la spyod cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ nga la mos pa yang
136a3: yod/ nga la brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/ shes rab kyang yod kyis/ chos nyid thob par bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang/
136a4: dben par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang / dben par gnas nas/ tshegs chu ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal
136a5: shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing / mngon du gyur tam/ des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma de de bzhin no// ngas smras pa/ kye khi bos kyang
136a6: chos de mngon du byas shing khong du chud do/ / des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de khyod kyis shes la gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te/ de bas na bdag cag gnyi gas slob
136a7: ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to/ / dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis ngal mchod pa dam pas mchod de// da slob ma rnams la yang don mthun par byed du bcug go/ dge slong dag ngas 'di
136a8: snyam du bsams te/ / ring 'phur gyis chos 'di ni nges par byung ba ma yin te/ de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par byung ba ma yin gyis// bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig btsal zhing spyad

136b1: de mAm mo/ / dge slong gde nasang ji srid dga' ba'i bar du kyang bya 'das can duganas nas/ yulam bad+hang mul dz+nyAn sus la ga d+ha rgyal bar/ khab kyi grong khyer chen po gal bder song ste/ ri'i rgyal po sa bo ga la ba der song nas/
136b2: ri'i rgyal po skye bo de'i ngos lang gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shing gnas so// de nas nganang par sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung zed
136b3: thogs te/ chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yen du lta ba dang / bskum pa dang brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / sngam star dang / thar pa dang /
136b4: lhung zed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma yengs pa dang / sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol du mabyung ba dang / 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gar tsam de lta zhing bsod snyoms
136b5: kyi phyir zhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam// 'on te rnam thos kyi bu 'am// 'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig
136b6: yin nam snyam mo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste/ sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar// ri yi rgyal po skye bo'i ngos la
136b7: gnas/ / byang chub sems dpa' namanangs shes nas ni/ mchog tu bltan mdzes par sham thabs bgos// lhung bzed thogs te/ dma' ba'i yid kyis su// de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyams zhwas/
136b8: gser gyis le sbra ma bzhin rab dul la// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa// skyes pa'i tshegs dang bud med kyis mthong na// su yang lta bas ngomos par mi 'gyur ro// srang

137a1: dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan/ / gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i// sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes// skye ba sal cing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang // bud med stong dga' ba'i
137a2: steng 'dug cing / / de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skur khung dang // srang dag bkang ste khyim ni stod byas nas// de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog lta// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe// nyo dang 'tsheng bdag
137a3: kyang mi byed cing / / chad dang can yang chad ni mi 'thung la// khyim dang srang na 'dug par mi dga' 'o// rings par mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste// de dga' rgyal po gzugs can snying po la// grong 'dir tshangs
137a4: pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod/ / lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes shes zer// kha cig brgya byin lha yis rgyal zhes zer// gzhan dag 'thab bral lha'i bu zhes zer// de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul pa
137a5: dang / / gzhan dag rab 'phrul lho'i dri zhes zer// kha cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du// sgra gcan stobs ldan thags zangs ris zhes zer// kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du// ri rgyal skye la 'dug pa 'di yin zer// rgyal
137a6: pos tshig ni dedag zos gyur nas/ / yid ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug/ shin du sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo // rgyal po gzugs can snying pos
137a7: ming la/ / bsod snyoms byin la gar song ltos shes bsgo// ri yi mchog la de ni sod mthong nas// kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis smras// gzugs can snying pos namanangs shes nas ni// mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te/
137a8: ri yi rgyal po skye bo'i drung du song // ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong // bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song // ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing // rtsa btang steng na skyil mo kra 'dug pa'i// byang chub sems

137b1: dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong / / rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam byas nas// khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sbyin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan spras/
137b2: byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa// sa yi bdag po yun rings tshe srungs shig/ kho bos rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su// rab med par ni phyir rab tu byung // gzhon nu thor bu dang la bab dang ldan// lus kyi 'dig mangs
137b3: shing shugs ldan na/ / nor mang dag dang bud med tshegs bzhes te// bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// mag d+ha'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa// bdag khyod mthong bas mchog tu dga'// bdag gi
137b4: rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod la mnga' 'bul 'dod pa spyod// nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs shig/ slan chad sa gnas rtswa steng ma bzhugs shig/ khyod kyi sgra ni mchog tu rab tugazhon// bdag gi
137b5: rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/ / byang chub sems dpas 'jam zhing gyi gyu med// dga' 'gyur phan zhing snying brtse'i tshig smras pa// rgyal po khyod ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur// kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do//
137b6: 'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' yas ldan// sems can dmyal ba dang yi dgas dud 'gror lhung // mkhas pas smad cing 'dod pa 'phags ma yin// kho bos dar snabs rul pa bzhin du bor// 'dod pa shing gi 'bras
137b7: bu bzhin du lhung / / ji ltar sprin dang char ba bzhin du 'gro// mi brtan 'gyur la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro// dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing sa// de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir yang gdung // nga du zin kyang tshig par 'dzin
137b8: mi 'gyur/ / gang ma dbang mad ma rung ba gyur pa// de cha 'dod pa drug pas la drug chen skyed// rgyal po lha'i 'dod pa gang yin dang // mi yi 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i// dod pa thams cad me cig gis thob kyang /

138a1: de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo// rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur // 'phags pa zag med chos kyis 'du shes gang // shes rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs chog/ 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med//
138a2: rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing // sngan chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med// ji ltar mi dag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin// 'dod pa bsten nas phyir zhing srid pa 'phel// rgyal po lus la yid ltos de mi brtan// snying po/
138a3: med de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin// bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag/ rgyal po kha ba 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med// kho bos 'dod pa med dang de bzhin du// blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong por ste// mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob
138a4: 'dod nas/ / kho bo srid pa mi dga' nges par 'byung // dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon// gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs// rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze'am rgyal po lags// dge slong khur gyi 'du
138a5: shes med na gsungs/ / rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong // mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos gyur tam// kho bos pha yi ming ni zas gtsang yin// yon tan 'dod pas kho bo dang rab byung // khyod mthong legs par
138a6: mthong ste lags pa lags/ / gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma// 'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa// thugs nas bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol// gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub brnyes gyur tshe/
138a7: chos rjes bdag la chos kyi bgo bsha mdod// rang byung bdag gi yul na bzhugs pa ni// bdag gis mchog tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do// de nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas ste// rgyal pos shin tu gus par skor byas nas// mi dbang
138a8: rang gi skye bos yongs bskor te/ / slar yang rgyal po'i khab du zhugs par gyur// 'jig rten mgon po ma ga d+ha'i grong zhugs te// ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug/ lha dang me rnams kyi ni don byas nas// mi

138b1: dbang ni na 'dza' na'i chu 'gram song / / gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o// // dge slong dag yang de'i tshe rangs byed kyi lhag spyod rgyar po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas
138b2: bcas nas slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de de dag la 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun pa'i chos ston to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'
138b3: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod tshegs dang ldan pa tshogs can/ / tshegs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa/ kun gyis shes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du
138b4: sems te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin no// gal te bdag
138b5: de'i drung du song ste brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni 'di bdag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas zag pa dang
138b6: bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung bar ma gyur gyis/ gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul ngag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs
138b7: padag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya'am/ bdag rangs byed kyi bu lcag spyod kyi drang du song ste/
138b8: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med pang brtan par bya'am snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas

139a1: don de'i dbang du byas te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig/ sus chos bstan pa kun
139a2: shes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu stag spyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de// 'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud ngo // byang
139a3: chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci khong du chud/ smras pa/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gri khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi
139a4: lam gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su snyan pa thob par 'tshal lo/ / smras pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes byas nas gdam ngag byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste/ dkyil mo krung /
139a5: bcas nas 'dug go/ 'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / ye shes kyi khyad par dang / sngon spyad pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang // ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris
139a6: pa'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa'i 'jig rten de snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong thams cad rnam pa dang bcas// bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to// de nas byang /
139a7: chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin du bstan las langs te/ ra me kyi khra lhag spyod gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po 'dra shes meng 'du shes
139a8: med min skye mched kyi lam las gong na gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/ / des smras pa/ med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// lhag spyod 'ba' shig la dad pa yod pa dang / brtson 'bras

139b1: dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la yang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod do snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu
139b2: lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smra so/ / grogs po khyed gang du nges par byung ba'i chos de kho bos kyang khong du chud // des smras pa/ de bas na 'dod khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag rjes su bslab pa zhes byang chub sems dpa'
139b3: don mthun pa dang / slob dben gyi gnas su bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po lam 'di ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin// 'gog par
139b4: 'gyur ba ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin// rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin// dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin/
139b5: no// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas// de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o// de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag
139b6: spyod las tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ / bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por brtsal cing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud bar ma nus kyi dge sbyong gau ta mas tshegs chung ngus
139b7: khong du chud cing mngon du byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing de las gong du tshol ba las the tsom med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro/ / gang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la yang bgeng bar 'gyur ro// mo/
139b8: de ltar de pyad nas lnga ste bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab du

140a1: gnas nas rdza sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+ha yul rgyu zhing sangs / yang de'i tshe rgyal pa khab dang / rig ya'i b.ran tshogs gzhan dag cig dus ston byed de/ tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub
140a2: sems dpa' lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya bar bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' yul ma ga nang yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+ha'i rig ya gal bdang
140a3: song ste/ der phyin par gyur to// rig ya'i rtse mo der byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir gnas te/ de der gnas pa'i tshe/ sngon ma thos pa dang / sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na / dge
140a4: sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par mi gnas 'dod pa dag las sems dben par mi gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod pa la skom pa dang //
140a5: 'dod pa la yong su ga ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin la/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi zad pa tsha ba myong ste/ 'on kyang de dag
140a6: mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so// 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig me 'dod la shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan dang / shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing thogs
140a7: la chur bcug ste btsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so/ / de bzhin du dge sbyong dang / bram ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa dag las sems dben par mi gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa sred
140a8: pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la skom pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la brgyal ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing / lus

140b1: la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi zad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so/ /
140b2: snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe' mngon du gyur pa dang po'o// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang / de dag
140b3: gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas me tshel ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan thogs la thang la bzhag ste/ shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing gis gtsubs na des
140b4: me phyin par mi nus so/ / de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba na sa thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du
140b5: bye bar mi nus so snyam te/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing / de dag gi
140b6: 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad de bzhin du sbyar te de dag gi de ni nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi zad pa myong
140b7: mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mngon du mthong ba'i khyad par mngon bya bar nus so// 'di lta ste dper ni skyes bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang / 'od tshol bar
140b8: gyur la/ des shing skam po'i gtsub stan dang / gtsub shed thogs shing thang la bzhag ste gtsubs nas/ des me dbyung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor

141a1: bamyo shes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ 'on kyang de mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i byed par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i da
141a2: gsum pa'o/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' nga 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes
141a3: bya ba das thams cad sngam bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de yang nye bar zhi ba yon la bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byas shing lus la gdung par byed pas sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas tshor ba myo she ba'i du snga ma bzhin du myur // 'on kyang ba ga
141a4: mi'i chos tha pa las pa rog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya ba nus so snyam mo/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar drug yang ri ga ya mo yiganas// gang gis
141a5: yul chu zhing sde dpon gyi grong lteng rgyas gal ba der song ste phyin pa dang / den krung ner na dzan chu gsal ba 'ab bstegs bde ba// shing drang shing gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/
141a6: del byang chub sems dpa' yid shin du dga' ba gyur nas 'dis ma dusams te/ e ma'os phyogs 'di ni mnyam zhing rnams dga' ba rlung du yang dag 'jog dang thun
141a7: paso/ / rigs kyi bstong bdon dugaci bal ni 'dis chog go// bdag kyang spong bden duganyer bayin gyis bdag 'di cid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni
141a8: 'jam bu'i gling 'dir stegs ma sde'i dus la babacing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang / su sngags can gyi rdzas gang pa dang / ba d+ma tshogs 'thugs pa dang / lus la ril por 'dzin pa bzhin pa'i tshangs/

141b1: thun po dag gdungs pas yangs su gdung ba rnam pa sna chags kyis dag pa tshal zhing ston pa 'di lta ste/ sngags spyod pa dang / lagapal ldag pa dang / ma sros dang / ma smra ba dang / rtsab du ma zab dang / gang nyam tha ba dang / byu
141b2: mau lung ba dang ma dang / rub pa dang / tshu yongs su spangs pa dang / khyim gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang bdun nas zas len pa dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / nya lcibs dang / rtswa ku sha dang / lo ma dang / ba lang gi lI ba dang / ba'i/
141b3: bcan dang / 'o thug dang / zho dang / mar dang / bu ram dang / ma brtags pa za zhing 'thung ba dang / byangang ba dang / phug ron gyis zos te bor ba bkrus te za ba dang / grong dang dgon pas 'tsho ba dang / ba lang gi brtul
141b4: zhugs dang / ri dgas dang / khyi dang / phag dang / spre'u dang / glang po che'i brtul zhugs dang / 'greng ba dang / mi smra ba dang / dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang / kham gcig za ba dang / kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang / zas lan gcig za
141b5: ba dang / nyin zhag gcig dang / bzhi dang lnga dang drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig zad par byed pa dang / zla ba la lta ba dang / bya rgod dang / 'ug pa'i gshog pa thogs pa dang / shing leb dang / rtsa mun dza dang / zer
141b6: ma'i shun pa dang / rtswa dang b+ha dang / gre sa ma dang / rngabal gyi la ba dang / rabal gyi la ba dang / sgra'i lab dang / ko lpags gyon pa dang / gos gsher ba dang / stegs bu'i steng dang / chu'i nang na nyal ba dang / thal pa dang / rdo dang / gyo mongs
141b7: shing leb dang / tshor ma dang / rtswa dang gtun shing gi steng du nyal ba dang / mgo thur du bstan pa dang / cog tsog por 'dug pa dang / thang la nyal ba dang / gos gcig dang / gos gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang /
141b8: lnga dang / drug dang / bdun dang / gos mang po sel ba dang / gcer bur 'dug pa dang / 'khru ba dang / mi 'khru ba'i cho ga can dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / a gtso ma ring por 'jog pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang / rgya shug

142a1: dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru gcig za ba dang / thal ba dang / snag tsa dang / me tog spyad spyad pa dang / rdul 'thul ba dang / rdul nag po dang / phyag dar dang / rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang / ba spu dang / mi'i thod pa dang / skra dang / san
142a2: mo dang / tshal bu'i smad g.yogs dang / rdzab dang / ker rus thogs pa dang / chu dron po dang / 'bras kyi khu ba dang / la bar brtsegs pa dang / khrud ma 'thung ba dang / mdab ma dang / tshon rtsi dang / tshon ngur smrig dang / khar pa gsum dang / marko
142a3: 'breg pa dang / ril pa dang / mi'i thod pa dang / khri'i zur shing 'chang bas blun po rnams dag par khong du chung ngo // du brngub pa dang / me rngub pa dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / gdung ba lnga byed pa dang / rkang pa gcig dang / lag pa gcig bstod pa dang /
142a4: rkang pa gcig btsugs pa dang / gnas gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub la sogs pa dang / phub ma la sogs pa dang / mdab ma bsregs pa dang / bum pa bsregs pa dang / rdo bsregs pa dang / me 'bar bar 'jug pa dang / zas mi za ba dang / mya
142a5: dam dang / 'bab stegs su song ste shibs sdug pa'i 'gro ba tshol lo// rab bsngags shes bya ba dang / gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhi srung zhes bya ba dang / gzhi tshugs zhes bya ba dang / smon lam dang / bstod pa dang / sbyin sreg dang
142a6: dbab ba dang / sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang / klag pa 'dzin cing byed pas dag par khong du chung ngo // bdag dag par ngems shing de dag la rten te/ 'di lta ste tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / gu lang dang / khyab 'jug dang / lha mo dang / gzhan
142a7: nu dang / ma mo dang / kA tA ya'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / chu lha dang / nor can gyi bu dang / tha skar gyi bu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
142a8: 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / 'khar dang / tshogs dang / mtshan dang / shaza dang / lha'i drang srong dang / rgyal po'i drang srong dang / tshangs pa'i drang srong dag la phyag 'tshal

142b1: zhing de dag la snying por 'du shes so/ / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' la yang rten// ri dang / ri sul dang / klung dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mche'u dang / rdzing dang / rgya mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / dron pa dang rdi yudag shing ga ging ge la
142b2: ba dang / 'khri shing dang / rtswa dang / sdong dum dang / lhas dang / dung khrod dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / srang dag la yang rten to// khang ba dang / ka ba dang / rdo dang / thob dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / dgra sgra dang // mnga' dang / mdud thung dang /
142b3: rtse gsub pa dag la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// zho dang / mar dang / yungs dkar dang / nas dang / shing bal gyi phreng ba dang / rtsa drung ba dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa la bkra shis par 'dzin te/ gzhan su stegs can
142b4: dag 'khor bas 'jigs skra gnas rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing sten to/ / 'di na / cig bdag cag gi mtho ris dang thar pa yang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub bo snyam du sems te/ de ltar log pa'i lam du song bas skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing
142b5: bkra shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du shes la/ dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis bdag gis ci nas kyang bas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyi las dang bya ba chung mi
142b6: za ba bstan par bya ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul ba rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pas 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo// dge slong dag
142b7: de ltar byang chub sems dpas de snyam byamams nas lo drug du 'ardul zhugs dang / dka' thub shin du drag po shin du spyad par dka' ba/ shin tu bya bar dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par brtsams so//
142b8: ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/ de bas na dka' bar spyad pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi

143a1: ris na mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do/ / ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhes na/ de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbugs byi nang du rgyu ba
143a2: nye bar 'gog kun tu 'gog ste/ bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ g.yo ba med/ sems pa med/ 'gyur ba med cing thams cad du rjes su song ba// thams cad la mi rten pa ste// bsam gtan de la sngon
143a3: slob pa 'am/ mi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so// mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ khyab par mi byed pa med pa/ rnam par mi mthong ba
143a4: ste/ des thams cad khyab par byed pas na// bsam gtan de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par
143a5: bya ba dang / mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhil ba dang / phas kyis rgol ba rnams tshar gcad pa dang / lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang / sems can chad pa dang / rtag par smra ba/ las dang byang chung zos pa rnams las dang byab la/
143a6: gzung ba dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang / lus kyi stobs dang mthu yang dag par bstan pa dang / sems kyi dpa' ba yang
143a7: dag par bskyed par byer/ / byedangam byas pa'i sathamal pas skyel mo grang ba cas te 'dug go// 'dug nas dang gsum sems kyis tshar bad ci gar to// ge slod gden sa dgran ci brgyad pa'i rnab ma ltang sum tsha
143a8: gzing bas/ mtshan 'ang nas kyang rdul byung ste zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung ste zags rnams la byung ste zil par chags nas drin rlangs pa byung ngo // 'di lta snyed par na skyes bya stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin dutum chung bzhin/

143b1: 'grin pa nas bzung ste bcing ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir na// mtshan lung nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags nas sa la ltung ste/ zal bar chags nas dro
143b2: zhing rlangs pa byung ngo / / dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas
143b3: pa dang / / khwa dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur to// rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po chen po byung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ srung ba bus pa'i tshe sgra drag po dang / sgra chen po byung ba de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang stan/
143b4: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang / rna ba'i bug gnyis nas sgra drag po dang / sgra chen po byung po// dge slong // de nasangs 'di snyam du bsams te yang bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan bya'o snyam pa dang /
143b5: denas nga'i kha dang sna dang rna ba 'gags par gyur to// de dag 'a gags pa dang / rlung gong du mgo 'thod pa la gnod par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste// dper na skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul pos mgo'i thong pa la btang ba de bzhin
143b6: du dge slong dag kha dang sna dang rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gag pa dang / gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to// der lha'i bu gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o kyi hud gzhon nu
143b7: don grub pa 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ / gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di/
143b8: dag smras so// mi'i dbang po shAkya'i sras po 'di// brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad cing // 'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par// mdzad nas dgon 'dir grongs par mi 'gyur grang kyi hud sems can snying po

144a1: thugs dam brtan/ / mgon pos sngan chad bdag cag dga' ldan du// dam chos mchod sbyin la ni mgron du pos// sems can dag khyod dam bcas de ga re// de nas lha de sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste lha mo sU
144a2: 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod do/ / de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ nam phyed tsam na klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang /
144a3: des byang chub sems dpa' lus skams shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo // mthong nas mchi mas bsnangs shing dus nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// lum bi ni zhes bya ba'i tshal dung bu bcas pa'i
144a4: tshe/ seng ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song // phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes// khyod kyis tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yod ma rdzogs// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes drang srong nag
144a5: pos bstan pa yi/ / de yi lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi rtag des ma mthong // bus ni yid dga' 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la// byang chub kyang ni rjes su mthob tshal du shi bar gyur// bu phyar sul bsgrub phyir sdug
144a6: bsngal su'i gan du mdud/ bdag gi bug cig cung zad gson pa'i srog ni su yis sbyin// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ shin du snying rje bar ni du byed cing // skra yang bshig la mdzes pa rnams bor ba// shin du bu yi smre sngags 'don
144a7: byed la/ / sa steng 'dug cing 'greng ba 'di su zhig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa/ bdag gi zla ba bcu bar du/ rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs// bu des ni bdag yin te// rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smra// de nas byang chub sems dpa
144a8: ma'i dbugs 'byin cing smras pa/ bul byams pa khyod kyi dal ba 'bras bu yod par byas ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba ni don yod pa ste// drang srong nag pos bstan pa yang mngon du bsal bar bya'o// mang /

144b1: me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o// sa ni rnam brgyar 'thar bar 'gyur yang srid// rin chen rtse mo lhun po chur 'phyo srid/ nyi zla skar tshogs sa la ltung 'gyur srid/ so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi mchi// de phyir 'di la
144b2: mya ngan khyod ma byed/ / ring por mi thogs byang chub sangs rgyas mthong // lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi de mthag tur bdu dga' ste/ ba spugayos nas byang chub sems dpa' la me tog mnad rab pa gtor te// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i
144b3: sil snyan dkrol zhing / rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo // dge slong dag das 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag 'a cig zas chung dungus dag par sems par yod kyis// ngas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo//
144b4: dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te// zas su rgya shug 'bru cig pu kho na sde gnyis su med pa zos so// dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i rgya shug che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste de'i tshe'i rgya shug kyang 'di
144b5: nyid tsam mo/ / dge slong dag ngas zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig pu khon ste gnyis su med pa zos pas lus shin du nyam chung zhing ring par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang / ka li ka'i tshigs
144b6: pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang / nyid lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na srog chags ka ra ka ta ka'i rtsib logs ni 'dra bar da'i rtsib logs kyang de 'dra bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na bzhon pa'i bres khang dam
144b7: glang po'i bris khang rnying pa ngos gnyis zhigs pa ni gdung rten gyi bar snang zhing mngon no/ / de bzhin du nga'i rtsib logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi nang sdang zhing mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na lan bur blas pa na mthon dman dang
144b8: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gyur to/ / de bzhin du nga'i skal tshags kyang mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gyur// 'di lta ste dper na sru ba kho bo gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnyis pa dang / kun du rnyis pa dang rdzum zlum por 'gyur ro//

145a1: de bzhin du de'i mgo yang rnyis pa dang kun du rnyis pa dang rdzum rtsum por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na sos ka'i zla ba tha mal khron pa'i skar ma dma' bar song ste tshegs chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras
145a2: bu yang khung du song ste tshegs chen pos snang bar gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na ra'i rkang pa 'am rnga mo'i rkang pa ci 'dra bar nga'i mtshan khung dang / lto dang brang la sogs pa yang de 'dra bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga gang gi tshe lag pas lto la
145a3: byug go snyam na skal tshigs nyid la reg go/ ldeng ngo snyam nas langs na yang de bzhin du sgur bor gyur te 'gyel to// sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yogs pa lag pas phyis pa dang / ba spu rul pa thams cad lus las lhags so// /
145a4: gang sngon pa kha dag mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub bor btang bas med par gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang de la 'di ltar/ e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni
145a5: gnag go/ / e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so// a ma'o dge sbyong go ta ma ni nyam dgu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so// dge slong dag ngas 'di
145a6: snyam du bsams te bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/ / dge slong dag ras mngon par shes te/ da zas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis med pa zos so// dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du de'i tshe 'bras che ba snyam
145a7: du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/ de'i tshe 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag zas su 'bras 'bru gcig zos pas lus myur du snga ma bzhin gyur te/ e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta mnyam dgu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon
145a8: 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu nyid la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes

145b1: te/ ngas zas su til 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med pa zos pa nas/ de'i kha dog 'jam po med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha gcig zas me zabs dag pa
145b2: sems te/ bdag gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas dge slong dag de nas zas mi za bar 'dug go// dge slong dag ngas ma zos pas lus shin tu skams shing nyam chung ba dang ring bar gyur to// 'di
145b3: lta ste dper nal+h+wam bu sa si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang ki la ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyis kyur dang / ma gyur dang / bzhi gyur dang / lnga gyur dang / bcu gyur gyis nga'i yan lag dang / nyid lag skem par gyur te/ 'di lta sto rtsib logs ni srog chags
145b4: kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs dang / bzhon pa'i bres khang lta bur gyur te// skal tshigs ni lan bu blas pa lta bur gyur to// mgo'i thod pa ni skub kha bo lta bur gyur to// mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to// dge slong dag
145b5: legs par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskyod na/ sgur bor gyur te 'gyel to// sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa/ lag pas byis pa dang / ba s+phu rul pa thams cad lus las lhags so// gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing
145b6: 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur to/ / de'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyan kor ba rnams kyang / 'di ltar e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gnag go// e ma'o dge
145b7: sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so/ / e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nyam dgu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang nyin re zhing
145b8: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du pho nya gtod do/ / dge slong dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzung ba dang / bsod nams

146a1: kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang / ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir til 'bru gcig dang / rgya shug 'bru gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig gis lo drug gi bar
146a2: dka' ba spyod pa bstan te yid dman pa med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas/ ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du gnas te spyod la mnyams pa med do// nyims bab nas kyang grib ma la masong ngo // grib ma las
146a3: kyang nyi ma lam song / / rlung dang nyi ma dang char ba'i skyabs ma btsal to// sha s+tha dang / sbrang bu dang / sdig sbrul ma bslang ngo // bshad pa dang / gci pa dang / mchil ma dang / snabs mabor ro// bskum pa dang / sbyang ba ma byas so// glos papa
