146a4: pa 'am/ khas bu ba'am/ gan rgyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so// sprin chen po dang / yul ngan chen po dang / char ba dang / ser ba dang / ston dang / dpyid dang / dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma
146a5: phog go/ / zan byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma bskyabs so// dbang po yang ma bkag go/ dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs so// gang dag der 'ong bgrong gi gzhon nu'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/
146a6: rtsa thun nam/ shing thun nam/ lci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rdul khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtsen te/ de las skud do// der byang chub sems dpa' lo drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang / gong pa dang ring bar/
146a7: par gyur te/ de'i rna ba gnyis su rtsa 'am shing bal bcug nas sna'i bug gnyis su khyin to// sna'i bug gnyis su bcug nas rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to// rna ba'i bug gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to// khar bcug nas rna ba dang /
146a8: sna'i bu gar 'byin to// snar bcug nas rna ba dang sna dang khar 'byin to// lba dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / de za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan

146b1: mngon sum du gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shi byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do/ / sman lam yang 'debs sa/ de nas
146b2: byang chub sems dpa' lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pastan cing lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dag theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// byang chub ma dal khyim thang ba// yan
146b3: tan dag dang ldan pade/ / sems can dan dang ben pa'i phyir// thabs dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes// stegs ma lnga'i dus kyi che// chos dpa' mas pa'i 'jig rten pa// las dang bya bar 'jig rten du// 'dzam pa sring 'ang
146b4: rgyas par gyur/ / mu stegs tshogs kyis rab tu gang // ltar mo dang ni ltas su lta// lus la gnod pa bya ba byed// byis pa de dag dag par sems// g.yangs me dang mya ngam 'jug/ sgren mo sa dang lci bas srung// lus
146b5: ni yongs su gdung pa'i phyir/ / gdud pa lnga la brtson dang ldan// lag pa bskyed ste rgyu ba dang // mi mkhas kha cig lag pa ldag/ bum pa khar gzhod las mi len// sgo dang ka pas tshod mi len// gang na khyi yod pa nas men// 'dug
146b6: tsa'amatshur shog ces las min/ / khyim nas kha zam cig len pas// bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems// mar dang 'bru mar bur ma'o// nya dang sha dang 'o ma spong // ldam ldum sred pad ma'i rtsa// gzigs dang ba la lci ba za// rtsa ba
146b7: 'bras bu lo ma tha/ / ku sha tshal dul ba lpags// srel byed kha gcig sgren mor rtswa// glen pa 'di bden gzhan brdzun snyam// lag pa sgreng bar byed pa dang // skra bsgred ral pa bsgreng ba dag/ lam las rab tu rnam par nyams// lam/
146b8: min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod// rtswa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal// cher mar nyal zhing cog pur 'dug/ kha cig rkang pa gcig pus 'greng // gdong bstod nyi da zla ba lta// chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka dang // rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang // shing/

147a1: dang ri'i rtse mo dang // rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal// glen pa de dag gnod ma shes// rus ni yongs su skams par byed// lag par lta dang ldan pa dag/ mung dungan song rnams su ltung // ngan kang thab btu ma zhugs dang //
147a2: ga su gang shig tu dang mis// spyad par rnam pa ma yin / spyad / bcwam samasams// bsam gtan gang sheg dang rgyal gyis/ ba nus pa mayin pa// rdo rje lta bang btan gnas pa// kha' bya sa mas
147a3: gas la seM na pa yis/ ga pa'i ma na med/ dag pangs su smin gyu'i bye/ na la gas dag pa brtsams// saskye yang ma gta bar// dz+hal mo na /
147a4: til dang 'bras bu gcig/ za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston// dbugs dbyung brngub pa rnam par spangs// stobs dang ldan pa g.yo ba med// lo drug par tu bsam gtan mchog/ nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed// tog dang rnam par rtog
147a5: med pa/ / g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med// nam mkha'i khams su khyab pa yi// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de ni nyin las grib mar ram// grib las nyi ma song ma byas// lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i// mkha' khyab
147a6: bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ / rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang // sdig sprul sbrang bu skyob mi byed// rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi phyir// mkha' khyab bsam//
147a7: gtan byed pa min// gzhan du snying rje sems kyis ni// 'jig rten don mang ched du bsgom// grong gi byis pa b.lang rje// she thun dag dang rtswa thun dag/ de la rdul khrod 'dre snyam sems// de las yis skad byed cing // mi gtsang ba yang mthor//
147a8: bar byed// de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang // g.yo ba med cing 'khrugs med par// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mtho ba med cing dma' ba med// lus ma bsrung bar chos ma reg/ bshad pa mi byed gci mi byed// sgra yis mi

147b1: 'jigs gzhan mi lta/ / sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur te/ lpags partsa rgyus pa rus pa lus// / skal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang // lan bu blas pa ci bzhin no// gang dag lhag par byas lha dang // lha min gnod sbyin dri za klu// yon tan ldan pa mngon/
147b2: sum pas// nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed// ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces// smon lam dag kyang 'debs par byed// snying rje'i blo yis 'jig rten gyi
147b3: don mang phyir byed ma gtogs par/ / bdag phyir ma yin bde blos min// bsam gtan ron myang phyir min// zas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom// mu stegs blo nyams zil gyis mnan// mgo reg byang chub ga la yod// byang chub bskal mang rnyed dkang
147b4: zhes/ / 'od srung la ni tshig smras pa'i// las dang bya ba rab tu bstan// skye bo dag ni dga' bya'i phyir// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// lha mi khrag khrig bcu gnyis tshang // theg pa gsum la rab tu btul// de yi ched du blo gros bzang //
147b5: mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// / dge slong dag bdud sdig can yang byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe phyi bzhin
147b6: 'brang ste/ / glags bkas skabs btsal kyang nam yang grags cung zad kyang marnyed do// degrags ma rnyed nas yi chad de yid la bcags bzhin du mang ngo do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang / la~M ges pa sgra med dpa//
147b7: lteng rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na// chu klung ne ran dzan dang // spong ba'i phyir ni brtson pa byas// rtag tu mthu rtsal brtan pa po// grub dang bde bzo bya'i phyir// brtson pas rab tu brtul de la// bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig/ sgru bar byed
147b8: cing 'ongs par gyud/ / kye srog gcas kyis 'tsho bar gyis// gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur// gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa// de dag byas na mya ngan med// khyod ni mdog nyams dman par gyur// khyod ni shel bag ci 'drug chen stod//

148a1: 6/ snyed tsam// cha gcig tsam cig gson par zad// sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin// me yi sbyin sreg sbyin pasreg byos// 'on kyang bsod nams chen por 'gyur// spong ba yis na ci zhig bya// spong ba'i lam ni sag bsngal te//
148a2: sems dul ba ni bya dka' zhes// de tshe bdud kyis de skad tshig/ byang chub sems dpa' de la sbas// de skad smra ba'i bdud de la// byang chub sems dpas 'di skad smras// sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag pa// khyod ni rang ga don byer/
148a3: 'ongs// ngal bsod nams chung zad kyang // don du gnyer ba med do bdud// gang dag bsod nams don du gnyer// de la 'di skad smra ba'i rigs// 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas// mi 'chi snyam dud mi sems tshangs par spyod la
148a4: gzhol gyur bas/ / phyir ldog par ni mi bya'o// chu klung dag gi chu chun kyang // rlung gis rnam par sgoms byed na// spangs pa nyid kyi khrag tsam lta// 'di yis ci phyir skams mi 'gyur// khrag ni skams par byung pa dang / de yis /
148a5: tu sha skams 'gyur// shi ni zad par gyur pa dang // phyir zhing sems ni dang bar 'gyur// phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang // ting nge 'dzin kyar gnas par 'gyur// nga ni de sbyar gnas pas na// tshor ba dam pa tha gyur kya //
148a6: lus dang srog la me lta ste// spyan zla ba dag par gyu la snyam// sa 'dun pa padu zla phyir// bcan 'grus dang ni gas dpe me// dmi brtson 'grul rgyad rnas pa// 'dig rkyen na mam yang // mgacan shib ches pa ste/
148a7: ba ngan pa de sa min// g.yul ra shi ba lags pa ste// pa ma nas gas na pa de snya man// skar sa dbung las mirgyal // dang 'a bod dpang las rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal yang da ni rnaMm sems med/ du byad las ni mAr rgyal gyi/
148a8: parjod kyi dang pa'i dpung // mi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin// khyod kyi gsum pa bkres dang gam// sred pa dpung chags bzhi pa yin// rmugs dang gnyid ni lnga ba ste// 'jigs pa drug par brjod pa yin// khyod kyi the tsom bdun pa/

148b1: ste/ khro dang 'chab pa brjod pa yin// 'thob dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang // log par grags pa gang thob dang // bdag la blto bar byed pa dang // gzhan la sdod par byed pa dang // de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu// snyung ba'i bdud kye bang
148b2: yin no/ / dge sbyong bram ze kha gcig ni// 'di na klags lta 'khod par snang // khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyis// 'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba// so btang ma byas snod chus bzhin// shes rab kyis ni de dag gzhig/ dran pa legs
148b3: par nyer bzhag ste/ / shes rab legs par bsgom byas nas// shes bzhin du ni spyod par bya// blo ngan khyod kyis ci byar yod// de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste// yid ma rangs nas yeng la
148b4: bcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / / 'phags pa rgya che rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gnyis pa// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong dang
148b5: bram ze gang dag kha cig 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byang ba'i dus na bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang lus la gdung ba byed de// sdug bsngal drag po che ba mi zad pa// yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba myong bar byed pas de dag shin du
148b6: sdug bsngal ba myong ngo snyam mo/ / dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te spyod pa 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis me'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du ma byas te/ 'di ni byang chub
148b7: kyil ma ma yin/ lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/ byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa/ gzhan zhig yod/
148b8: ngo snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ngas pa'i bskyed mos tshal du shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang

149a1: bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug
149a2: sngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin snyam nas/ de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/ de'i rnam par shes pa rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// ngas 'di snyam du bsams te// 'di ltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs
149a3: par byang chub par phyi nus so/ / gal te nga 'di ltar lus ngan cing nyam chung bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi snying por song na ni ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la steng brtse ba byas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di yang byad
149a4: chub kyi lam ma yin gyis/ / ngas kha zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de// de nas gdong byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o snyam mo// dge slong dag dan lha'i bu gang dag ngan pa la mos pa de dag gis nga'i sems kyi yongs su
149a5: rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te nga la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig/ bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du
149a6: bsams te/ bdag ni zas mi bza' bar bdag nyid kyis dam bcas la// bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyan skor ba rnams kyis kyang / 'di ltar dge sbyong gau tam ni zas mi za ba yin par shes te/ ngan pa la mos pa'i
149a7: lha'i bu 'di dag gis nga'i bas spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/ / nga shin du brdzun smras par gyur to snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpas brdzun smra ba spang ba'i phyir lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags
149a8: pa bza' bar sems btud do/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug gi bar du brtul zhugs dang dga' thub nyams su blangs nas/ stan de las langs te/ kha zas rags pa 'di lta ste bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / mon sran

149b1: sde'u ya khu bcung dang / ha ra nu kha'i khu bcud dang / zan dang / 'bras can dang / 'dren mar bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do// dge slong dag de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta mA sa lam 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis//
149b2: mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du byed ma nus na kha zas rags pa 'di zos te/ bsod skams la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te mi gsal ba byis pa yin
149b3: no snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnanas song ste/ / grong khyer bar na ser song nas drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su gnas so// de na byang chub sems dpa' thog pa nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na grong ba'i bu
149b4: mo gzhon nu bcus blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so/ / lnga sde bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gro byas shing rgya shug 'bru gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / til 'bru gcig dbul ba yang phul lo// grong ba'i bu
149b5: mo bcu ni bu mo stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / stobs sred ma dang / shin du sdug dang / sde las rnam par rgyal dang / a ti mug ta ka'i phreng ba can dang / mdzes ma dang / rdza byed ma dang sgra ljang lo rgyas dang / ral bu can dang /
149b6: legs skyes ma zhes bya ba ste/ gzhon nu ma de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshad ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad
149b7: pas mdog dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang ldan par gyur to// de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la dge sbyong mdzes pa/ dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to// dge slong dag de na byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba spyad pa
149b8: spyod pa na byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba dang / lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin gcig bzhin du/ bram ze brgyad brgya zan byin zhing 'di skad du bdag

150a1: gis zas zos pas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam yang btab po/ / dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas// dge slong
150a2: dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ gal te bdag gis mdoms yog 'ga' zhig rten na re stes snyam mo// dge slong dag de'i tshe grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas de sha na'i ras kyis dkris te
150a3: dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de ngas mthong nas/ ras phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ dgus nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang pa dang / de nas sa bla'i lhas par snang gi lha
150a4: rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid por te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar to// grogs po dag 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o//
150a5: bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa la'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab
150a6: bral ba la'o/ / 'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la'o// dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o// 'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar
150a7: du'o/ / skad cig de dang / thang cig de dang / yud tsam de la grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di ni rmad du
150a8: byang ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang / brjod pa gcig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/ gal te chu zhig rnyed na re

150b1: stes snyam mo/ / de nas de nyid du lhas lag pa sa la bdabs pa dang / der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur// deng sad du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis/
150b2: chu ni rnyed na/ gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bdag nyid rdo leb cig rnyed na re stes snyam pa dang / skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis deng rdo leb bzhag nas// de la byang chub sems dpas phyag dar khrod pa de bkrus so// de nas lha'i rgyal//
150b3: po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang kho bos bkru'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la ma byin/
150b4: par bdag nyid kyis bkreso// de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang / bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing bu gad pa mthon po zhig sprul to// rdzing de'i 'gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod do//
150b5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang / lha me la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing de'i lha mo la smras pa// lha mo shing gi yal ga smod cig/ des kyang shing yal ga smad nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dzus te byung ngo // byung /
150b6: nas kyang shing sgrub byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa tshes gos snam sbar bcas su drabs te/ deng sad du'ang de phyag dang khrod pa drubs pa zhes ming du drag go/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des/ lha'i
150b7: gos ngur smrig gi tshen du bcos pa rung ba/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du
150b8: phyogs pa dang / de na lha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyis sde dpon gyi grong na dga' byed ces bya ba'i gro mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs

151a1: de nyams 'og tu chud nas de kha zas rags pa bzang po bza' bar sems kyis/ sngon khyod kyis bdag gi zas zos nas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
151a2: par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyi bya ba de gyis shig/ dge slong dag de nas grong mi dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas myur ba myur ba rab stong gi 'o ma lan/
151a3: bdun du snying kur byas pa bzang po mchog tu gyur pa snying po can blangs te/ blangs nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras sa ra pa sar pa dag dang / phrub sar par blugs nas thab sar par btsugs te/ kha zas de sgrub bo// de sgrub pa na
151a4: snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / pad ma dang / sdod ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo // de nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ltos 'di/
151a5: lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/ byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur du the tsom med do// snyam pa dang / rgya mtsho ba shes shing chog shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der phyin par gyur nas// des kyang
151a6: bdud rtsi thob pa nyid du lung bstan to/ / de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de chos pa dang thar la bzhag ste/ me tog gis gtor spos chus gtor nas gus par stan bting ste/ bran mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ gong ma so
151a7: la bram ze bos shig/ ngas ni 'i thug sbrad rtsi can 'di lta'o// jo mo legs so zhes de'i ltar mnyan nas// shar phyogs logs su song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du lho phyogs legs su song na
151a8: yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo / / de bzhin du nub dang byang phyogs logs su song na yang de dang deng des byang mu sems dpa' mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi gzhan mu stegs can kra

151b1: cad tshar bcad par gyur pas 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo / / de nas de slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so// gang dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong mdzes pa ganga' ba las/ dge sbyong dam bram ze gzhan ni
151b2: 'ga' yang mi gda'o/ / legs skyes mas smras pa/ de nyid bram ze yin te/ de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/ gong ma song la de nyid pos shig/ jo mo legs so zhes smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyi
151b3: la gtugs te legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song ste stan bting ba la 'dug go// dge slong dag de nas de dag
151b4: grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi can gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/ legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu
151b5: 'di byin pa 'di bdag gis der zos te/ the tshom med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de blangs nas grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma la 'di skad sa
151b6: smras so/ / che zhe gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/ des smras pa/ khyod snoms shig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo la ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so// legs skyes mas smras pa/ ci dgyes su mdzod cig/ bdag ni
151b7: snod ma mchis par su la yang zas mi stsol to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de thogs te/ lteng rgyas nas byur nas drol bab pa dang / klu'i klung chu bo ne ran dza na'i dogs su song ste/ zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs
151b8: gcig tu bzhag nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir klung ner NA na'i nang du bzhugs so/ / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i tshe// lha'i bu rgya stong du ma dag/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'

152a1: la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dag klung du ldugs shing lha'i me tog kha dog sna tshogs dag kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro// de'i tshe klung chen po ni rat+na nA lA'i spos rnams dang / me tog
152a2: rnams kyis gang bar gyur de 'bab po/ / byang chub sems dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi gnas su khyer ro//
152a3: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / ag chom gang yin pa de dag kyang grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa' klung nas byung
152a4: nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la lta'o/ / de nas klung ne ran mdza' na'i klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/ yid las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/ grong
152a5: ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ ji tsam dgos par 'o thug sbrang rtsi can de mthungs so// 'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro// bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos
152a6: mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / / de nas mig stong pa grong khyer 'jig pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur bsgyur te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las
152a7: gser gyi snong chen pa ded thog tu ban la na ma nus nas rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te/ nga sa nas mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sam bcu ni gsum kyi gnas sa khyer pa// byi nas kyang snod can po
152a8: dge 'dun gyi dra rte byas te/ deng sang du'ang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du snod chen po'i dris ston byed do// seng ge'i khrid yang klu'i med nyid kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer

152b1: dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa zos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i
152b2: mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba yang byung bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo drug bar du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chud byas bcom ldan blo gros 'di snyam sems/
152b3: gal te bdag ni 'di ltar ring bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa/ shing gi rgyal po drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni// de dag na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtse ma byas
152b4: 'gyur/ / bsod nams ngan don tsam dang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag ngan pas ye shes tshol// de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas// kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed
152b5: pa byas nas ni/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsams// grong ba'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de// 'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de ltar
152b6: yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed/ / de ni lha yis bskul ba thos nas de che'o thug sbrar rtsi can blangs te// klung gi 'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis nai raN+Da nA'i dog na 'dug/ bskal pa stong du sbyong pa spyad cing dbang po ni la
152b7: rab tu zhi ba de/ / lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang srong dag gis bskor te nai raNA nAr 'ong // pha rol brgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar bsams nas ni// thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten snying brtse phyir ni krung
152b8: zhugs te 'khru/ / bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag/ klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru pa'i don du nub gang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' dri med nges pa bkrus te do gas na 'dug

153a1: bar shes gyur nas/ / lha stong rab tu dka' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer// dung smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha yi bu yis de la byin// rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas
153a2: bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung dogs na 'dug/ klu yi bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng ge'i khri yang bshams// de la 'jig rten dag gi mig byed yid kyang rab tu zhi ba de 'dug nas// blo gros ldan pa legs skyes ma
153a3: des gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byin/ / rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gis gsol zhes byas// blo gros ldan pas ji tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni tshur bor te// de ni grong khyer 'jig pa/
153a4: lha yi bla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer// gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas rags pa dam pa zos pade yi skad cig la// de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal yang snga 'kho bzhin du gnas// legs skyes ma dang lha
153a5: rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas/ / seng ge dang ba'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i bgros gyis byang chub shing drung chas// nai ran dza nA'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcwa brgyad pa'o//
153a6: dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung ne ran dza nar khrus byas te// zas zos nas lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po
153a7: byang chub chen po'i drung gal ba der skyes bu chen po'i stabs yin pa'i skabs des song ste/ mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i skabs dang / ri'i rgyal ba lhun po shin du brtan pa'i skabs drung mi
153a8: dang ma ba ma yin pa'i skabs dang / yam med pa'i skabs dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i skabs dang / ris pa ma yin pa'i skabs dang / sdod pa med pa'i skabs dang / 'thugs pa med pa'i skabs dang / 'byor ba med pa'i skabs dang /

153b1: 'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang / ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang / mi g.yos pa'i stabs dang / tabatab po med pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang / dri ma med pa'i stabs dang / dge ba'i
153b2: stabs dang / zhe sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med pa'i stabs dang / chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa
153b3: la mi reg pa'i stabs dang / rtsi bas stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i rims la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo dra bas 'brel cing san ma zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / sasgra 'byin po'i stabs dang / ri rdob pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam
153b4: par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar nas 'od zer byud nas sems can la reg na bde 'gro 'gro ba'i stabs dang / pad ma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i bstabs dang / sngon dge ba legs par spyad pa'i 'gros kyi
153b5: stabs dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhud pa'i stabs dang / rdo rje ltar bsam pa brtan zhing mi byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa'i bstabs dang / thar pa'i
153b6: lam ston pa'i stabs dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs pas kyis rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa'i stabs dang / mun pa'i ling thog dang / nyon mongs pa sel
153b7: pa'i stabs dang / 'khor ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs dang / stong gsum gyi stong cen zhi pa
153b8: bo gcig pu'i stabs dang / rang byung zil gyis mnon pa'i stabs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar

154a1: byed pa'i stabs dang / zhi ba rdul med pa/ bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong dbyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chas so//
154a2: dge slong dag de ltar klung ni rat+na nA dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der rlung gi sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to// char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab bo// me tog kyang tshal mar bkram mo/
154a3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shing byang chub gal bder logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to// gang dag de'i nyin par bcas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang
154a4: chub kyi snying po logs su mgo bstan te nyal lo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'dud
154a5: par gyur to/ / klung nai raNA nA nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'tshon de rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par bkod par gyur to// lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yos
154a6: sub rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par rgyan pa sprul to// mda' rgyad gang tsam mda' rgyang
154a7: gad tsam zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas mtho ba mngon par sprul te/ shing ta la thams cad rin po che brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel bar 'dug go/ shing ta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzi spos chus yongs
154a8: su gang ba gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po la sogs pas gad ba/ rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba// nor bu rin po che bai dUr+yas them skas brgyan pa/ chu sreg dang /

154b1: bya gar dang / dang ba dang / ngur ba dang / khrur khrung dang / rma bya sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so// lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni spos chus chag chag 'dab po// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma lha'i dri bsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro// shing ta la/
154b2: thams cad kyi mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go// rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bdug pa'i pog phor thogs pa brgyad khri
154b3: 'khod par gyur to/ / rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu spyod// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/ sil
154b4: snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/ me tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/ gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/ rnga bo che brgya stong ni rdung / rta dang glang po che dang / glang khru ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/ bya ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ka li bi dag
154b5: dang / shang shang te'u dang / dad pa dang / ngur ba dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnams ni lta bu des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo // gang gi nub mo byang chub
154b6: sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /
154b7: grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po mnabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra ba mnabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
154b8: thams cad tshar phyin pa/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mda' dbang brnyes pa// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin du mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad

155a1: kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems
155a2: can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa// stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa// chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag pa bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i/
155a3: rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtor ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mgos pas pa dam chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma
155a4: bsnyel ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin du dri ma med pa/ shin du yongs su dag pa/ shin du dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po/
155a5: dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur pa/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par
155a6: bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas
155a7: sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams kyi chos kyi mig rnam par spyad pa dang / bas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs bkun du bstan
155a8: pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis// de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la smra ba

155b1: shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sbyar gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gi bsad nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin
155b2: mngon shes tshangs pa'i lam snang ba/ / bsal ba stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur// thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul lugs sgrub pa byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya// de la skyabs su song na ngan 'gror
155b3: 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te/ / lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur// lo drug bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dga' zhing rab tu ma
155b4: ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis/ / de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste// brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med// gang btsas tshen zhing
155b5: rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug du g.yos gyur pa/ / de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud// gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing // gang gi skul
155b6: mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sam bcu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la/ / gang gi gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnam 'thar tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing // gang gi thugs ni rabazhi khro dang bral ba de la mnod pa byed du 'dod// gang dag
155b7: blo gres brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang / / nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing kun dang dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang // gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chu bzhi pa 'chi med 'thob 'dod dang /
155b8: gal te sa gsum dag nas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis// gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mad ldan pa dang zung du

156a1: sdes dang zhon pa dang / / me tog phreng ba shin du mdzes pas brgyan sa skyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang // rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btud ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs// dge slong dag de sang
156a2: stong gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gyo mo dang rngo med pa dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang man
156a3: shel dang / b+hu ru dang / gser dang / dngul mngagartswa sngo zhing 'jam pa g.yas su 'khyil pa ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir byin to// de'i tshe rgyu
156a4: mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chu ni rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa rnams kyis
156a5: mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to/ / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i dang
156a6: mi'i las shin du 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa brgyan par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas
156a7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur snang bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi bar dag dang / re nag po dang / khor yug dang // khor yug chen po dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i
156a8: 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo / / byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyod pa'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu ud ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu mud ka li zhes bya ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan

156b1: stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / snang byed dang / dri ma med pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi tog dang / 'gro grub dang / mig thogs pa med dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang / pad
156b2: ma'i 'od de/ lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su spyod pa dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go// de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byung
156b3: rkub kyi snying po brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad bcu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis ni bskor// shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang / rin po che
156b4: brgyas pa rim bdun gyis ni bskor/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang / gser gyi tshong tshang dag dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma dag gis ni khebs par byas// snying
156b5: po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdugs/ rin po che'i dra bas ni bres so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang ba mngon par phags pa/ bzang ba mngon du mchod pa
156b6: lha yul ba dang / mi yul ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye ba dang / thang la skye ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams na
156b7: kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang // ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying
156b8: po brgyan par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/ / de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongasu spyod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/ de dag lha dang / klu dang /

157a1: gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha'am yin dag gis mthong nas rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes skyed par gyur to// bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin du ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par
157a2: smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so/ / zhes ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do// byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi 'di lta ste/ 'od ma dang / snyan ldan dang / yid bzangs dang / mdangs ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi
157a3: po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dang sboms phun
157a4: tshogs pa mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu 'gel ba/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mtho ba/ de dang 'tsham par 'gel ba/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/
157a5: rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang rin po che'i rgyas pa'i phreng pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyi rim bskor ba/ shing yongs 'dus brtol dang 'dra ba/ mig gis
157a6: blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do/ / gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba/
157a7: snying po yod pa/ mi phyed pa/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to//
157a8: mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to// ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to// sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos

157b1: par gyur to/ / mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to// bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to// sems can dbul po rnams ni
157b2: longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to/ / nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med par gyur to// bkres pa rnams ni lto 'drangs par gyur to// skem pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to//
157b3: sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsa 'bar gyur to// zhum pa nyams chud pa rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang la yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / chags pa dang / thab dang /
157b4: gnod sems dang / phrag dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag cig la gcig
157b5: pha mar 'du shes skyed par gyur to/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar// dmyal ba mi zad snang ba yi// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhing / bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems
157b6: can rnams/ / gan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes// yi dgas 'jig rten yi dgas rnams// bkres sgo mnyen pa ji snyed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid
157b7: kyis/ der dag zas skom rnyed par gyur// mi kham thams cad chang gyur cing // ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyur// sems can thams cad bde kur te// lha yi bde bas rab tu tshim// migadung na ba med pa dang / gzhan yang gang
157b8: dag dbang po nyams/ / de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing // yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sosla pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang // gnod bur de tshe nyon mongs kun/ 'ab gyu da da /

158a1: smos pa dag ni dran ldan zhing // dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan// nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing // bcing bas bcings pa grol bar gyur// ser sna med cing dgra med de// gnod sems dang ni rtsod pa dag/ phan tshun byed pa med
158a2: gyur te/ / de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas// pha dang ma dag bu gcig la// ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// de tshe bu pangs bzhin du sems// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dra yis// phyog
158a3: bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang / / ga~M gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// ri bo nag po rnams dang ni// khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur// rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun// gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang //
158a4: lag mthil lta bur gyur pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas// thams cad rin chen nyid du snang // byang chub snying po'i rim gro ba// lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad
158a5: brgyad bcu'i sa khyon nang / / byang chub snying po brgyan par gyur// zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// bkod pa chen po gang yod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang // lha dang klu dang gnod
158a6: sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang rang gzhal med khang rnams la// dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur// 'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas// lha dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur// bsod nams gang gi rgyu 'thun 'dir/ phun sum
158a7: 'di 'dra 'di legs 'dzer/ / lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// brtson pa bya ba med pa yang // de yi yid la 'dod pa dang // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan da/ sngon spyad chen rdzogs gyur pa/
158a8: las de rnam par smin pa yis// 'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di byung // byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhis// lha yi shing ni yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis// byang chub snying po brgyan pa byas// byang

158b1: chub snying po'i bkod pa gang / lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod par yong mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med
158b2: pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba/ skyed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ sems can la dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thams cad bskyed pa des klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas
158b3: snang bar byas par mthong nas/ / de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang phyir bdag gi gnas 'di gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lta der gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor
158b4: ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba'i mthong ba dang / / ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon med pa yi dri med 'od mthong ltar// mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig 'byung du the
158b5: com med/ / sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyim ni shin du mun pas gang // khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gis rgya cher 'od kyang yong mi snang // me dang nor bu dag dang dri med glog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang //
158b6: brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang na// de ring khyim 'di'i ning du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la// sems kyang dga' ba skyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil
158b7: gyur to/ / lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las// bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shin du gsal// klu yi me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu
158b8: tig do shal dang / / rgyan dang gdu bu dag dang bye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams mur thogs la// glu dbyang sa dag dang rol mo dbyangs sgra sna tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rnga rnga bzang // brdung zhing 'gro ba kun gyis mtshad

159a1: 'os pan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'dod/ de ni langs te klu'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang // de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig/
159a2: dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor// dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing 'dod pa mthong // klu yi rgyal ba de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la
159a3: mchod byas te/ / gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu'i bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa
159a4: dag kyang 'thor zhing sil snyan rnams kyang byed/ / klu'i rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis bstod// 'dren pa'i 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar 'gyur ba legs//
159a5: bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste/ de ri nga khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phangs brnyes par 'gyur// nga gi don du sngon chad dul dang sbyin dang bsdams
159a6: shing bdog pa kun btang la/ gang gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms// gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgye sa dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa/ khyod kyi smon lam
159a7: de dag thams cad sa tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur/ ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing sa la 'dud// ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang bstong dag khyed la bskor ba rab bgyid cing // ji ltar tsaga'i
159a8: tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang / / ji ltar dad pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' las mchi zhing tshul du shis ldan par// dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni bskor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom

159b1: 'gyur/ ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchis te// ji ltar ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye dgu sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang // ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyi rgyun chad bser ma 'ang dal
159b2: bus ldang ba las/ / srid pa gsum du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa yi ded dpon de ring 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam
159b3: gtan bde ba spangs pa dang / / gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'dir lhags las// srid pa gsum du skye rga thar pa mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal por de ring byon// ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dang
159b4: bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la/ / bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar pad ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs brtol byung ste/ de la stobs
159b5: chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/ / bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang gI klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod pa'am g.yos ma nus/ mchod/
159b6: sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes// rgyu skar zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar ltung gda'//
159b7: ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur yang gda'// skyes bu mkhas pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'// khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub
159b8: mthob bzhengs mi gda'/ / gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang // byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par gyur// bur bcas bdag dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skye

160a1: gnas 'di las thar gyur cing / / glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi// dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ba dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba klu'i bu mo rin
160a2: po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / / sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha dang ma'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa
160a3: dang / pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par
160a4: gtor te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do/ / 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi snyengs mi 'dzem bag mi tsha// ma zhum mi dman rab tu dgyes pa gdul dka' ba// ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam pa mi mnga' ba// chags
160a5: phral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba 'dul mdzad pa// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog/ gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni//
160a6: 'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo // ji ltar lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dga' gyur te// me tog char ba chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang // 'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring
160a7: rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgyes par mdzod/ / shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyed pa mi ma dang bzhugs// bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drol// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar// byang
160a8: chu ba zhi ba dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ / khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal pa byed ma du// 'gre ba dgrol ba'i don du dka' ba spyad pa mdzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la de bab kyis// shing dbang drung du gshegs te

160b1: byang chub mchog dag mdzod/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs na blan med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
160b2: par sangs rgyas snyam mo/ / de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsams te// rtswa bting nas bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya stong par sdang la 'khor pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems
160b3: kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ / de de bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
160b4: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshod bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa sngo ba// 'jam pa/ shin du gzhon pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lcang lor
160b5: 'khril par 'dug pa/ g.yas su 'khyil pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag rnga zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub
160b6: sems dpa' sa la mabor te/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtsa 'tshong bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang /
160b7: rnam par gapas pa dang / mi tshad pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / gan cing mdzes pa dang / mnyan par rol pa dang / thum pa dang / go bar byed pa dang / zhus pa dang / rim par byed pa dang / ga nga byed pa dang
160b8: rtsub pa dang / sha sho bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / rnar bde ba dang / lus dang sems shin du dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'thab pa

161a1: dang / rnyog pa sel ba dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya kun la dang / shang shar te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi ngo ro dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa med
161a2: pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgal bu dang ldan pa dang / 'i das pa dag ma ri byed man par
161a3: bstod pa dang / zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'joms pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i ngo ro lta bu dang / klu
161a4: sgra sgrogs pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / ta btab por ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba
161a5: med pa dang / mi shol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang / dus la mi yol ba dang / chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / mnyen pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang
161a6: ldan pa dang / skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang / thar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las
161a7: mi 'da' dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
161a8: bkra shis nA dag nga la myur du byin// de ring ngal na sa ni don chen 'gyur// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su// byang chub dam pa zhi pa reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du// sbyin dang ngul

161b1: dang sdom dang gtong byas dang / / tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub rab spyad pa// de ni de ring nga yis thob par 'gyur// bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs// bsam gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes
161b2: rab stobs/ / bsod nams dang ni mengon shes rnam thar stobs// de ni de ring ngal grub par 'gyur// shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs// so so yang dag
161b3: rig dang bden pa'i stobs/ / de ni de ring ngal 'grub par 'gyur// de ring ngal rtswa sbyin byas nas ni// khyod la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te// de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur// khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par
161b4: 'gyur/ / bkra shis pas ni 'den pa'i tshig snyan rab du mdzes thos nas// dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// rtsa 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs// mdun du 'dug nas
161b5: rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad smras/ / gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa// mchog gyur zhib blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam 'thob na// yon tan chen po rgya mtsho grags pa dpag med khyod gzhes cig/
161b6: bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang rgyar bgyi// brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad par// bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni 'thob mi 'gyur// gang tshe blo gros
161b7: ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags/ / de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul med 'gyur zhes lung ston te// bkra shis gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na// srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis
161b8: khyod ma za/ / gang tshe nga yis byang chub thob shes bdud rtsi rnam par dbyes// khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas shin du mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtswa ni spar gang blangs/ se ge dang pa'i stabs kyis/

162a1: chos nas sa ni rab tu g.yos// lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis// deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
162a2: sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na lha'i bu rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/
162a3: bar 'gyur snyam ste/ byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par gyur to// de nas byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phad du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha gcig/
162a4: ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad stong pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha gcig ni tsan dan gyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin
162a5: can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum pa yang yod/ / byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'brum phrag bcu pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi rang
162a6: bzhin can la dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod/ / byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang ji ltar 'dug pa'i seng ge'i khri lta ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba bshams par gyur to// byang chub
162a7: kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni pad ma'i khri stan bshams par gyur to/ / kha cig gi dru ni spos kyi khri snyan no// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po chenam pa sna tshogs kyi ji stan no// byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
162a8: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang

162b1: byang bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la 'dug par kun du snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi
162b2: seng ge'i khril snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug gi gzhan gyi la ni ma yin par shes so/ / ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud
162b3: 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad dang / lha dang mi thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri 'dug par mthong / mod
162b4: kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtswa spar gang thogs te/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun
162b5: bskor ba byas te/ bdag nyid kyis rtswa'i rtse mo ni ni nang du bstan/ rtsa ba ni phyir bstan nas/ rtswa'i gding ba kun nas bzang po bting ste/ seng ge lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / bstan pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lha/
162b6: bu dang / mthu lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung lta bu dang / ye shes can lta bu dang / bla na med pa lta bu dang / khyad par lta bu dang / mngon par 'phags pa lta bu dang / grags pa lta bu dang / brjod pa lta bu dang /
162b7: sbyin pa lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzod pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / bsam gtan lta bu dang / shes rab lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bsod nams lta bu dang / bdud rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs
162b8: bur skyil mo krung bcas nas rtswa bting ba de la shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas/ lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yid dam brtan po byas so// bstan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang /

163a1: rung // lpags pa rus pa sha rnams rigs kyang rung // bskal mad rnyedadag/ byang chub mthob par// stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o// byang chub kyi snying por bathad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gra
163a2: pa'o/ / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gsum pa// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams byang chub
163a3: sems dpa' la bar char byed pa mi 'byung grang snyam ste/ sa phyogs log su gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
163a4: sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas 'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs med dpag tu med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtug/
163a5: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba
163a6: bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang
163a7: chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyis phyir de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyis sngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mthas btugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
163a8: thams cad 'khor gyi khyams bai dUr+ya sngon po dag pa las byas pa zhig tu bstan to/ / 'gro ba lngar byos pa'i semacan mams cad kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa bstan to// sems can de dag kyang

163b1: phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing sams can tshul du shes pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig/ 'di ltar rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig ces 'dzer to// sems
163b2: can da / bdun byang nabasams dpa' das kyang chubasesas dang rnams kyang la te/ byung na ba mams dpa gzugs da gis chags sa sa dpa sa ga/ ya ma pa 'du drugasanas
163b3: gang yin pa/ chags bcas bton pa// gang gis lus las 'od srung phyogs bcu 'gaselasasan 'di ni med par byas// gang gis sod nams tid 'dzin legs chags ni bskal pa mang por kun sngal pa// thubs
163b4: chen po dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes/ / de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b5: po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa bdag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der seng ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo/
163b6: / de na brgya byin dang tshangs pa
163b7: dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer te// gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to// de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs
163b8: su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gis rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag/ byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med pa bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul// de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred

164a1: mde bu yi mthu ldan pa/ / yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi phreng ba nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun du rgyas pa man/
164a2: par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba
164a3: las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ / byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i dra
164a4: ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo/ / de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzer te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to//
164a5: de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen tog/ rin chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgyes// dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad
164a6: pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes/ / byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur te de yi mchod pa 'di// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zil du rlag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi
164a7: ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od nges bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du b.rar te/ byang chub kyi
164a8: snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa

164b1: ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun du bstan to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer to// bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su/
164b2: bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam sbyangs shing // gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis dag sbyangs la// gang gis khrel yod mos pa byams dang /
164b3: de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa// de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya g+hu mchog de la mchod pa byed// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ning
164b4: ' jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su
164b5: bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gya 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams
164b6: cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsegs pa de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha min da/ gnod sbyin lto 'phye chen po rtag tu yon tan dgos// yon tan
164b7: can de yon tan ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes/ / yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
164b8: khams rin po che 'byung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bad/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /

165a1: byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der rin po che'i mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul ste rin
165a2: po che'i mkha' rten de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnam dag dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang bzhan pa mkha' rten brgyan// me tog
165a3: phreng ba mdzes dang 'dun sa dag dang bskyed mos tshal rnams dang rkang pa lag pa mgo dang mig btang ba de byang chub snying po 'dug/ de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi
165a4: z hing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs
165a5: su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ / byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i a ga ru'i sprin mngon par sprul te/
165a6: 'khor gyi khyams der tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i cher mngon par phab bo// dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rig dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi chos kyi
165a7: sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab/ / dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed char ba 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcas te gcod par 'gyur//
165a8: bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas par dad par byed pa 'byin/ de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig

165b1: nyan gyi 'ams gser gyi drabs lebs pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pagasar bye bas brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dadas brtul bas byang chub sams dnga' babrang b.las 'das bdag gis sangs thug / mdun du bdang /
165b2: / byang chub kyi snying pogal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'agal ba dar mang ste byin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mdzad pa'i las kyi phyir 'ang ba brtags pa de dag thams cad dang / rinapa ma ma
165b3: rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan padag mngon par sprul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing
165b4: byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud nas me tog gi phreng ba sbyangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ / gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing // gus dang bcas pas dad pa che bskyed la// tshangs
165b5: pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/ / byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal// de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun du rnam par bltas
165b6: par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po
165b7: gal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bai dUr+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad ma rnams mngon du byung bar bstan to//
165b8: pad ma de dag gi snying po la bud med lus phyed snang ba// kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bstan te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon na mgul gdub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser

166a1: skud dang / mu tig gi do shal la sogs pargyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi sbyangs nas byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su btud de tshig su bcad pa/
166a2: 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud// khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med// yon tan ldan pa de la gdud pa byos// de nas steng gi phyogs na de
166a3: bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'o/ / des bskul bas byang chub sems
166a4: dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste byin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na
166a5: 'dug bzhin du phyog bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / bdug spos dang /
166a6: gos dang / brgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang
166a7: dpung bu chung bzhon pa dang / shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'bya
166a8: chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil nas char chen por mngon par bab ste// thams cad dga' ba dang

166b1: bde ba bskyed kyi sems can gang la yang 'jigs pa'am gnod par mi byed do/ / de bzhin du sbyar te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang // phan par byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags//
166b2: gyur pa// 'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyi bkod rim dang // rtsal dang rim pa mdzes bdag gi dpe tsam nyon// kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu spyad byas te// nam mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin du sgrogs shing lhags//
166b3: cig mkha' las me tog gzhal med khang ston cing // cod pan rin chen po gas la gtsug phud 'phyang zhing lhags// kha cig stong pa mtshan med sgron med mchog rjod cing // sa las sang ga lta bur shin du sgrogs ga/
166b4: lhags// kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing // khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drar shin du bsgrogs shing lhags// kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing // rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu sgrogs shing lhags//
166b5: kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan breng brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin du rgyas shing lhags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de// bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags//
166b6: bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i// dri med togs thog byang chub snying po der yang lhags// kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen dra ba 'thor// zla ba zla bzangs thang skyes rnams mdzes man dang
166b7: bar sha tsam pa ka dang snga ma'i me tog phreng / / byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor// kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la// sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags// kha cig/
166b8: ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags// kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo 'phog nas ni// sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags// kha cig rin chen mchod sdong

167a1: sna tshogs thogs nas na/ / rgyang ring 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing lhags// cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te// yang zhi bzhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// de dag pa
167a2: spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang / / dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byung lhags// kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/ lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lcags gyur cing // de dag byang
167a3: chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te/ / brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor// kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar// dri za srin po mi 'am ci yis yongs bskor te// glog ltar gsal ba'i me
167a4: tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/ / dri za mi 'am ci yi skad kyis brtan pa bstod// ga cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas// me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la// lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus
167a5: phyed gnas thogs lhags/ / btud nas sa'i snying por me tog rnams kyang 'thor// kha cig pad ma ud pal pad ma dkar po rgyas// pad ma'i snying por sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i
167a6: rdzing bu thogs te lhags/ / chags med yid ldan byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa bstod// kha cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags// bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor// bor ma thag tu me
167a7: tog phreng ba rnams su gyur/ / stong gsum ngag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed// kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu dang // de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jigs par ston cing lhags// de dag lus
167a8: las chos kyi sgo mo mang grag ste/ / de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong // kha cig mchu ni bem pa 'dral bzhin mdzes shing // kha bzhin rdzogs la mi'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags// do shal sna tshogs legs

167b1: brgyan bu ma chas pa 'dra/ / de la lta bas lha yi tshogs rnams ngoms mi 'gyur// bcig rdo rje lta bur mi phyed lus can de// rkang pas 'og gi chu yi phung po 'bogacing lhags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas snang byed la/
167b2: 'od byed nyon mongs spyod rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags// kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin chen thogs// zhing mang bye ba stong dag khebs par byed cing lhags// sems can mang la phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir//
167b3: rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs// kha cig gis gzungs chen rin po che yi mdzod gyur cing // ba spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rapa brjod la// spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la tho mchog ldan/
167b4: rgyags shing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar thogs nas ni// rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// de yi sgra ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing song ste// bdud rtsi
