167b5: mthob ston pa do mod 'tshang rgyar sgrogs/ / byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
167b6: ngag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba
167b7: rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der kun tu bstan to/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
167b8: kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba bdud sdig can de la bdag gis ma sbran par bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par

168a1: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mchas/ bdag gi bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o// de las rnam par rgyal na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang
168a2: bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis nga'i seng ge rnam par rol pa mthong na blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / dge slong
168a3: dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar bsams nas de'i tshe sprin mtshams kyi bad kyi mdzod spunas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thas 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig pung ste/ 'od zer nges song gsum gyi ma
168a4: po'ajig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas mog mog bor byas te rab tu g.yos par byas par gyur roto/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos
168a5: yongs su khyab par gyur to/ / bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di ga bu'i sgra 'di yang thos so// sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod spyad pa/ zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te// phan byed de ni
168a6: bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung / / byang chub shing drang 'ongs kyis de ring bsgrim bgyis// de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yang grol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dbugs/
168a7: phyin gzhan dag dbugs kyang 'byin// yongs su mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zlo// ngan song gsum po ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur// sku mi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur// phan pa byed/
168a8: de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon pab che// nag po'i rtsa lag khyod kyi grong khyer stongs byed 'gyur// stobs

168b1: med pas kyang stobs med 'gyur te dpung nyams 'gyur/ / phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gro shes mi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas rmi lam rnam pa
168b2: sum bcu rtsa gnyis bris so/ / rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi gnas mun pas khya par mis pa dang / rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhing gyo mo dang gsagams grang bar nges pa dang / bdag/
168b3: nyid sngangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang / bdag cod pan dang bral zhing rnacha lhung bar rmis pa dang // bdag mchu dang gre ba dang / kan skams par rmis pa dang / bdag snying kun tu gdungs par
168b4: pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams rnyings par rmis pa dang / rdzing rnams skams te chu med par rmis pa dang / dad pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ka la bing ka dang / kun la dang / shang shang
168b5: te'u la sogs pa bya'i tshogs rnams 'dab gshog zegs par rmis pa dang / rnga dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / bi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / pheg dang / khar ba'i sil khrol la sogs
168b6: pha rol mo'i tshe byad rnams chag grugs te sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang / 'khor sdug pas kyang bdud spangs te ngo 'dzum gnag cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / chung ma'i dam pa
168b7: phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste lag pa gnyis mgo la rdeb par rmis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gang dag shin du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu gzi brjid ldan pa dang / shin
168b8: shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi hud yab kyi hud yab ces cho de 'don par rmis pa

169a1: da bdag lus la gos drim can gyon par rmis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya tho ba seng pa seng po dang / nyam chung ba dang / mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / ska
169a2: lung dang / ta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par mis pa dang / de'i sde'i dpon gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gul bum dang / dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang oms chags bcas te dra zhing
169a3: chodes bta nas byer bar mis sa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di sa ste/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags sdes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / 2
169a4: bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dang / dbang sgyur la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud las mi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang / thab mo'i nang na de'i
169a5: ral gri shubs nas ma phyin cing bdag mi shis pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor gyis bdag por bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mis byin gyi bu yang
169a6: bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / sgo ba kun du dga' byed kyang kun du mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal
169a7: yang ngu bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang / nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas 'brul par rmis
169a8: pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bgod pa thams cad kyang khas sgrub du 'gyel bar rmis pa ste/ dge slong

169b1: ngag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so/ / de sad pa dang / 'jigs skrag spangs nas nang mi thams cad bsogs te/ dpung dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang sde dpon dang / sgo ba dang de dag 'dus par
169b2: rig nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / bdud des rmi lam de dag mthong nas nyam thag ste// sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang // bu rnams dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras// nag po'i rtsi lag de dag
169b3: kun la yongs su dris/ / shAkya'i na skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras// lo drug bar du bya dka' btul zhugs drag po spyad// byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces// mdang sum bar snang las ni tshigs bcang
169b4: de skad grag/ byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams rtogs byed// gang tshe bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg tshe// des ni dganas ma lus stongs par byed par
169b5: 'gyur/ / dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhom par bya// yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu sgrims// gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig/ dgra bcom rang
169b6: sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang / / mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yod mi 'gyur// de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni// bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar mi 'chang// dge slong
169b7: dbade nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdig can de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ / yab cig ca nongs zhal gyur cing ni zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan laganyid lag 'dar// khyod kyis cigs na rtsi
169b8: gzigs myur du bka' stsol cig/ yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal med bdud smras pa bu cig da las nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu me zad rmis// de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma lus smras

170a1: na ni/ khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu skyel bar 'gyur// ded dpon gyis smras pa// gal te 'thab dus bab ste rgyal na nor sa ma mchis// gal te de ring bcom par gyur na nongs dang 'acas// gal te khyod kyi rmi lam
170a2: de 'dra'i ltas lags na/ / bzhag na dge ste g.yul dor yongs su bstangs mi 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul dor grags par 'gyur// gal te brtan la brten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal
170a3: kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su/ kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal des mi nus// ded dpon gyis smras pa// rgya chen dpur bdog kyang ni shin du mthu chung ste// stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las
170a4: rgyal/ / gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang // nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du brlag ste 'od mi bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis// mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus// dge
170a5: slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyi tshig ma mnyan nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po stobs che ba/ thab mo la dpa' ba/ 'jig su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa// lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/
170a6: bzhin bsgyur ba rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gis bkris pa dang ldan pa/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / sta re dang / rtse
170a7: gsum kha ga deng dang / bong dang / gtun shing dang / be con dang / zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / 'khor lo dang // rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa// mgo dang rkang lag dang / mig log par
170a8: 'dug pa/ mgo dang / mig dang / gdod 'bar ba// ltod rkang lag dbyibs mi sdug pa// bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ shin du bzhin bsgyur cing so gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce sku gcig zhed che

170b1: ba mang po 'phyad pa/ lce 'bar 'bur can re lnga dang 'dra ba/ mig me dang sbrul nag pa drug gis rgyas pa'i mig ltar dmar bdag khar btsug ste/ de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug stug pa/ kha cig ni nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho nas phyung nga
170b2: bzhin du lag mthil du sbrul gdug pa bzhag ste za/ kha cig ni mi'i sha dang / khrag dang / rkang lag dang / mgo dang / mkhal ma dang / nang grol dang / ngan skyugs la sogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs sngo bsangs dang / kham pa po dang / sngon
170b3: padang / dmar po dang / ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can/ kha cig ni mig zhigs pa dang / mig khron pa lta bu dang / mig phyung ba lta bu dang / mig 'bar ba dang / mig bzung ba/ mi sdug pa/ kha cig ni mig/
170b4: log pa dang / 'bar ba dang / mi sdug pa/ kha cig ni ri 'bar ba thogs te/ 'gying zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong / kha cig ni shing rtsa thon byas te byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug cing 'ong / kha cig gi rna ba ni phag rna lta bu
170b5: dang / zhib ma lta bu dang / glang po'i rna ba lta bu dang / 'phyang ba dang / phag rna lta bur 'dug pa/ kha cig ni rna ba med pa/ kha cig ni ker rus mang po sprul nas lus rid cing gsus pa che la sna zhom pa/ gsus pa bum pa lta bur
170b6: 'dug pa/ rkang pa mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa/ lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag skams pa/ rna ba dang / sna dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / mgo bcod pa/ kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas gcig la gcig mgo gcod pa/ kha cig
170b7: ni sgra sha sha po dang / sgra mi snyan pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / sgra rtsub pa dang ldan pa/ hu tu zhes bya ba dang / mtshi zhes bya ba dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa dang / sprugs pa len pa dang / dge sbyong gau ta mA 'di shing dang
170b8: bcas te 'o na cig ces zer ba dang / 'or cig ces zer ba dang / rgyob shig zer ces pa dang / rab tu rgyob shig ces zer ba dang / chings shig ces zer ba dang / zung shig ces zer ba dang / tsher shig ces zer ba dang / gtubs shig ces zer

171a1: ba dang / gtogs shig ces zer ba dang / bab bab tu 'or cig ces zer ba dag go// kha cig ni wa dang / ce spyang dang / phag dang / bong bu dang / ba lang dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / rkyang dang / ma he dang / ri bong
171a2: dang / g.yag dang / ba se dang / ri dgas ldang sgo ska la sogs pa'i kha ga dang sna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba spangs par byed pa/ mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go/ kha cig ni seng ge dang / stag dang / phag rgod dang / dred dang /
171a3: spre'u dang / gzig dang / byi la dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / ne'u le dang / nya dang chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang // ru sa sbal dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / nam mkha' lding lta bu'i lus dang
171a4: ldan pa dag go/ kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug pa dag go/ kha cig ni mgo gcig pa dang / mgo gnyis pa nas mgo brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/ kha cig ni mgo med pa'o// kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas lag
171a5: pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/ / kha cig ni lag pa med pa dag go// kha gcig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas rkang pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni rkang pa med pa dag go// kha cig ni rna ba dang / kha dang
171a6: sna dang / mig dang / lte ba'i khang bu nas sbrul gdug pa 'byin to// kha cig ni ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum kha gdeng dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
171a7: rdo rje dang / bod dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs gsor zhing gar byed la/ byang chub sems dpa' la sdigs mo byed do// kha cig ni mi'i sor mo bcad nas phreng bar brgyus te thogs so//
171a8: tshig ni keng rus dang / thod pa dang / phreng ba lta bur brgyus te thogs so// kha cig ni lus sbrul gdug pas dkris so// kha cig ni mgo la zhugs ling me can thogs te/ glang po dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu

171b1: dang / mnyamananano// 'big ni bye'i tshugs su 'dug la bab sa pa smanan dgag/ bcag ni ga lang dang / khong ba dang / pagand dang / 'u la dang / dang / lug dang / byal dang / kA dang / s+yAng ga dang / byung
171b2: satha dang ldan la/ sbrul gdug pa skrag cing lcags kyi bu lum med pa dang / ma 'byin pa dang / lugs dang / zangs 'bar ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / lce 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje'i khri 'babs pa dang / lugs kyi bye mtshan
171b3: po'i char 'bebs pa dang / sprin nag po bsdus te rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang / mda'i sprin bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang / mun gnag ston pa dang / sgra 'byin cing byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug pa dag go/
171b4: kha cig ni zhags pa bskor ba dang ri chen po rnyil bar byed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs par byed pa dang / ri chen po las 'tshong ba dang / ri'i rgyal po ldum po sprul ba dang / rgyug pa dang / 'bros pa dang / yan
171b5: lag dang / nyid lag 'thor ba dang / lus skor ba dang / gad mo cher nod pa dang / brang rdung ba dang / brang la rdob pa dang / mgo gsig pa dang / mgo 'bar zhing sgra gyen du 'greng ba dang / phan tshun shugs phyung zhing rgyug cing wa
171b6: mig lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la 'jigs par byed do/ / bud med rgad mo dag kyang ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/ 'di skad du kyi hud dbu/ kyi hu dnga'i bu/ longs shig/ longs la myur du bros shig/
171b7: ces 'dzer ro// srin mo'i gzugs dang / sha za mo'i gzugs dang / yi dgas long ba/ theng po/ rke ba/ bkres pas rid pa/ lag pa bsgred pa/ kha bcus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te/ sngangs par byed cing
171b8: byang chub sems dpa'i mdun na rgyug go/ bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad bcu kho ra khor yug tu gang bar gyu ro// bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po bya ba

172a1: phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdug can rnams kyi dpung dag gis thad ka dang sted gang bar gyur to/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs// srin po yi dgas sha zar
172a2: gzugs dang bcas/ / 'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa/ thams cad sgra yis der ni sprul pa byas// mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas// mgo stong bar du ldan bzhin gnod sbyin mang /
172a3: lag gcig lag gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas// lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu meng// rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas// rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang // kha bzhin sngol lus ni ser ba dang //
172a4: bzhin ser la lus ni sngo bdang // kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang // kha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang // kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang // de 'dra'i phyag brnyan dag gi dpung rnams lhags/
172a5: rta dang sbrul dang phag gi gdod can dang // glang po rta dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong // spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang // de 'dra'i kha gdong ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags// ral pa brjes la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin
172a6: mang / / lus mgo rus pa 'bar 'bur lba pa can// lus ni mi yi khrag gis rab tu sngags// gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der yang lhags// rkang pa dag ni rko ba'i rkang pa 'dra// mig gi 'bras bu spre'u mig dang mtshungs
172a7: mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra/ / kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags// lus kyi dbyibs ni chu srin 'dra ba ste/ mig gi 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar// na ba dag ni pa'i na ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung
172a8: rnams der yang lhags/ / kha cig dag ni lag na dbyig pa thogs// thob mdung thung rtse gsum lag na thogs/ cig rkun po lag na thogs// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin lhags// gshol thogs 'khod

172b1: lo thogs shing mig bsgyur dang / / ri rtse chen po lag na thogs pa dang // rlung dang rdo dang gan ma lcags rab 'bebs shing // gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba der yang lhags// rlung ni rab tu gtor zhing char yang 'bebs// brgya phrag stong
172b2: gi glog kyang rab tu 'byin/ / 'brug gi sgra yang sgrog cing shing ljon skyel// byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam mi g.yo// char ba rab tu 'bebs shing rlung yang gtong // chu bo'i bebs shed chu yis sa yang gang // de ltar 'jigs su
172b3: rung ba mtshan mo byung / / de yi nub mo sems med shing yang skyel// thams cad dbyibs mi sdug cing gzugs mi sdug/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can de dag mthong nas kyang // yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// lhun
172b4: po lta bur sems ni g.yo ba med/ / sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs pa dang // sprin dang 'dra bar chos rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na// legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas//
172b5: gang zhig da dang nga yi snyam sems shing // dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa// mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong nas ni// 'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos// shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams brten
172b6: byung ba/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs// nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan// dpung bcas g.yo sgyu mthong yang mos pa med// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stong po de dag gi nang nas ded dpon
172b7: la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol du 'khod par gyur to/ / gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol du 'khod par gyur
172b8: to/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/ yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis byang chub sems dpA gdul bar bya// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

173a1: klu yi dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang // glang po'i dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang / ri dgas rgyal po gnyid lag slong 'dod pa// de ni mi dbang legs gnas slong bar 'dog/ nayon rol nas bdud gyi bu blo gros ngan
173a2: pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / bltas pa tsam gyis snyed yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la// 'jig rten dag na snying po ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas// bdag gi sta bas pog na 'gro ba mchis phog ltar// 'tshe bar 'gyur
173a3: ba'i mthu ni de la ga la mchis/ / g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa/ bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na mi rnams la// bdag bsgrim ci dgos shes smras snying po ga la yod// gal te bltas pas
173a4: ri bo lhun po 'jig 'gyur yang / / de yi mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yongs mi nus// gzhan yang mi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing // de yi chu ni brngubs te 'thung bar nus 'gyur gyi// de yi kha bzhin
173a5: dri ma med la mngon sum du/ / lta ba de ni de bas sdug bsngal che zhes smras// g.yon rol nas lag brgya pa zhes bya bas smras pas// bdag gi lus 'di lag pa brgya mchis pa// gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyis te//
173a6: dge sbyong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi// yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyod gshegs shig/ g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa// ba spu rnams kyang ci phyir lag pa min// lag pa brgya dang khyad par
173a7: ci zhig yod/ / lag pa re rer de ltar mdud yod kyang // de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus// ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms// byams ldan thub pa de yi sku la ni/ dug dang mtshon dang me yis
173a8: mi tshugs te/ / mtshon cha 'phangs pa thams cad me tog 'gyur// gzhan yang mkha' dang sa dang tshul stobs ldan gang // mi'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra lta thogs// mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung byin// stobs

173b1: sa ldan kun ma pas dru rdur/ / man sanasagatha brjid rgyal can nas grubs smras pa// dgan dam sa / nga 'gas khrug pa // TIg shAr du// da/
173b2: bangs pa'i shing ya ban pa// gams mnas mi bangs zhes smras pa// shAd na do nga gas/ mas cad su mas theg par mas rdu ba// gang gang da // rdo thug /
173b3: dani bsug pa rnas// gzhan yang de ba rnams cad 'phrul yang byed// rgyam che chen dang byu byed// zas ma kyang bang med// sa ni tha bar 'gyu yang med// dig tan na du tsam padad pa// thugs dab
173b4: par mdzad pa 'o/ / byang chub dam pa mtha' par// shing chen drung nas bzhedas mi med// gsan ri ma nas lag ngas / rjes te smras pa// da kyigan 'di shi // dag gi su /
173b5: skad pa rnams kyi gnas// thams cad rab tu mnye bar bgyi// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las// tshul du shis par chab kyang blang // yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste// rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi// yab cig dpung 'di gzhag tu
173b6: gsol/ / khyod ni thugs ngan chem mdzad// byang chub shing de drungs phyung ste// sug pas phyogs phyogs gtor bar bgyid// g.yas rol nas dang ba thob pas smras pa// gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te// lha dang lha min
173b7: dri zar bcas/ / sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// de dag lag pas phyer klog kyang // khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni// gang gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can// de yi ba spu g.yos mi nus// g.yon
173b8: re la nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa/ / dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du// yab khyod ci slad rab tu bsnyengs// de la dpung grogs ga la mchis// ci slad khyod 'dir de la brnyengs// g.yas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis

174a1: smras pa/ / 'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor los sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dpung ma mchis// 'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par spyod// g.yon
174a2: 'os nas grags lhas smras pa/ / mdung thung rtse gsum dbyug tor la gri ta// glang po shing rtarkang ta ma mchis pa// dge sbyong gcig bu mchis pa de bdag gis// do mod dgum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yag// g.yas rol na
174a3: bsod nams brgyan gyis smras pa/ / sred me dbu ltar mi phyed mi shigs su dang ldan// bzod stobs go mnabs brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mdag// rnam par thar gsum bzhon pa shes rab gzhu lags yaH/
174a4: bsod nams stobs kyis de ni bdud kyi dpung las rgyal// g.yon rol nas phyir mi ldog pas smras pa// 'brog me rtswa la tshig pa phyir mi ldog/ lobs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog/ mkha' las
174a5: rdo rje 'bab par phyir mi ldog/ shAka kya'i bu las ma rgyal ba dag gnas med// g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa/ gsher ba'i rtsa dang phrad na ma yang ldog/ brag gi rtse mo rabab na mda' yang ldog
174a6: rdo rje sa rabab de nas gang du 'gro/ / zhi ba bdud rtsi mtho ba de mi ldog/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ yab cig bar snang la ni ri mo bri bar nus kyang gda'// sems can ji snyed kun gyis sems ni gcig bsru
174a7: nus kyang gda'/ / yab cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing du nus kyang gda'// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod mi nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhibs smras pa/ lta ba'i gdug pa chen
174a8: bos lhun po bsreg par bgyi/ / rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang thal bar bgyi// bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal bar brlag par bgyis// yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol// g.yas

174b1: rol nas don grub kyis smras pa/ / gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la// stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang // yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis// dug ni dug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur//
174b2: srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste// de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med// mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang rab da// sems can
174b3: kun la byams pa'i thugs dang ldan/ / de la mtshon dang dug gis yod mi tshugs// de bas yab cig thams cad bzlog tu gsol// g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags pas spras pa// bdag gis sil snyan stong dag ra
174b4: bgyis te/ / lha yi bu mo brgyan pa bye stong gis// chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri// 'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi// g.yas rol nas chos dgas spras pa// de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas bgyis/
174b5: bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud ci danal bgyes// sems can thar par mdzad dang byams la bgyis// 'dod chags dga' la de ni dgyes mi mdzad// g.yon rol nas rlung gi shugs shes bya bas smras pa// bdag gi shugs
174b6: kyis nyi zla ming bgyis pa/ / nam mkha' las ni rlung yang rab gtang zhing // yab cig de mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni// rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas bdud kyi blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di
174b7: skad ces smras so/ / ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa ltar // gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar gyur// de dag ma cad cig tu 'dus pas kyang // zla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus// g.yon rol nas tsha dra pa'i
174b8: blo gros kyis smras pa/ / de 'dra ba yi drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni// khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad 'jom mi nus// bgyi ba thams cad mang pos 'grub lags na// gcig pus khyod la ci bgyi smos ci 'tshal// g.yas rol nas

175a1: seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ sa la seng ge khrus 'khod sngon ma byung // !/ ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khrus ma 'khod// gze ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po// skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khrus mi 'khod// g.yon pos
175a2: nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas spras pa/ / ji ltar khyod kyi sras po brtson 'grus dang // shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgrogs pa// tshig 'bar de 'dra lab kyis sngon gsan tam// myur du dge slong de ni gzhom du bzhun/
175a3: g.yas rol nas seng ge sgra sgrogs shes bya bas smras pa// nags tshal dag gi khrod na wa mang pos// seng ge med pa den sgra yang sgrog/ seng gis sgra bsgrags 'jigs pa thos pa dang // sgrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu
175a4: 'bros/ / de ltar bdud bu mi mkhas 'di dag kyang // mi mchog gsung ni mthos de bar du// de dag spyi rtol byed cing byung rgyal smra// mi yi seng ges gsung bsgrags 'bros par 'gyur// g.yon rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems
175a5: pas smras pa/ / bdag gis gang bsams myur du 'dir 'grub na// de ni ci slad dpung tshogs 'di mi lta// gang phyir langs te myur du mi 'bros pas// de ni glen pa cho ga ma 'tshal ba// g.yas rol nas don legs par bsam
175a6: pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ de ni mi glen pha rol gnon pa ste// khyed cag glen zhing shin du ma bsdams pa// khyed kyis de yis mthu rtsal yod mi shes// de yi shes rab stobs kyis thams cad pham// bdud kyi bu ni
175a7: gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ / khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu brtsal can/ de yi ba spu gcig kyang g.yas mi nus// gsad par bsams pa mi 'grub smos ci dgos// khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems// gus dang bcas
175a8: par dad pa'i sems su gyis/ / di ni srid gsum rgyal bar gyur pas na// thab mo mi byed par ni sngar log shig/ de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar ba'i phyogs pa dang nag po'i phyogs pa stong du chang pa dag zams

175b1: cad kyis mos nas bdud sdig can gyi tshigs su bcad de smras so/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyi sded pon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang // stong dang mi'am ci
175b2: tshogs rnams dang / / lha min dbang dang pa'a' lding dbang po rnams// thal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal na// khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa// tshangs pa'od gsal lha yi bu rnams dang // gnas gtsang ris kyis lha rnams dad/
175b3: kun// de la phyag 'tshal ba ni sbas ci 'tshal// khyod kyi sras po shes rab can// gobs dang ldan zhing mi ga zhungs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa'al// snying dang thun nu phyag 'tshal lo// dpag tshad brgyad bcur byab pa'i/
175b4: gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di// phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis// kun kyang nyes pa med la lta// 'jigs su rung zhing drag bskur ba// dpung tshogs mi zad 'dri gzigs nas// ngo mtshar mgur zhu mi mnga'// nges par de
175b5: modo 'di rgyal 'gyur/ / gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der// wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin la// bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin pas// myur du slar ni ldog pa'i rigs// byang chub snying por gzigs su gsol// pa ta kun ta dang ba dang //
175b6: brug rma ba mngon bskor bas// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der// rdul dang sdug ca'i char 'bab la// sa dkyil me tog char 'bab pas// bdag gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs// gang na dpung 'di gnas
175b7: pa de/ / shang shor gyur cing tsher mas gang // sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas// shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs// gal te mi 'dod sngar rmis pa'i// rmi lam de dag mngon sum 'gyur// drang srong rnams kyi yul brlag pa// de
175b8: bzhin dpung 'di thal bar klog/ rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog/ tshangs pas byin gyis khros byas pas// dan da ka yin gas tshal tshig/ lo mang zhig tu rtswam skyes// drang srong gtul zhugs spyod pa po// dka' thub ldan pa'i

176a1: 'jig rten na/ / ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog/ 'byung po kun la mi 'tshe 'di// gang gi lus la mtshan rab 'bar// khyim nas kyang ni byung ba der// nyon mongs pa ma byas 'tshang rgya zhes khyod kyis sngon chad ma
176a2: gsan nam/ / rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du// 'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sbrul/ de bas nges par sems can mchog/ sbyin bsreg dam pa len par 'gyur// 'di yi mdzod spu dri med pa// bye ba khrag khrig zhing du
176a3: mdzes/ / de yis bdag cag mog mog bgyis// bdud dpung des bcom gdon mi 'tshal// srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis// de'i spyi gtsug bltar mi nus// nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan par// thams cad mkhyen
176a4: nyid thob par 'gyur/ / ji ltar lhun po khor yug dang // nyi zla brgya byin tshangs pa dang // shing ljon rnams dang ri mchog kun// sa skyil phyag 'tshal bgyid las na// bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs// ye shes
176a5: stobs can bzod pa'i stobs/ / brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa de// bdud phyogs stobs med mdzad par nges// glang pos so ma btang snod dang // sang gis ji ltar wa bcom dang // nyi mas srin bu ma khyer ltar// 4
176a6: ba gshegs pasang pung bcom 'gyur/ / tshig de gang thos pa dang bdud kyi bug zhan zhig shin du khros nas mig dmang por gyur te smras pa/ khyod ni gcig bu yi bsngags pa dag/ shin tu dpag du med par brjod bya na/
176a7: gcig pu des ni ci zhig bya bar nus// 'jigs su rung ba'i dpung chen ma mthong ngam// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ 'jig rten nyi zla sang ge dang // 'khor
176a8: los snang la grogs byed med/ / byang chub bzhugs nas nges pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grogs mi dgos// de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir gang mthong bas bdag gi dpung byang chub sems

176b1: dpa'i kha'i nang du zhugs so snyam du sems shing bdud bros par gyur pa dang / bros nas kyang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log ste// 'khor dang bcas pas mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byang chub sems dpa'i
176b2: steng du 'phen cing / / ri rab tsam mI ri de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs pa dang / me tog gi bla re dang / gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang / gang dag mig gdug pa dang / myung du gdug pa dang / dbugs
176b3: gdug pa rnams me lce gtor ba'i mi'i dkyil 'khor di yang byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas par bya ba'i phyir pad ma mdab ma brgya brgyas pa lta bu'i bzhin bstod do/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpas
176b4: lag pa g.yas pas mgo la byugs pa dang / bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag na ral gri thogs par mthong nas lho phyogs su bros pa dang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log go/ slar log nas kyang byang chub sems
176b5: dpa'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mnga' bo che dang / dgra sta dang / bong ba dang / gtun shing dang rdo rje rdo gcig pa dang / dbyug to dang 'khor lo dang / thob dang / shing drungs phyung
176b6: dang / pa zong dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyi thu lum shin du 'jigs pa du ma 'phen te/ de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / mchog gi bla rer gyur te gnas so// me tog sil mar yang gyur nas la 'tho
176b7: ba dang / phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i bgod pa 'byor pa de dag mthong nas bdud sdig can phrag dog dang ser snas sems la gnod de/ byang chub
176b8: sems dpa' la smras pa/ kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs/ bzhangs// rgyal srid la spyod cig/ khyod kyi bsod rnams de tsam gyis khyod kyis thar pag la 'thob/ de nas byang chub sems dpas brtan la zab me rgya

177a1: che ba dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gis bdud sdig can la'adi skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod kyis ni gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thob du zad do// ngas ni mchod sbyin bye ba khrag
177a2: khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/ / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo dag kyang bcad cing spong ba rnams la byin no// sems can rnams thar bar bya ba'i phyir khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang
177a3: gos dang / 'chags dang / bskyed mos tshal rnam pa de dag kyang spong ba rnams la byin no// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' la slar smras pa/ sngon cad kho bos mchod sbyin kha na ma tho med/
177a4: gtan pa med pa byas pa khyod 'dir dbang du yod// khyod la 'di na dbang po gang yang yod min pas// smras kyang phan pa ci yod khyod ni pham par gyur// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// sdig can sa 'di ni nga'i dbang yin no// de nas
177a5: byang chub sems dpa' sa bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi 'khor la byams pa dang snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas/ / seng ge ltar mi 'jigs mi skrag la bag tsha ba med cing mi dman la ma zhum pa dang / ma 'khrug
177a6: pa dang / ma brnyogs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / spu zing zhes byed pa med par lag mthil na dung dang / rgyal mtshan dang / nya dang bum pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / lugs kyu dang / 'khor lo'i mtshan ma yod pa/ sor mo bar dra bas 'brel ba
177a7: sen mo shin du mdzes shing zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pas brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen la shin du gzhon pa/ bskal pa dpag du med par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pas grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thams cad
177a8: la byugs nas tshul du shis par sa la brda bas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ / sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te// rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye mgon med// 'di ni bdag gi dbang ste bdag rdzun med/ 'di la khyod ni

177b1: bdag gi dbang byos shig/ byang chub sems dpas sa chen po 'di la reg ma thag tu rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// chematsham// rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'di lta ste dperan
177b2: yal ma ga d+ha'i brdab khar sgra 'byung zhing sgra rgyun ring ba de bzhin du sa chen po 'di yang byang chub sems dpas lag pas bstan ma thag tu sgra byung zhing sgra rgyun ring du byung ngo / / // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa
177b3: chen po'i mdo/ / bam po bcu bzhi pa// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba sa'i lha ro 'i 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa gang yin pa des sa chen po thams cad
177b4: g.yos par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig dus brtol te/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyed phyung nas byang chub sems dpa' ga la de logs su lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub
177b5: sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ / de de bzhin no// skyes bu chen po de de bzhin no// khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin te/ 'di ni bdag la mngon sum mo// de lta lags mod kyi// 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid de lha dang bcas pa'i
177b6: 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur pa dam pa lags so// sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan mas de skad ces smras nas// rnam pa du mar bdud sdig can gyi glags ni med par byas// byang chub sems dpa' la ni bstod de// rang
177b7: gi mthu rnam pa mang po bstan nas 'khor dang bcas te nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / g.yon can dpung bcas sa sgrad thos nas// nags su seng ges sgra sgrags was thos dang // bya rog rdo 'phangs mod la 'byed pa bzhin// sngangs skrag
177b8: snying gas thams cad rab tu byer/ / de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste// yid ma rangs la sgyings bzhin du nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas ma song la phyir yang ma log cing bros kyang ma bros te phyir bltas nas yang

178a1: dpung rnams la smras pa/ khyed lhan cig 'dus te bung zad cig sdod cig/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems can rin po che gre bur du chud mi gzan par kho bos rjes su 'chags pas 'di bslang par nus sa ma ma rus sang par bya'o//
178a2: de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu mo rnams la smras pa/ bu mo khyed dong ste byang chub kyi snying por song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/ 'on te 'dod chags med// ci gti mug can nam/ 'on te shes rab can
178a3: ci ldongs pa zhig gam/ 'on te phyogs shes pa zhig gam/ 'on te dpung gnyen med pazhig gam/ dman pa zhig gam brtan pa zhig yin pa bgoms shig/ tshig de thos nas lha'i bu mo de dag byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang / byang chub sa sra/
178a4: dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'khod de/ bud med kyi sku rnam pa gsum cu rtsa gnyis nye bar bstan to// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i nang nas kha cig ni bzhin phyed 'gebs
178a5: ba dang / kha cig ni nu ma mkhrang zhing 'bu rab ston pa dang / kha cig ni cung zad 'dzum pas so'i phreng ba ston pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa brkyang ste bya spangs byed cing mtshan khung ston pa dang / kha cig ni bim pa ltar dmar ba'i mchu ston pa dang /
178a6: kha cig ni mig phyed btsums te byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing // bltas nas myur ba myur bar 'dzum pa dang / kha cig ni lus phyed g.yogs te ston pa dang / kha cig ni gos snyil bar byas te/ gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i
178a7: rked pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni gos du ku la srab mo gyon te/ gser gyi phags dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni rkang gdub sgra sil sil 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma'i bar nas phreng ba gcig nye bar ston pa dang kha cig
178a8: ni badra byed tsam brjes pa nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo dang phrag pa dag la bya 'ad ba sbed dang / ne co dang / ri skegs 'dug par nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la mig zur gyis lta ba dang / kha cig ni nas

178b1: legs par bgos kyang bgo ma legs pa lta bur btsas pa dang / kha cig ni rked pa dang / gser gyi phag ska skrod pa dang / kha cig ni 'khrul pa ltar 'chos shing sgeg ste phan tshun 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gar byed pa dang / kha cig ni
178b2: glu len pa dang / kha cig ni bsgegs shing ngo tsha ba ltar yang 'chos pa dang / kha cig ni chu shing rlung gis bskrad pa ltar brla skul ba dang / kha cig ni brjid pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni seng ras bgos te gser gyi pags dril bu can/
178b3: bcings nas dgod cing 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gos dang rgyan rnams sa la 'dor zhing ngo tsha ba ltar slar yang len pa dang / kha cig ni gsang ba dang / gsal ba'i rgyan thams cad nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa spos kyis
178b4: bskas par ston pa dang / kha cig ni mkhur ba bskas shing rna cha yang ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo yang g.yogs shing bzhin yang g.yogs la skad cig tsam gyis ston pa dang / kha cig ni sngon dgod dgod pa dang / dga' dga'
178b5: pa dang / rtse rtse la phan tshun dran par byed cing yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang / kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs dang / bu ma btsas pa'i gzugs dang / na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang / kha cig ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas
178b6: byang chub sems dpa' la lhags pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la me tog sil mas 'thor ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la rtog cing gdong du yang lta ste/
178b7: 'di tsa chags pa'i dbang pos lta 'am 'on te mig rgyang ring du lta 'am/ g.yo 'am mi g.yo zhes bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la skrag can las thar pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang /
178b8: nyi ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang / gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang / pad ma 'dab ma stong pa rgyas pa lta bu dang / gtor bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang / lhun po ltar ma g.yo ba dang / khor yug ltar mngon

179a1: par 'phags pa dang / dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang / glang po ltar sems shin du dul bar mthong ngo // de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shin du chags par bya ba'i phyir glu dang gar du sbyar
179a2: ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab// zhugs shing me tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol// khyod kyi gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste/ mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdog
179a3: cag 'gyur/ / bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te// lha mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag cag byung // byang chub rnyed dkas thugs ni slar sbyar la// myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod// khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab
179a4: tu brgyan te lhags gyur pa/ lha'i bu mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs// gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur srog tsam lus pa yang // chags par 'gyur na chagos pas dga' ba su zhig chags
179a5: mi 'gyur/ / skra 'jam shin tu dri zhim dri dang ldan// cod pan na cha 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la// dpral ba legs shing legs blugs bzhin dang ldan// pad ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs// kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste// shing
179a6: tog bim pa sman 'dra'i mchu dang ldan/ / dung dang kun da kha ba dkar so ldan// sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la gzigs// nu ma shin tu mkhrar zhing rgyas la 'bur// lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin du mdzes// rked
179a7: pa 'khor lo lta bur yangs shing mdzes/ / na chung shin du mdzes la mgon po gzigs// glang po'i sde 'dra ba yi brla ldan zhing // lag pa ga du bus chal bar gdab can/ rked pa gser gyi phag sarab mdzes brgyan/
179a8: khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon po gzigs// dang ba'i stabs ldan dal gyis mchi bgyid pa// 'jam zhing yid 'od 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba// rnam pa 'di ltar shin du legs brgyan la// lha yi dga' ba rnams la shin du/

179b1: mkhas// glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gar rab bslabs// dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes// 'dod la rab dga' gal te mi bzhed na// 'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus// mi glen nor gyi bde ba mi shes
179b2: dga'/ / gter mtho nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar// khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen dang lpags pa// na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra// dge slong dag de nas byang chubasapas dpa' mig mi 'dzums par 'dzum du
179b3: bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing / dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang / lus ma bcos pa dang / brjid pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang po dang ma rmongs pa dang / ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / ma zhum pa dang / ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med
179b4: pa/ blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams shin du spangs pa'i phyir rang gi kha na las pa'i lam gyi sgo dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang / tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang / bya ka la bir ka'i sgra dbyangs dang
179b5: snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po stsogs shing / sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste// mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu
179b6: 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed/ / bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras// da ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur// 'dod pa bsten na srid pa phyir zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur te//
179b7: dper na mi 'ga' la la tsha chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin// de la zhugs pa dag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min// nga ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin// khyod kyi gzugs ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra//
179b8: sgyu ma'i tshon ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ rmi lam dag na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang // byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed// mig ni chu'i chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste lpags pas

180a1: g.yogs/ / khrag rlung mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs// lto ni gcin dang phyi sa stsogs te shin du mi gtsang ba// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las yang dag gyur byas pa'i/
180a2: baitson dag gi mos gyur phyin ci log pa yis// lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min// sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khor byed na// sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzad mang ba
180a3: myong / / rked pa nas ni rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can mdzag/ brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// nga yi khyed la yang dag brtags na sgyu ma ji bzhin te// phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin// /
180a4: 'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gol ba phyin gyur pa// me dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na// de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes skyed cing brgyal
180a5: bar gyur/ / mi gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang / gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing // dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing // bsam gtan lam gol
180a6: blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas/ / nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te// rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin// mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la// nga yis
180a7: sems ni rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra/ / gal te phyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la// bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni// nga la thabs med chags med gti mug mi 'gyur
180a8: te/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi thug ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro// lha dang lha mo shin du dri med la// khrag dang rus pa med cing ra bzang ba// de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te// rtag dngas bral zhing ther zug med phyir de//

180b1: de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi sgra rnams shin du bsrabs pa de dag de bas kyang cher 'dod chags dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa bskyed de/ steg pa bstan nas lus rnams brgyan te// bud med kyi g.yo nya bar bstan nas byang chub
180b2: sems pa mdza / / de la 'dren ces byaste/ bram na na gnas mchog sred dag lan ldan cig // du gyis btang ba shin dgul du shes par rings par sngags grwa ste// ga ga sdug ma gnan yang banas
180b3: gis bstod pa bzhin/ / gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rjod par byed// dus kyi nangan dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dris 'di ste/ skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang bcom//
180b4: byug dang ni dad pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyis gang // 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la dbab po// bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa// ri'i rgyal po lta
180b5: bur mi g.yo nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i gzugs/ / 'brug bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang po sgra bsgrags 'dra ba'o// 'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa// 'dod pa rtsod dang dgra dang 'thab dang /
180b6: nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa// byis pa'i skye bos nye bar bston gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs pa// gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i dus la babagyur gyis// do mod bdud las rgyal te
180b7: stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur/ / sgo rnams bstan nas smras pa zhal ra sa pad ma 'dra ba gsan du gsol// khyod ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// bud med dam pa'i cho
180b8: kyis sil snyan stong dag/ rab tu bgyid 'gyur na// thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la dga' ba bsten du gsol// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis

181a1: mchod la/ / chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// slab dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed// chos kyi dga' bas dga' yi yul la ra yi
181a2: yid ni dga'am yin/ / de dag gis smras pa/ re shig dang la bab pa ma mal dang bzur bur gyur pa dang // khyod ni shig zhan gyis ma btab mi shes pa kres par mthar dang // de maud dpal babacing bdag cag grogs kya
181a3: dngal ba 'gyur ba/ / de mi bar du 'jam pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa'i dga' bskad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa tha~Md mau dpa pa dam pa ci me kon pa rnyed pa nga srid byang yin tu byu ma ma ba cwas rnas sa
181a4: ji srid rga dang nang nga 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par mi gyur pa/ / de srid dang ni 'jigs med grong khyer lam mchog bsgom par bya// de dag gis smras pa// lha'i gnas na sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos bskor ba dang // 'thab bral 'theb bral ra ba dang
181a5: dga' ldan rab dang bdud kyi gong khyer na/ / lha mchog bskyod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la// rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
181a6: 'dod pa rtswa rtse'i zil thigs bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs/ / klu yi bu mo khro ba la bur shin du 'jigs par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud gyi dbang du song // 'phags min
181a7: rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'/ / de dag gis smras pa/ shing mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur la/ shang shar te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin bung ba spa babyin ldan pa gzigs//
181a8: sa las ci 'khrungs rab sde 'jam zhing snam la lcar lo can mchis pa// nags mchog mi ci tshogs kyis bsten par na chung rnams dang bgyes par mdzad// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams

181b1: 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas/ / bung bdag kyang bkres dang sos pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags// gang shig can pa las skyes pa rnams kyang nyims skams par 'gyur// 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud
181b2: kyi ris par gyung / / rgyad kyi bu sa rnams kyis smras pa// zla bya'i zham mang gzigs shig// padas sar pa 'dra ba'i la bzhin can/ snyan cing yid du 'ad ba'i tshig ldan sa ni dadra la dang 'ba'adra// 'di 'dras mi gnas/
181b3: dkon na mi ya~M gnas nag ma mchis// gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis tag dad par bgyi ba rgyad kyis brnyes// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// las ni ngan stug mig cad srin bu'i rigs kyis gang bshog shig pa/
181b4: myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong // rgyu bar bcas drang mi rgyu ba yi 'grol bde ba mchog byed pa// go 'phang 'chi'apho med po skye ba mkhas pas mchod par thob bya// dadaga'ad pas/
181b5: sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi myong bar gyur pa ste// rkang gdub gser gyi phag ska 'khrol zhing gos kyang shig shig byas nas ni// 'dod pa'i mda' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di ga smras// rdo rje khyed la nongs pa ci zhig
181b6: bgyis na'ang dag bsten mi bgyi/ / srid pa kun gyis nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras// 'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtse gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu gri 'dra// sbal gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar nges 'dir rab tu rig pas na/
181b7: bud med yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs// bud med yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig byed pa de dag gis// gang gi tshan glang po'i phru gu'i skabs can dbarjod ma nus tshe// ngo tsha skyengs nas thub pa'i
181b8: rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ / dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas// pad ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal// mar gyi sbyin bsreg bgyis yo 'a phro me 'dri gser gyi ri 'dra ba//

182a1: la// srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig/ bdag nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba basprul du gsol// de dag rnams kyis dang ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnams mang bstod/ tshan/
182a2: tubyung ba'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni// song ste pha'i rkang la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang spras// yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra
182a3: pa'i mig gis lta/ / de ni chags pas skye bo mi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags// lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'// srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur// de nas
182a4: bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la/ yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa/ kye mi shes shing glen te/ khyed kyi gzugs dang nga rod ma mthong
182a5: ngar/ / ji ltar gyur na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar mi nus/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis te/ gsang ba chen po lha yang
182a6: sdang ba mchis ma lags/ / spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang mongs ma mchis// lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin du zab// bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tshom ma mchis rtogs// 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan
182a7: 'dod chags chags ma mchis/ / gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba/ lba yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis// de la bud med sgra rnams gang lags bstan na yab// chags bcas gang lags de yi snying zhu 'gyur/
182a8: rigs na// de dag mthong yang de'i sems ni gcig ma g.yos// ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo mchis// bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas blta ma yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs// bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul

182b1: zhugs spang / / lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge/ de dag de yi rkang par mgos btugs phyag kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur
182b2: des/ / yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te// stobs ldan dag dang 'thab par sbyor 'di che gra rab che// yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug phud can// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus par gnas//
182b3: rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgya na// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs// gang dag sems pa ma mchis gang dag sems ma mchis// shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding
182b4: dbang po dag/ yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las// yab cig do mong slar log na ni legs pa 'dra// gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar mi phyin der ni rgyal mi bgyi// gang zhig rtsa nas mi byin de ni brko mi bgyi// gang la bzod
182b5: pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi/ / gang gis yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi bgyi// dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / mkhas ma dang / mdangs/
182b6: stobs dang / bden smra dang / ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon du bstod par byed de/ sems can dam pa khyod ni
182b7: dgung zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o/ / blo rnam par dam pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhar nge ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni nags dang nags
182b8: 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o/ / sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni 'khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod

183a1: ni rgya mtsho ltarang rin po ches bltam zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o// sems can rnam par dag pa khyod na dogs ltar sems na
183a2: thams cad kyi 'tsha bar gyur ci grags shin du brtan pa'o/ / sems can dum pa pyod ni mchom dros pa kang shAg tu dang shing thugs rtog pa mi mnga' ba'o// sems can dam pa pyod ni rjeng sar ltar 'jig tan gyi khams thams cadal/
183a3: tu mi chags shing thugs gnas ma mchis pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul par dka' zhing stobs
183a4: dang ldan pa'o/ / 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa btan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o// sems can
183a5: ram pa khyod ni ring por mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar
183a6: byed do/ / dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de// rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod na khrung khrung rgan po ltar sems yongs su
183a7: rlung cing dmas pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni mang po rgan po 'dam du bying bstar nyam chung ba'o// sdig can khyod ni dpa 'bor khas 'chas pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o// sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor ba ltang
183a8: gnyis su med pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar skyel ba'o// sdig can khyod ni 'dron po lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par

183b1: gnas pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni mi dbral po bu lon can ltar dman papas kyang dman pa'o// sdig can byed na bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar bu cor smra ba'o// sdig can khyod ni mdul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o// sdig
183b2: can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar dang 'bros par 'gyur ba'o/ / sdug can khyod na rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du dang 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o//
183b3: sdig can khyod ni sdod chag pa rdul gyis gang bltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul la bab pa ltar dang tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyad ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs
183b4: thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o/ / dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyam smad pa byas so// dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams
183b5: gyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdug can zlog par byed de/ bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa'i bos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpas do med pham par byas par 'gyur ro//
183b6: sdig can khyod ni par stobs chung ngul byad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpes tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu me b+her la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar ro mod byang chub
183b7: sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni phub ma spang gang la rlung dmar bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpes gtor bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni wal seng ge bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems
183b8: dpas spangs par byas par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni shing sa la chen po rtsa nas bcad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar

184a1: do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni brjes kyi chu la nyi tshan chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can gsang
184a2: par bya ba shor ba ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bud pa'i khru ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po
184a3: rgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byang bu bcug par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni khrung brur rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can byed
184a4: ni 'brog dgon par lam rgyags chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro// /
184a5: sdig can khyod ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nagra tshal ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpa'as brnyil bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o//
184a6: dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag bskal pa thos kyang
184a7: bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te/ slongs shig rgyob shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang nyid rgyal nas nga yi yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur// langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong
184a8: 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces spras/ byang chub sems dpas sbas pa/ ri yi rgyal po spun po gnas nas g.yo srid 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sal

184b1: ltung yang srid/ / sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srid kyi// nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yod mi srid// bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun
184b2: dbang / / lha dang lha min tshogs bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams// kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur// kho bo'i yul na 'dug pa longs la tshig bzhin bgyis// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin
184b3: gsal bar khyod dbang min/ / yang dgar ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin// gal ste ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug/ dbang med khyod ni lha bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur// bdud kyis spras pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig
184b4: dgon par ci zhig byed/ / khyod kyis gang btsal de dang 'phrad par sla ma yin/ rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs dka' thub rab bsgrims kyang // go 'phang mchog de ma thob mir gyur khyod ci smos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khro bo'i
184b5: zil non blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang / bdag la rtag dang mi rtag snyam du gnas pa dang // yul du 'gro bas gnas pa thar snyam gnas pa yi// drang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad// de dag yang dag dang dang bral zhing
184b6: skyes bu smras/ / khyab dang phyogs gcig chos dang kha cig nag ce sgra// lus can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can// byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzer// stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pas sde dpung bcas// /
184b7: khyod pha ma byas te byang chub rtul med ded thob nas// 'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstan par bya// bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i
184b8: tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di zung shig/ gcig pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di ni nga yi mdun nas zung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis// nga'i khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba

185a1: byang du chug/ sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam pa mang po 'dren cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs catsha sa bye ste so sar dbreng /
185a2: rna nga// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can drung na me e he btu bsgrims te nags pas bcing du nas kyang srid// nyi ma zla ba kun par ba rib med byed ma pas las lazung bar byid ba dus phreng kyi// bya dang drab sa
185a3: po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing dru nas ning bsnod nus mi 'gyur/ / bdud dpung sgribs dang ldan pa langs te gzhes zer// nga dang dzadang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra ba byin langs// bdudud drung shin du 'jigs pa 'di dag nganas ste//
185a4: hud bu sdug khyod ces ma rung gyur ces zer // 'dzam gling gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar ser// shin du gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khyod dadeng g.yul ngo chen por rab tu brlag 'gyur te// dbang pos lha min
185a5: lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la spras// mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa// de ni shing mchog
185a6: drung nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod/ / gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang // gang zhig baspu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang // skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor pa// des kyang shing drung 'dug pa la
185a7: 'tshe mi nus/ / bdud khros sems kyis gnya shing gang gis bar tsam 'dug/ subs nas byung ba'i ral gri rnon po lag na thogs// dge sbyong sgur longs nga yis bsam pa bzhin du song // 'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad dge
185a8: byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ / gal te stong gsums rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tugang gyur la// kun gyi lag nar po lhun po mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri thogs gur kyang / de dag nga yi ba su bskrad par me rjes

185b1: ral gnod byed smos ci dgos/ / sun 'byen ma rengs shig dang de'ur btags te de yis brtan por dran par bya// rngam pa yang glang chen mgo dang 'jigs mig dang // myung gdug sApa dang mig gdug mi zad 'dra ba dag// me 'bang 'dog
185b2: mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing / rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag du sgra sgrogs cing // rdo rje'i lce dang lugs kyi bu lum char pa 'bebs// ral gri mdu shung nod
185b3: dgra sa dug can 'bebs/ / sa ni btol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mda' brgya 'ben// na srur du ban pa'i sbrul dang ma yang 'thor// nu tes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtshonas lan/
185b4: kha cig nam mkha' lding du bskur nas klu yang 'ben// kha cig bros nas lcags kyi thu lum ri rab tsam/ me 'bar ba dag rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen// sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'og gi chu yi phung
185b5: po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug/ kha cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab du mchod// kye mabu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchod// rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la// klog ltar rab tu 'bar bar mig nas mngon du 'byin//
185b6: bdud kyi dpung ni bskur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas// sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ji bzhin rtog/ 'dib bdud med stobs med 'gro med bdag kyang med// chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor// mig dang skyes pa bud med med/
185b7: cing bdag gi med// ni bsna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus// chos 'di byed pa po dang tshong ba po dang bral// brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phye yang stong // bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin du stong zhe na// 'dul 'thun
185b8: gnod srin nges pa gang yin de dag gis/ / lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces// rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te// de yis lag mthil g.yon pa 'dra ba mchog smras pa// sen mo

186a1: zangs mdag rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can/ / 'jam gling gser 'bar dang 'dra ba sad rnams dgos bstan pas// tshul du shes par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du thugs// mkha' las klog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas sa/
186a2: tshig tu smras pas 'di'i dbang yin ste// ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas// slor la mi sbyin snyan ste don med gzhir ma byin// chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dpang yin te// tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang /
186a3: gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dbang // sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dbang // brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar
186a4: shes rab dang / / tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dbang // rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dbang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims
186a5: ye shes dang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni// de dag nga'i ba spu brgya yi char mi phod// de yis tshul du shis par lag pas brdabs// khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur// bdud kyi sgra thos nas
186a6: nis la sku 'gyur te/ / nag pa'i rtsa lag rgya ba shig zung shig sgra yang thas// lus las rdum byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur// nabs bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur/ khrung rdung tshad 'don cing 'dugs nyen
186a7: mgon meng med/ / na kyi sa du 'bral bya mams / pa ban pa shid tus la lkung// srin pa phrul ga shi gyu// pagan sa lams ci gnas sa pa sa kyang me/
186a8: nags mos bya ltar bltas nas sor bar gyur// pam bu dang sring mod bzhin pu nu dag/ gang na mthong zhing gang du dang zhes 'dri bar byed// de mi rkyen gyis dad / pan dun 'thab ci rtsod// bdag ni sdug bsngam gru he chab rnapas kyang med/

186b1: bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs snyed po de// thams cad rnam par 'thor cing tha dgur gyes gyur te// zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur// mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer// shing gi lha mos de ched la
186b2: snying rje byas/ / chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor// myur du longs la phyi shol ma byed skyon du sod// bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gi bu yi snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te// sems
186b3: can shin du dag la nyes pa byas pas na/ / sdug bsngal 'jigs phongs mya ngan pa rAg dang brnyas pa dang // cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis thob// lha mos smras pa// mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la nyes byed pa// de ni nyes dang
186b4: sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dang / / cir me rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang / gsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang lha min mkha' lding man ci srin po'i dbang // tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og min bcas
186b5: pa dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pas/ 'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yi rgyal ba brjod// rgyan phreng chun po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul// me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char
186b6: 'babs/ / sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig nod pa// dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dag ba ba mdzad par 'gyur// stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen pha ma mdzad dpa' bo
186b7: do mod byang chub bsnyes/ / stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang // sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul ched du 'dir ni g.yul dor rab tu zhugs/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
186b8: dpa'i stobs rtsal sus mthong ba/ / bye ba sum cu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon// // bdud brtul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste// nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//

187a1: dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ dgra btul ba/ g.yul dang g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams las
187a2: dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang
187a3: dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa// dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge badzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
187a4: de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes
187a5: brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin// sdug bsngal
187a6: pa yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pas bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms pa zhugs pa'i sems yong su dag pa/ yongs su byang
187a7: ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ gnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stong la lha'i mig les ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon byas pa'i phyir
187a8: sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon pa gtong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa mi'i las shin du nges pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang /

187b1: bzang po dang ngan pa rnams mthong ngo // las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang /
187b2: ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal
187b3: ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de
187b4: ngag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ / de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las
187b5: shin du 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang // kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / don 'grer song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong
187b6: do/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do// mun pa sel to// snang ba skyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems pa yongs su dag pa/
187b7: yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong
187b8: ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrubs cing mngon par gtong ngo / / de bdag dang sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang /

188a1: bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang skyeb brgya stong phrag dum dang / skye ba bye ba dang / skye babyeb pag brgya dang / skye
188a2: bye ba phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas/ 'jig
188a3: pa'i bskal pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no// bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ ming 'di zhes bya bar
188a4: gyur to/ / rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o// kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o// kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za'o tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo// yun ni 'di srid gcig gnas gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu'i
188a5: zhig myong ngo / / bdag de nas shi 'phos nas cheg mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par
188a6: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum rdzas su dran no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyo par rdzogs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa
188a7: pa ya / sas napa / gas sanas kyi byung tud 'cha sa ma man rdzug pacwam das can nga sa pa bya
188a8: gas pa zad pa'i rig pa bdod du pa pa'i phyir ma ma mngon par sgru cing mngon par matod / de 'di snyam dusams te/ byam 'jig tan 'an 'di sa te/ skyo ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'cha' ba ba dang /

188b1: grags pa byu sa// kya pad / bdang/ lasags pa rdzug sa kyi zung ba can / de 'byung ba byung bags te/ mamangon dang / bad/ lagags brdzun /
188b2: ba sa nas rgya tu ng+yas sa// sa pa ga
188b3: ya sasas te/ byas med pa yan r+b+ha ts+tsha/ nag rkyen Sh+T+ra ga na rnas/ dang nubasams pa di sams / ga yod pa ste dang rkyen gang shin na ga/ de di sa
188b4: srid pa yod pas kye babyung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam dusems te/ gang yod pas srid po byung / srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam
188b5: bsams te/ len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas len pa byung / len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'i/
188b6: snyam du bsams te/ sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste/ len pa'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas sred pa byung / sred pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des
188b7: 'di snyam du bsams te/ tshor ba yod pas sred pa byung ste/ sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor ba byung / tshor ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/
188b8: des 'di snyam du bsams te/ reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/ tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyen ni gang yin

189a1: snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam te/ skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug
189a2: byung / skye mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched drug byung ste/ skye mched drug gi rkyen ni ming dang gzugs yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
189a3: 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas ming dang gzugs byung / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ rnam par shes pa yod bla med dang gzugs byung ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni
189a4: rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rnam par shes pa byung / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'du byed yod
189a5: pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas 'du byed byung / 'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di
189a6: snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis
189a7: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred
189a8: pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyisan shi dang / mya ngan dang / spro sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang // yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/

189b1: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mar du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyeg cig skyes
189b2: rig pa smos/ med po shes pa skyes/ yid gzungs pa skyes so// shes rab smras so// snang bzung ngo // de nas yang byang chub sem pa dpa' 'di snyam dusam pa te/ gang med tsu/ bad par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas na shi gags
189b3: snyam nas/ / des 'di snyam du bas mos te/ skye ba med na rga shi med par 'gyur te/ skyi ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
189b4: med pas skye ba med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems
